story:
A bit about us 

We are a team that believes that every person who needs an artificial limb should have access not only to the prosthesis, but also to recover autonomy and use of this extremity at the lowest cost. We’re doing this with the help of a team conformed by a PhD physician, myself, a friend of mine, who just graduated from Mechatronics too and a brain signal specialist with a PhD.

Our first model is patent pending, which allowed us to obtain government funds to continue with our R&D, but only to certain extent. Part of the funds are also allocated to the patenting process, and because of this, I can't upload a picture of the prototype. Further funds are needed to patent the hand in the USA and Europe (France, Spain, England and some others). 

The prosthetic hand works thanks to 12 DC motors, controlled by a micro-controller from Texas Instruments. Each motor has a PI-controller and it is connected to a driver, also from TI. The development of the board costs $ 20,000 USD, so a good amount of the founding is going to be used for this purpose. We already bought the DC motors and their drivers and the encoders for the control. 

About the project

I'm a Mechatronics Engineer studying at the Tecnológico de Monterrey, campus Guadalajara, Mexico. I'm currently in my 8th semester and I decided, some months ago, to start a prosthetic hand business to help people in Mexico (working sector) and later, once we grow, enter the USA, Europe, Colombia markets, among other ones. This project was born from the moment I saw Star Wars, which is why I decided to study the major I'm studying. When I saw the movie, I told myself "Mike, you are doing it" referring to Anakin arm. I didn't start the project before because of knowledge and the school, but last semester, the opportunity to start it arrived and I decided it was about time to start so I started to work on the model, model which I have tested extensibly to ensure a good functioning.  

With your help, we will be able to develop the board for the MCU, the brain of the hand, protect the idea in more countries, even protect the design of the hand, make the silicon glove, which gives the hand a natural appearance and will make the hand to fully function, even use the keyboard, play the piano, and, why not, even play the guitar. It will be possible to realize this thanks to you. Every person who support this project will have a special place on our website. And thanks to your help we will be able to help people who need this more. The reason we are doing this, is not for the money, is for helping people to recover their autonomy. 

We already have an algorithm to receive the signal and process it and move every finger on an independent way, giving the user a complete control of the hand!! 

Project progress so far

Here is a part of the hand we are developing, made with an OpenSource 3D printer. 


Here is the first forearm we printed and realized it has to be a little bit different so the motors+batteries+MCU board fit inside.

Here you can see the motors and the extra gears. On the next image, you can see the motor box: 


and of course, a finger moving (sorry for the quality):

And our first test with the electronics for the hand, the motor moving with muscle pulses
Hope you enjoyed it and feel ready to support us!! =D

What we need

We need $ 50,000 USD for this project, on this stage. 
  • At least $ 15,000 USD are going to protecting the product, to patent it. 
  • We need $ 18,000 USD for the developing of the board, the brain of the hand, the brain that will allow the user to recover the life before the accident.
  • Approximately $ 2,000 USD  for the 3D printing, using strong and light material so the hand lasts many years and support high temperatures and the heavy use. 
  • $ 1,000 USD for the motor restraint.
  • And $ 14,000 USD for the silicon glove and its sensors and other things that will allow the user to have a fully functionality of the hand. 
Every person who donates will have a special reward, and all of you will be mentioned, if we get your permission, of course, on our website. You can see the different rewards but I'm gonna let you in on a secret here for you: our biggest supporter will have a four days stay in Guadalajara, Mexico and a special meeting with the team and the first patient who receives the hand.

Impact

Our goal is to create the best prosthetic hand in the market, that can be affordable for the people who need it more and that be entirely controllable by the user. Imagine to be one of the first who believed in us in the future, when we, thanks to your help, will be able to give a man or a woman the prosthesis they need so badly. Imagine the happiness of this person to finally recover their autonomy.
The project is 100% possible, you can see the page www.touchbionics.com company that makes prosthetic hands too, or here in Mexico www.probionics.com.mx. The last one is in spanish but they are making a prosthetic claw and have succeed. and our goal is to overcome them, all this, thanks to your help!!

Challenges

The most difficult part on this project is to ensure the user the independency of each finger, as the ability to use the keypad again and of course, write. Also, the natural movements are not going to be easy, but we have worked very hard to make them possible. 

We have more than 100 patients waiting for us, just here, in Guadalajara. 

We have planned to start with five of them, with prototypes, to ensure the correct functioning and verify the details we could have missed. Once we are sure it is a good product, we will start implementing the prosthesis on each and all of them, if possible, so they can be able to be autonomous again. 

Our most difficult goal is to make it cheap. The idea is to make a low-medium cost prosthetic hand, because here in Mexico, (I cannot talk about other parts of the world yet) the people who most need this device is the working sector, sector that can't pay a lot of money because they don't have plenty resources. The plan is to sell it on less than $ 15,000 USD, so it can be more accesible to the people who need this more. 

    Other ways to help

    If you currently can't afford to donate some dollars but you are interested on the project and believe in us, you can always refer the project to more people so we can continue to work on this project and I personally ask you to tell them they came here thanks to you, so you can get an award too. 

    Rewards

    Every one of our supporters will get an appreciation letter signed by the team, unless you don't want it. And, as I said before, if we have your consent, you will be on the website as one of our benefactors. Also, if you are in the need of a prosthetic hand you will get a very good discount when we start selling them.
    If your donation is between our rewards, don't worry!! Please leave you email so we can send you a reward too!! We cannot cover all the options. Everyone has to and will get a reward!! Why? Because we are 100% committed to you and with the project and I believe that everyone who believe in us, need a recognition, because this project, helping people, will be thanks to you!!

story:
Hi - My name is Ann, and I have almost pulled off a rare medical feat - healing  completely from asthma. Doctors almost universally see it as a chronic condition, meaning the drug companies will sell you "toxic and addictive" (in the words of Andrew Weil, MD) drugs forever, but no one expects you ever to be cured.

At the end of August, I am going on a healing pilgrimage to Tibet.  This is the final step in my project to rid myself of asthma once and for all. I have been trying intensively to heal myself for about ten years; I’ve had asthma for twenty.

I’ve made great progress this year; six months ago I was able to give up the last of the prescription medications I was on, which is almost unheard of in people with asthma. I’ve had a blip this spring and had to resume the least toxic medication, but that is slowly clearing up.

Asthma has had a big effect on my life. Some of the medications, and the disease itself, create intense anxiety. The lack of breath and the resultant lack of energy have made it difficult to work as much and as well as I have needed to. Being ill and trying to avoid triggers such as mold and mildew have had an isolating effect, and led me to move often for a while in search of a safe place. I’ve been to the emergency room a bunch of times, and I’ve lost a lot of time and money and connections with people.

But I’m beginning to see an end. I’ve done a huge amount of work on the physical aspects, and now the last piece is the spiritual. I’m going with a group of people who have been there before. I think this pilgrimage will enable me to complete this significant change in my health and my life.

I need to start paying for this trip this week, with a deadline of Wednesday (July 2) for $3,500 of the cost. And though I expect to have the funds in the future as I am starting to freelance to make extra money, I don’t have them now. I’m hoping to crowd-fund the pilgrimage, with loans and gifts. As of tonight I've raised $1,350.

In all I need to raise $7,000 - $10,000, for plane tickets, lodging, gear, travel within Tibet, and expenses. Any amount is welcome, believe me. If I don't raise all of that, I will need to take out some expensive loans, and I am trying hard to avoid that.

I would be very happy to see more people get off asthma drugs and reclaim their health.

    Other Ways You Can Help

    • Please help me get the word out about this campaign! Time is short for this first stage.
    • Please use the Indiegogo share tools . . .

    Thank you!

story:
We're Featured In The Press

From Humble Beginnings!

And Finally.....Our Retrievor

Almost as tiny as a US Quarter and not much thicker than 4 stacked together, Retrievor brings you all of the functionality a true end to end GPS solution should offer!

Having teamed up with some of the best brains in the business and developed partnerships with cutting edge service providers, we bring you the smallest ever, end to end GPS solution in the world. Period! We've also packed some amazing technology into our little Retrievor, which combined with our free Android, iPhone & Web Apps, will allow you to track almost anything, anywhere in the world. 

What's Inside Retrievor?

By selecting and partnering with the very best manufacturers of micro technology, we are able to make Retrievor really tiny. Measuring only 35 mm (1.37") in diameter and 16 mm (0.63") thick means you can use Retrievor to track almost anything. 

Powered by record breaking technology which allows us to keep things really, really small. Our GPS unit is the industry's smallest, fully integrated module with on-board antenna. Featuring  advanced miniature packaging technology and an ultra small footprint too! 

 Key facts

The new technology inside Retrievor is the industry’s smallest, fully integrated GPS module with on‐board antenna.This module is complete SiP (System‐in‐Package) featuring advanced miniature packaging technology and an ultra small footprint.

Autonomous operation Active antenna on-board OriginGPS Noise Free Zone System (NFZ™) technology Fully integrating:

Features

Low profile antenna element, 

C/A code SBAS (WAAS, EGNOS, MSAS) and QZSS support 48 channels 

Ultra-high Sensitivity down to -163dBm enabling Indoor Tracking 

TTFF of < 1s in 50% of trials under Hot Start conditions

Low Power Consumption of ≤ 11mW in ATP™ mode 

High Accuracy of < 2.5m in 50% of trials 

Self-managed low power modes

ARM7® microprocessor 

Ultra-low weight of 1.4g 

FCC, CE, VCCI certified RoHS II/REACH compliant

Innovative GPS firmware can detect changes in context, temperature, and satellite signals to achieve a state of near continuous navigation availability by maintaining and opportunistically updating its internal parameters while consuming mere microwatts of battery power.

Retrievor Specs

Model

RT -101

Size

35 mm (diam) x 1 6 mm (H)

Weight

18g

Communications                    

GSM/GPRS/GPS/APRS

Frequency

850/900/1800/1900Mhz

GPS chip

OriginGPS  ORG1411

GPS sensitivity

-163dBm

Tracking

Indoor & Outdoor

Accuracy

1 - 3 meters

GPS Start (Hot)

1 second

Battery

Proprietary Power Source

SIM Card

 Nano

Operating Temp

-40°C to +85°C

Certification

FCC/CE/VCCI Certified

Waterproof

Up to 3M

Free Android, iPhone and Web Apps

Track your very own Retrievor any way you wish, using our feature rich applications. These allow you to set up a Geo-Zone which triggers either a text, email or ringtone once your Retrievor moves out of the zone. You can pinpoint Retrievor's exact location by zooming in, check speed, distance traveled and route taken. Retrievor is accurate to within 1.5 meters so finding your lost item is a breeze!

GEO- Fencing

Track your Retrievor live online and follow its every move, set up Geo -Fence parameters which trigger an e-mail, ringtone or SMS when the device leaves or enters the designated area. Geo- fences can be selected as shapes (circle, square,rectangle) or manually by dragging the fence area to suit your specific needs.

Ease Of Use Is Always In Mind

You can chose your own icon from a standard menu for each RETRIEVOR device you want to track or even upload your very own. By clicking on the icon in "Radar" mode, you are automatically taken to the "Map" screen, displaying the exact location of Retrievor, route taken, speed, and distance traveled. With all this information, there's little chance anything will be missing in action for too long!

Multi-Retrievor Support!

Want to keep track of your daughter and son's cars or two family pets at the same time? No problem! Upon activation, you can track and retrieve several devices on one mapping screen.

Multi-Purpose Attachment Clip

Your free little attachment clip allows you to attach your Retrievor to just about anything, including pet collars. 

Activation and Subscription Fees

Using satellites orbiting the earth and GSM networks to keep track of your Retrievor is an expensive business, which means there is a $5.79 monthly subscription fee for your first Retrievor. This is charged annually in advance. Additional Retrievor's can be added to your subscription plan for only $4.59 extra per month. Some good news though - As a token of our appreciation, there is NO Activation Fee for Indiegogo contributors!

GSM Coverage

Retrievor will function almost anywhere in the world using GSM networks and autonomous GPS for tracking. We have incorporated (A)ssisted GPS to improve spatial resolution (accuracy) through cell triangulation and to improve App functionality. 

What We Need & What You Get

In a nutshell, we need your help through pre-orders to get the required funding to commercialize our venture and put Retrievor into large scale production. This is also an exercise to assess demand for our innovative product and at the same time helps us build a strong relationship with our early adopters. 

With your help, we need to: .

  • Place our first production orders (we are working with a manufacturing company with lot's of GPS hardware experience, but ultimately, we need to know how many Retrievor's to make!)
  • We also need funding to further our App development and back-end technology and support.
  • Futher develop our proprietary power source (in parallel with the above).

And if you’re international, we want to help you out too. With the exception of the USA, Canada and the European Union (EU), we still have a lot to figure out in regards to regulations in other specific countries. We'll get there eventually, after all, GPS technology is already available in almost all of them so it's really just a case of getting the correct paperwork in order!

Risks and challenges

As with any product, supply chain logistics can potentially impact parts delivery. Additionally, delays may result from final detailing and testing lab procedures and certifications.

The Road Ahead

At this point in our venture we have already selected technology and manufacturing partners and the hardware design is secured. This design needs tweaking and is an ongoing process during the development and refinement of our product.


FAQ

What happens if you don't reach you funding goal.

We are asking for your help to assist us (through pre-orders) in financing  the manufacture of Retrievor in sufficient quantity. As we have already reached our funding goal and utilized the funds for development thus far, we still need more funding to enable us to manufacture and further develop our product. 

How long will the battery last?

We are developing our very own propriety power source. Battery level is dependent on usage and the rate at which you want to track the device. User defined ping rates can be adjusted from every second through to once per day so Retrievor may never need a recharge for a whole year!

Will I have to sign up for a carrier subscription?

We are using AT&T for data so that Retrievor will function almost anywhere in the world using both GSM networks and autonomous GPS for tracking.  There is a subscription charge of $5.89 per month.

Will there be additional costs?

There will be  a small monthly fee of $5.89 per month per device. In effect, we are guaranteeing the subscription price at $5.89 per device for the 1st year for all of our Indiegogo pre-order customers.

How accurate is Retrievor?

Accurate within 3- 7 feet (1 - 2 meters)

Do you ship internationally?

Yes, besides USA we will ship Worldwide.

What languages will the App be available in?

During the first year we will release the App. in the following languages English, German, French, Dutch, Swedish, Norwegian, Danish, Finnish, Spanish and Italian.

Can I travel with Retrievor?

Yes, without additional cost or any changes, Retrievor can be used all over the world! Tracking is not solely dependent on GSM network access as our device uses traditional GPS too.

How can Retrievor be so small?

With the help of smart technology and the inclusion of Solar and a propriety charging solution, Retrievor can efficiently manage the battery consumption, which means that we can use a very small power source. Retrievor is also packed with the latest components that are all very small in size and can also switch to sleep mode when not in use.

How do I connect with Retrievor through my SmartPhone?

In the box there will be a code for the App and our hosted web mapping service. After downloading the App from AppStore or Google Play you enter the code and right away you are connected and can start tracking Retrievor.

Will it be possible to remote control the polling frequency ?

The polling frequency can be adjusted remotely by the user by logging into our server based application platform. Polling can be set at anything from every second through to once per day or the device can be set in 'sleep' mode for extended periods.

What are GPS and Glonass?

GPS is a satellite system created by the US military but is today mostly used for civilian purposes. Glonass is the Russian version that has better reach in many locations. To be able to offer both will give superior coverage.

How can I attach Retrievor to my child or pet?

In the box you will find a multipurpose clip that makes it possible to attach Retrievor anywhere and there will also be a specially designed collar clip for pet collars.

Can I become a distributor/dealer/reseller/retailer or partner?

At the moment we are focusing our efforts on our first manufacturing run and QA but do have small retailer/reseller bundles available here on our campaign page. We will be discussing possible distribution/retailer/partnerships during Q1 2014. Please contact us through this link http://www.retrievor.com/contact-us showing your interest and we will contact you once our first manufacturing run is complete and dispatched.

How do I charge my Retrievor?

Retrievor is self-charging through the use of Solar and Kinetic motion. For times when your device is stationary and in an environment of low light for long periods, a micro USB cable is included in the box. Attach it to Retrievor and then you can charge it via your computer or by using the adapter that came with your SmartPhone. You can also use any standard USB A cigarette lighter adapter to charge Retrievor if needed (using the USB A - MIcro B cable which is included with your device) These chargers are freely available in most stores. 

                                         

Grab Yourself a T
For those who want to support us without actually pre-ordering a device, we have a special T-Shirt for you to show our appreciation. Just contribute $25 and one will be on it's way to you for Christmas.

story_txt:
We're Featured In The Press









From Humble Beginnings!




And Finally.....Our Retrievor

Almost as tiny as a US Quarter and not much thicker than 4 stacked together, Retrievor brings you all of the functionality a true end to end GPS solution should offer!
Having teamed up with some of the best brains in the business and developed partnerships with cutting edge service providers, we bring you the smallest ever, end to end GPS solution in the world. Period! We've also packed some amazing technology into our little Retrievor, which combined with our free Android, iPhone & Web Apps, will allow you to track almost anything, anywhere in the world. 
What's Inside Retrievor?

By selecting and partnering with the very best manufacturers of micro technology, we are able to make Retrievor really tiny. Measuring only 35 mm (1.37") in diameter and 16 mm (0.63") thick means you can use Retrievor to track almost anything. 
Powered by record breaking technology which allows us to keep things really, really small. Our GPS unit is the industry's smallest, fully integrated module with on-board antenna. Featuring  advanced miniature packaging technology and an ultra small footprint too! 
 Key facts

The new technology inside Retrievor is the industry’s smallest, fully integrated GPS module with on‐board antenna.This module is complete SiP (System‐in‐Package) featuring advanced miniature packaging technology and an ultra small footprint.

Autonomous operation Active antenna on-board OriginGPS Noise Free Zone System (NFZ™) technology Fully integrating:
Features
Low profile antenna element, 
C/A code SBAS (WAAS, EGNOS, MSAS) and QZSS support 48 channels 
Ultra-high Sensitivity down to -163dBm enabling Indoor Tracking 
TTFF of < 1s in 50% of trials under Hot Start conditions
Low Power Consumption of ≤ 11mW in ATP™ mode 
High Accuracy of < 2.5m in 50% of trials 
Self-managed low power modes
ARM7® microprocessor 
Ultra-low weight of 1.4g 
FCC, CE, VCCI certified RoHS II/REACH compliant

Innovative GPS firmware can detect changes in context, temperature, and satellite signals to achieve a state of near continuous navigation availability by maintaining and opportunistically updating its internal parameters while consuming mere microwatts of battery power.


Retrievor Specs




Model
RT -101


Size
35 mm (diam) x 1 6 mm (H)


Weight
18g


Communications                    
GSM/GPRS/GPS/APRS


Frequency
850/900/1800/1900Mhz


GPS chip
OriginGPS  ORG1411


GPS sensitivity
-163dBm


Tracking
Indoor & Outdoor


Accuracy
1 - 3 meters


GPS Start (Hot)
1 second


Battery
Proprietary Power Source


SIM Card
Nano


Operating Temp
-40°C to +85°C


Certification
FCC/CE/VCCI Certified


Waterproof
Up to 3M


Free Android, iPhone and Web AppsTrack your very own Retrievor any way you wish, using our feature rich applications. These allow you to set up a Geo-Zone which triggers either a text, email or ringtone once your Retrievor moves out of the zone. You can pinpoint Retrievor's exact location by zooming in, check speed, distance traveled and route taken. Retrievor is accurate to within 1.5 meters so finding your lost item is a breeze!




GEO- Fencing
Track your Retrievor live online and follow its every move, set up Geo -Fence parameters which trigger an e-mail, ringtone or SMS when the device leaves or enters the designated area. Geo- fences can be selected as shapes (circle, square,rectangle) or manually by dragging the fence area to suit your specific needs.



Ease Of Use Is Always In Mind
You can chose your own icon from a standard menu for each RETRIEVOR device you want to track or even upload your very own. By clicking on the icon in "Radar" mode, you are automatically taken to the "Map" screen, displaying the exact location of Retrievor, route taken, speed, and distance traveled. With all this information, there's little chance anything will be missing in action for too long!

Multi-Retrievor Support!
Want to keep track of your daughter and son's cars or two family pets at the same time? No problem! Upon activation, you can track and retrieve several devices on one mapping screen.

Multi-Purpose Attachment Clip
Your free little attachment clip allows you to attach your Retrievor to just about anything, including pet collars. 



Activation and Subscription Fees
Using satellites orbiting the earth and GSM networks to keep track of your Retrievor is an expensive business, which means there is a $5.79 monthly subscription fee for your first Retrievor. This is charged annually in advance. Additional Retrievor's can be added to your subscription plan for only $4.59 extra per month. Some good news though - As a token of our appreciation, there is NO Activation Fee for Indiegogo contributors!
GSM Coverage
Retrievor will function almost anywhere in the world using GSM networks and autonomous GPS for tracking. We have incorporated (A)ssisted GPS to improve spatial resolution (accuracy) through cell triangulation and to improve App functionality. 



What We Need & What You Get
In a nutshell, we need your help through pre-orders to get the required funding to commercialize our venture and put Retrievor into large scale production. This is also an exercise to assess demand for our innovative product and at the same time helps us build a strong relationship with our early adopters. 
With your help, we need to: .

Place our first production orders (we are working with a manufacturing company with lot's of GPS hardware experience, but ultimately, we need to know how many Retrievor's to make!)
We also need funding to further our App development and back-end technology and support.
Futher develop our proprietary power source (in parallel with the above).

And if you’re international, we want to help you out too. With the exception of the USA, Canada and the European Union (EU), we still have a lot to figure out in regards to regulations in other specific countries. We'll get there eventually, after all, GPS technology is already available in almost all of them so it's really just a case of getting the correct paperwork in order!

Risks and challenges
As with any product, supply chain logistics can potentially impact parts delivery. Additionally, delays may result from final detailing and testing lab procedures and certifications.

The Road Ahead
At this point in our venture we have already selected technology and manufacturing partners and the hardware design is secured. This design needs tweaking and is an ongoing process during the development and refinement of our product.








FAQ
What happens if you don't reach you funding goal.
We are asking for your help to assist us (through pre-orders) in financing  the manufacture of Retrievor in sufficient quantity. As we have already reached our funding goal and utilized the funds for development thus far, we still need more funding to enable us to manufacture and further develop our product. 
How long will the battery last?
We are developing our very own propriety power source. Battery level is dependent on usage and the rate at which you want to track the device. User defined ping rates can be adjusted from every second through to once per day so Retrievor may never need a recharge for a whole year!
Will I have to sign up for a carrier subscription?
We are using AT&T for data so that Retrievor will function almost anywhere in the world using both GSM networks and autonomous GPS for tracking.  There is a subscription charge of $5.89 per month.
Will there be additional costs?
There will be  a small monthly fee of $5.89 per month per device. In effect, we are guaranteeing the subscription price at $5.89 per device for the 1st year for all of our Indiegogo pre-order customers.
How accurate is Retrievor?
Accurate within 3- 7 feet (1 - 2 meters)
Do you ship internationally?
Yes, besides USA we will ship Worldwide.
What languages will the App be available in?
During the first year we will release the App. in the following languages English, German, French, Dutch, Swedish, Norwegian, Danish, Finnish, Spanish and Italian.
Can I travel with Retrievor?
Yes, without additional cost or any changes, Retrievor can be used all over the world! Tracking is not solely dependent on GSM network access as our device uses traditional GPS too.
How can Retrievor be so small?
With the help of smart technology and the inclusion of Solar and a propriety charging solution, Retrievor can efficiently manage the battery consumption, which means that we can use a very small power source. Retrievor is also packed with the latest components that are all very small in size and can also switch to sleep mode when not in use.
How do I connect with Retrievor through my SmartPhone?
In the box there will be a code for the App and our hosted web mapping service. After downloading the App from AppStore or Google Play you enter the code and right away you are connected and can start tracking Retrievor.
Will it be possible to remote control the polling frequency ?
The polling frequency can be adjusted remotely by the user by logging into our server based application platform. Polling can be set at anything from every second through to once per day or the device can be set in 'sleep' mode for extended periods.
What are GPS and Glonass?
GPS is a satellite system created by the US military but is today mostly used for civilian purposes. Glonass is the Russian version that has better reach in many locations. To be able to offer both will give superior coverage.

How can I attach Retrievor to my child or pet?
In the box you will find a multipurpose clip that makes it possible to attach Retrievor anywhere and there will also be a specially designed collar clip for pet collars.
Can I become a distributor/dealer/reseller/retailer or partner?
At the moment we are focusing our efforts on our first manufacturing run and QA but do have small retailer/reseller bundles available here on our campaign page. We will be discussing possible distribution/retailer/partnerships during Q1 2014. Please contact us through this link http://www.retrievor.com/contact-us showing your interest and we will contact you once our first manufacturing run is complete and dispatched.
How do I charge my Retrievor?
Retrievor is self-charging through the use of Solar and Kinetic motion. For times when your device is stationary and in an environment of low light for long periods, a micro USB cable is included in the box. Attach it to Retrievor and then you can charge it via your computer or by using the adapter that came with your SmartPhone. You can also use any standard USB A cigarette lighter adapter to charge Retrievor if needed (using the USB A - MIcro B cable which is included with your device) These chargers are freely available in most stores. 

                                         
Grab Yourself a TFor those who want to support us without actually pre-ordering a device, we have a special T-Shirt for you to show our appreciation. Just contribute $25 and one will be on it's way to you for Christmas.

story:
We Have Out Grown Our Home Kitchen


"And all those who see me, and all who believe in me
share in the freedom I feel when I fly.

Come dance with the west wind and touch on the mountain tops.
Sail o'er the canyons and up to the stars.
And reach for the heavens and hope for the future
and all that we can be, and not what we are."
John Denver The Eagle and The Hawk

Bear Tracks Organic Protein Bars started and is now being produced in our licensed and certified USDA organic home kitchen. We have out grown the space and my wife wants her kitchen, dining room and living room back. I have found a place in Fairlee Vermont where we not only would have the Kitchen we need but also the upstairs will work as our office and a place I can crash after a long day. I also want to increase our production by hiring some people and increasing our raw materials on hand so that we ship our bars when the orders come in. In addition, more help and a larger space would allow us to increase our wholesale business and maybe have our bars available on Amazon.Click to go to store now

What We Need & What You Get

I am looking at raising at least $50,000 so that we can do the following:

        Move into the building in Vermont

        Purchase Raw Materials at a level that will reduce our costs

        Start a new advertising campaign so that more know about our bars

        Hire an Office Manager / Right Hand Person ( a clone of me basically)

In order to raise these funds I am offering: a life time supply of bars, an all expense paid 4 day/3 night weekend in Vermont and more.


The Impact

Bear Tracks Organic Protein Bars have been proven to be the best bars out there. They are made with Organic Ingredients and Certified USDA Organic. We use Organic Whey Protein and Hemp Seed as the primary protein source. They are Gluten Free and Soy Free and of course are non-GMO. They have also been selected by a major cancer center to be the bar of choice for their patients.

Your contribution will help us continue to grow and supply these healthy bars to everyone. It will also help us make an impact on the local economy because we do not use any machines, we use people to make our bars from start to finish.


    Other Ways You Can Help

    I understand that some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean you can't help:

    • Forward the Link to all your friends on Facebook and Twitter
    • Use the Indiegogo share tools!
    • E-mail the link to ALL your contacts
    Accepting Your Grace with Gratitude,
    Paul Blann
    OrganicBearTracks.com

story:
#AS SEEN ON

 

 

 

 

#Problem: Memory foam & cotton pillows are too hot.

It is no secret that traditional pillows retain a lot of body heat, causing some sleepers to become uncomfortably warm or hot during the night. This causes: 

  • hot flashes, night sweating, restlessness, headaches
  • continuous tossing and turning, insomnia or disturbed sleep (freq. waking up) 

 

 

#Solution: Keep Calm & Sleep Cool; So you can sleep with No Disruptions.  

 

 The Dullo Plus Pillow features our premium cotton pillow cover, a pocket for interchangeable pillow inserts- cotton pillow insert & cooling pillow insert. 

Once you use its 8-hour cooling packs, Dullo Plus prevents Night Sweating and Overheating. This cooling sensation helps you relax and sleep more deeply while relieving stress & tension of the entire body. 

Once you use a cotton pillow insert or utilize the edges/sides, Dullo Plus becomes the most ergonomic pillow, ever, so you can snore less and sleep more.

 

 All the environmental factors in the bedroom play a big role. Room temperature & body temperature must be in sync, and usually, our heads get heat up due to overheating cotton pillows or memory foam pillows. We can fix that in 3 ways:

 

1. Cooling Pillow Insert with Ice Packs

The Cooling Pillow Insert holds 3-cooling packs that extend the cooling up to 7-8 hours of refreshing coolness while you sleep. When you wake up you can remove the cooling packs and place them in your freezer so you’ll be ready for another great night of sleep.   

 

Dullo Plus’s Cooling Pillow Insert radiates refreshing cool air all around your shoulders, neck, and head while you sleep. The cooling packs, themselves, disperse body heat. If you want the extra chill, just put it in the freezer for continuous cooling relief.

The Cooling Pillow Insert uses a water-tight pouch so you won’t have to worry about any leaks or wetness.  

"Experience The Next-Level Cooling Comfort in Dullo Plus!"

 

2. No Frosts (never wetting your pillow)

 

 No Frosts with Hexa Layered Structure: Tested in many field tests, we figured out a way to hold icepacks inside the pillow without frosts, so absolutely nothing gets wet.  

 8 Hours of Cooling, Not Freezing: No one gets freezing cold. It's  provides  cooling comfort. The icepack insert (packet) holds 3 icepacks with 6 layers of fabrics (as seen in the picture below), providing superior insulation. 

 

3. Optimal Air Flow: Cooling Comfort

 

Pillow Cover: 100% Premium Cotton that provides extreme ventilation, compared to polyester and bamboo covers. A breathable cotton cover helps circulate the airway from your body- keeping you comfortably cool.   

 Microfiber Fillers: We meticulously use short and thin fibers only. They are highly water-resistant and breathable, allowing Dullo Plus Pillow to control humidity & temperature throughout the night. 

 

Dullo Plus is also a Neck Relief Pillow for Back, Side, & Tummy Sleepers. Our purpose is to guide you into sleep in the most natural way possible... in a good posture. 

 

 

1. For Side Sleepers 

The Arch Side helps side sleepers maintain horizontal spinal alignment as they sleep. Traditional pillows create a space between the pillow and your neck. The Dullo+ perfectly moulds to your neck giving you the complete support you need to sleep comfortably. 

 

2. For Back Sleepers  

 The Crown Side provides back sleepers the best sleep possible by gently supporting their necks so they can maintain their spine’s natural c-curve. Other pillows allow for too much movement during the night which causes you to lose sleep. The center of the Dullo+ cradles your head from all angles so you can sleep in a comfortable position all night. 

Tip: the dimple in the middle can be used for side-sleepers as ear hole :) 

 

 If you need more adjustability to already great ergonomics of the Dullo Plus Pillow,  a cotton pillow insert can be used. This boosts the pillow by a few inches to fit your neck curve perfectly. 

 

One Simple Goal: Adjust Pillow Height for Ultimate Neck Relief - Amazing Touch & Feel

 

 

 

 

Machine Washable - Keep Your Pillows Clean at All Times

The best way to keep your pillow clean is to wash it. Pillows that are only cover-washable end up accumulating months or even years worth of sweat, dust, and bacteria. Cotton Shower Pillow is washable in its entirety so that you can always keep it sanitized and fresh. Just toss it in the washer and dryer- quick, breezy, fluffy.

 

Dullo Plus’s silicone-coated microfibers hold their shape because they are elastic and resilient. They absorb micro shocks from your neck and shoulders so you can sleep more comfortably. Its microfiber filler can be removed or added to get the perfect height. 

 Thin & Short microfiber: won't get clumpy, while providing superior support

 Silicone Coated fibers: repel water so they won’t clump together. 

 

 

 

 The Cotton Shower team has planned, developed, and shipped 4 different types of pillows over the last 4-years. Each pillow has taught us more about how people sleep, how they want t sleep better, and how we can improve our pillows to make your sleep more enjoyable.

Each version has unique design improvements that provide sleepers with additional benefits that help them fall asleep faster and stay asleep longer.

Our current pillow, the Dullo Plus, is our most advanced pillow to-date while it provides cooling comfort and neck relief at the same time. We strongly believe that you’ll enjoy every moment of sleep when you’re head is resting on a Dullo Plus.

story:
Hello lovelies. It’s finally come down to that time where I’m finally ready to take what is for me, the most important life changing step in my transition, which is SRS (Sex Reassignment Surgery) or what is also known as GRS (Genital Reconstruction Surgery).

I’m super excited to finally be able to start planing out this giant leap forward in my life! My only issue is, like many many Transmen and Women, scavenging up the funds to have the procedure is quite the struggle. I don’t want to turn this into a sappy “The Feelz” message so I’ll not go into The Feelz!

I really don’t like asking for help, but this is super crazy important to me! Every single donation will help, and I’m also going to be putting money into my own fund as I can.

Thank you very much for everyone’s support, and please please, spread, tweet, reblog, this!

Genital Reconstruction Surgery (initialized as GRS; also known as gender reassignment surgery (GRS), sex reassignment surgery (SRS), sex affirmation surgery,gender confirmation surgery, sex realignment surgery, or, colloquially, a sex change) is the surgical procedure (or procedures) by which a transgender person's physical appearance and function of their existing sexual characteristics are altered to resemble that of their identified sex. It is part of a treatment for gender dysphoria in transgender people.

Gender identity disorder (GID) or gender dysphoria is the formal diagnosis used by psychologists and physicians to describe people who experience significantdysphoria (discontent) with the sex and gender they were assigned at birth. Evidence suggests that people who identify with a gender different from the one they were assigned at birth, may do so not just due to psychological or behavioral causes, but also biological ones related to their genetics, the makeup of their brains, or prenatal exposure to hormones.

GRS has come a long way over the years, some persons lead perfectly content lives without the need of surgery, while others require the procedure due to Gender Dysphoria. 
I wish to have my surgery completed in Thailand under the expert care of Dr. Suporn Watanyusakul.

Dr. Suporn is my surgeon of choice due to close friend testimonials and abundant successful results. The cost is a bit higher than a US surgeon, but the quality of work is unmatched. $20,000 

Every donation towards my surgery is GREATLY appreciated and will mean the world to me. I will be updating this section as time progresses with previews of the perks offered!


  • Limited Crona Cookie logo t-shirt! Is it a perk that the shirt will also smell like me?


  • Various prints from select photoshoots. Each print is high gloss, and will be signed, and features my Crona!Crona!Crona! logo across the back!


  • A small preview of the fancy panties that are offered!
story_txt:
Hello lovelies. It’s finally come down to that time where I’m finally ready to take what is for me, the most important life changing step in my transition, which is SRS (Sex Reassignment Surgery) or what is also known as GRS (Genital Reconstruction Surgery).I’m super excited to finally be able to start planing out this giant leap forward in my life! My only issue is, like many many Transmen and Women, scavenging up the funds to have the procedure is quite the struggle. I don’t want to turn this into a sappy “The Feelz” message so I’ll not go into The Feelz!I really don’t like asking for help, but this is super crazy important to me! Every single donation will help, and I’m also going to be putting money into my own fund as I can.Thank you very much for everyone’s support, and please please, spread, tweet, reblog, this!Genital Reconstruction Surgery (initialized as GRS; also known as gender reassignment surgery (GRS), sex reassignment surgery (SRS), sex affirmation surgery,gender confirmation surgery, sex realignment surgery, or, colloquially, a sex change) is the surgical procedure (or procedures) by which a transgender person's physical appearance and function of their existing sexual characteristics are altered to resemble that of their identified sex. It is part of a treatment for gender dysphoria in transgender people.Gender identity disorder (GID) or gender dysphoria is the formal diagnosis used by psychologists and physicians to describe people who experience significantdysphoria (discontent) with the sex and gender they were assigned at birth. Evidence suggests that people who identify with a gender different from the one they were assigned at birth, may do so not just due to psychological or behavioral causes, but also biological ones related to their genetics, the makeup of their brains, or prenatal exposure to hormones.GRS has come a long way over the years, some persons lead perfectly content lives without the need of surgery, while others require the procedure due to Gender Dysphoria. I wish to have my surgery completed in Thailand under the expert care of Dr. Suporn Watanyusakul.Dr. Suporn is my surgeon of choice due to close friend testimonials and abundant successful results. The cost is a bit higher than a US surgeon, but the quality of work is unmatched. $20,000 Every donation towards my surgery is GREATLY appreciated and will mean the world to me. I will be updating this section as time progresses with previews of the perks offered!
Limited Crona Cookie logo t-shirt! Is it a perk that the shirt will also smell like me?


Various prints from select photoshoots. Each print is high gloss, and will be signed, and features my Crona!Crona!Crona! logo across the back!




A small preview of the fancy panties that are offered!

story:
Over 10 years ago Richard was diagnosed with GIST, an uncommon type of GastroIntestinal Cancer that occurs along the GI tract.  Up until this past April they have attempted a couple of surgeries as well as various types of treatment in order to slow (there is no cure) the growth of the tumors.  In April Richard was in serious pain and after some tests and scans it was discovered that the medication they were using was not working the medical team then went to work to see what else they could do for Richard.  Recently, Richard was informed that there was a new drug that the team wanted to try as well as a major surgery sometime in April 2015.  If the drug appeared to be holding or shrinking the tumors then he would continue with the drug after the surgery, either way though this is all in an effort to give Richard more time. 

On January 10th, after only a couple of days of being on the new drug, Richard’s body began to shut down as it rejected the medication.  Saturday Jan 10th and Sunday Jan 11th brought forth a lot of confusion and fear.  Richard was completely disoriented and did not know what was going on and panic seemed to set in when he announced that he could no longer see.  Richard was eventually moved to the ICU at Ottawa’s General Hospital where he eventually fell into a deep sleep and couldn’t be woken up.  On Tuesday he started to wake and began to respond with yes or nodding.  Pupils were dilating and so it appeared his vision was returning somewhat.  On Wednesday when Sylvie (Richard’s wife) entered the room Richard said “Good Morning Sylvie”, his sight was back.  Though still very weak and with his mind a little numb (his words) he was able to have conversations and eat.  Over the next few days Richard’s status improved and he now appears to be back to where he was before he started with the new medication.

Richard is now slated for an 18-20hr surgery on January 30th where the surgical team will remove all they can.  If the surgery is successful, Richard will get more time, how much is not known.  Richard has been on disability since April and it has come to my attention that because of his medical situation he was not able to get life insurance on his mortgage.  Help me remove one less stress in Richard’s life by letting him know that his family will not have any financial issues in the future.  Let's help them pay off their mortgage.

story:
★ Click Here, Get Sippo for $59 


Drinking the correct amount of water is the simplest, most immediate way to feel more energized, focused & productive.


  

Simply by using Sippo at work, you'll never come home tired, fatigued or dehydrated again, while creating a healthier you.



In developing Sippo we designed and built the app from the ground up and integrated it with our business partner's hardware. Working together with our partner in this way has allowed us to fast track our delivery schedule and get it to you sooner!


Sippo is the Smart Hydration Solution consisting of a unique smart phone app that knows how much you have had to drink, recommends a personalized daily hydration schedule based on your activity and environmental conditions to reach your optimal levels.



★ Click Here, Get Sippo for $59 


Knowledge is power and Sippo was designed to make it to know your optimal hydration levels and implement an actionable plan to get there.

Your hydration requirements changes daily based on your activity and your environmental conditions and Sippo gives you the knowledge to know your current Hydration Status, and more importantly, how we can reach your optimal hydration levels throughout the day.

The Sippo smartphone app gives you real-time knowledge and updates to let you know where you are, and how far away you are from your daily goal.


Throughout your day, Sippo will deliver knowledge and intelligence to you through your smartphone (smartwatch, tablet or computer will be available with feature releases) to let you know it is time to take a sip.

Just a heads up, the same time you take a sip today, may not be the same time tomorrow…

With the help and support of Sippo, you will never come home from work tired, fatigued and dehydrated. Sippo will create a more energized you!



Review your daily, monthly and long-term hydration logs to see where you are doing well, how you can do better and how your hydration levels affect your overall health.

With Sippo’s Smart App Analytics tools, you can integrate your hydration results with data from other sources to see a bigger picture. Sippo is a vital missing link that other health devices do not track.


Sippo provideds you with the knowledge of what is right for you, not the average human being.

By analyzing your weight, activity, and environment, Sippo provides custom recommendations tailored to you, not the average person.



When you are not properly hydrated, you feel a burning sensation in your stomach that is similar to hunger pangs. This feeling can mistakenly lead you to unnecessary calorie consumption.  

Research shows that drinking one 8oz glass of water eliminates the false hunger sensation in 98% of subjects. Further, a 16oz glass of water will cause your metabolism to increase by 30%.

With Sippo, you know throughout your day you will be properly hydrated, helping you reach your weight goals naturally.


Whether you back your data up to the Sippo App or to your operating systems health kit, you know your health vitals are safe.

This feature will be available in February 2016.


 

By integrating your Sippo hydration logs with other wearables you may currently be using, your overall health picture is now much more complete with an added key component that no wearable is able to compute.

Sippo will seamlessly integrate with Google Fit and Apple Healthkit API’s to share valuable data for a comprehensive health overview, in one central location so you see the full picture of how each influence each other (stretch goal).


★Click Here, Get Sippo for $59 




★ Click Here, Get Sippo for $59 ➜  Ships in time for the Holidays!




Q. Why would I want to use a Sippo?

A. According to research, 75% of Americans are dehydrated all the time! It's just too easy to forget to drink when you're busy. Did you drink enough today, yesterday, last week?

Not drinking enough can lead to a lack of energy, headaches, grumpiness, fatigue and weight gain. Longer term dehydration has even been linked to bladder cancer, kidney stones and heart attacks! 


Q. How big is Sippo?

A.  The Sippo is 14 fl oz (420ml), to get you up and stop you from sitting at your desk for hours. When you use your Sippo, you'll be getting get up to refill your cup (and visit the toilet) enough to reduce the risk.


Q. When can I get a Sippo?

A. Sippo will ship later this year in time for the gifting season! Sippo makes a great gift for the people you love and care about.


Q. Is Sippo easy to set up and use?

A. Yes. Just download the Sippo app (when available) to your phone, pair your Sippo cup by Bluetooth, enter some information about yourself and you're ready to go.


Q. What kind of phone do I need to use Sippo?

A. You’ll need either an iPhone (running iOS 7 and above) or Android phone (running 4.3 and above). Download the free Sippo app (when available) to your phone and you can start using your Sippo right away.


Q. Is the app free?

A. It sure is!


Q. What material is the Sippo flask made from?

A. Sippo uses a premium polished stainless steel flash, and no cheap plastic. 


Q. Is Sippo BPA free and safe to use?

A. The Sippo stainless steel flask is naturally BPA free and will not impart any toxic chemicals or tastes to your beverage.


Q. Can I use Sippo with hot beverages?

A. You sure can.


Q. What technology does Sippo use?

A. Sippo uses advanced sensors, microprocessor and a quality Texas Instruments Bluetooth module.


Q. Does Sippo use batteries?

A. Yes, Sippo uses two AAA batteries (not supplied). We believe in being environmentally responsible and recommend the use of rechargeable batteries.


Q. Is Sippo dishwasher safe?

A. Yes. Simply remove the smart pad by gently separating it from the flask, and place the flask in the dishwasher. Don't put the smart pad in the dishwasher or other liquids! Use a damp cloth with a mild detergent to wipe the smart pad clean.


Q: When will I be able to pick my Sippo Cup color-option?

A: We'll send out a survey to all Sippo backers to verify their shipping address information and color-choice.


Disclaimer: Delivery of rewards/perks are subject to best efforts and not guaranteed.

story:
Who We Are

We are a group of pharmaceutical specialists, with a considerable experience in delivering essential medicines and healthcare supplies to under-served communities around the world in collaboration with the leading international charities.


The Mucojo Project

We have built this project  in collaboration with our partner Global Angels, through their ongoing Mucojo School Feeding Project, to reach one of the poorest regions on the planet - Mucojo, Mozambique.  A 17-year long civil war cut off this remote part of Mozambique from its capital Maputo, leaving forgotten tribes fighting for survival. Here, children are the first to suffer at the hands of poverty. One in three children does not reach their 5th birthday. The food, available to them, does not provide the very minimum of life-essential vitamins, minerals and other nutrient.

Malnutrition - The Silent Killer

According to the World Health Organization malnutrition contributes to five million deaths of children under five each year in developing countries.

Nearly 40% of children in Africa suffer from malnutrition, resulting in stunted physical growth, problems with organ functions and a compromised immune system. 

Fortunately, most of the harmful effects of malnutrition can be prevented. 

The first-hand information provided to us by our partners in the local communities, has allowed us to focus the goal of this project on reaching the most disadvantaged populations.

SPRINKLES - Helping Heal With Every Meal

Our ready-to-use solution reverses the devastating effect of anemia and severe malnutrition, restoring nearly 100% nutritional balance in the child and ensuring rapid weight gain, cognitive improvement, and overall improvement in the health of the children wasted due to the lack of access to a stable food supply. The format of our Sprinkles micronutrient powder, allows us to fortify any available food, instantly turning it into an optimal source of vitally important vitamins and minerals. The product has a very high diversity, and therefore a great acceptance rate. It is odorless, tasteless, non-allergenic and can be added to any food source.

IMPACT

At this moment there are 30,000 children in Mucojo suffering the debilitating reality of malnourishment. We are working to save as many of their lives as we can. With your help and contribution, we can make this a reality. Many have already volunteered their time, safety and personal conveniences to go into the field and help. Your gift will equip them with as many resources as possible to be able to save as many children as possible.

Just help us fund it and watch us do the rest!  100% of your donations will go to manufacturing and distributing the SPRINKLES. Any amount will go a long way. For instance, just $6 can buy 120 sachets of SPRINKLES that can provide nourishing treatment to a child for a full year! We track your personal contribution so we can keep you updated upon the receipt of your gift by the children of Mucojo.

WHAT WE HAVE

  • Access to a product that has proven one of the most effective ways to improve the health and well-being of millions of children and communities around the world.
  • A proven infrastructure that allows timely delivery of the product to any region
  • A partnership with Global Angels charity, whose local representatives guarantee rapid and direct distribution of SPRINKLES to the affected children
  • Connections far and wide in the local community
MATCHING GIFT

A corporate benefactor has agreed to match every dollar raised through this campaign! Make your contribution count for twice as much!!

WHAT WE NEED

$45,000 to manufacture and deliver 1,800,000 sachets of SPRINKLES into the hands of the children of Mucojo, saving the lives of those 30,000 children. Their muscles and bodies will thrive, fortified by the sprinkles nutritional boost, their cognitive abilities would improve, and they will have a chance not only to survive, but to live more productive lives.

OTHER WAYS YOU CAN HELP
  • Spread this link via social networks, make it easy for others to be a part of changing the world!
  • Visit our project partner Global Angels to discover more amazing ways you can get involved!
  • Follow us on LinkedIn and Facebook for regular updates on our progress and other useful information. Be informed!

Together we can give the 30,000 children of Mucojo the Hope of Life!

This campaign is part of the world wide PROJECT DORO initiative to reduce chronic under-nutrition by 30% in developing countries. The goal is to provide a healthy start to 1 MILLION children over the next 5 years. Every 6 seconds a child dies of the effects of malnutrition! Help us stop it!

story:
How You Can Give A Child The Gift Of Health

You can help Wellness Foundation to empower children and radically improve their chances of living longer, healthier lives.

It has been predicted that the current generation of children will be the first in history to have a shorter lifespan than their parents. Wellness Foundation is committed to creating a Generation of Change that empowers children to take control of their health destinies. Healthy Food for Life, our in-school nutrition program,  provides the foundation for lifelong well-being.

This dynamic program uses interactive games, food demonstrations and learning tools to engage students from pre-K through middle school. Over the course of the six-week program, students gain priceless information and resources to help them lead the healthiest lives possible.  A powerful ripple effect then takes place as the students share their excitement and newfound knowledge with their families. Wellness Foundation knows that reaching children is not enough and that is why we invite parents and families to attend all of our classes. By involving parents, we are empowering the whole family!

When visitors see our Healthy Food for Life classes, they are overcome by the level of enthusiasm--students are shooting their hands up to answer questions, racing to taste the food that has been prepared, and eagerly becoming 'food detectives' on a quest to find the healthiest items. And, it doesn't end in the classroom. Parents are amazed by how open their children become to trying new foods, wanting to take part in grocery shopping, and selecting fruits and vegetables to put in the cart versus refined products.  

Healthy Food for Life was recently featured in the highly anticipated documentary "Fat, Sick and Nearly Dead 2" leading people around the country to contact us about bringing this amazing program to their communities. We have been hard at work on our Healthy Food for Life Educator Training which will launch in early 2015 so that individuals around the country can bring this life changing program to their communities. This is where you come in!

Healthy Food for Life students are leading the way in the Wellness Revolution in our community and inspiring their families and other communities around the world to do the same. Your contribution will help us to expand this life-changing program in our community and to deliver our Healthy Food for Life  Educator Training to individuals around the country and fulfill our goal of empowering a Generation of Change.

Wellness in Action

Healthy Food for Life was created in 2008 as part of the Wellness Foundation's vision to educate, support and inspire children and adults to adopt healthy lifestyles.Since the program's inception, it has empowered over 5,000 children and families.  The Evans family of East Hampton is a wonderful example of the effectiveness of the Healthy Food for Life program and Wellness Challenge program for adults. 

Delani was four years old when she participated in Healthy Food for Life in her pre-K class.  One evening on the way home, Delani’s mom, Faith, stopped at McDonalds to get dinner. She was shocked when her four year old said, “Mommy, I don’t want to eat here. They don’t have any whole food here, just junk food that is bad for my body.”  Faith was shocked and wanted to know more about what Delani was learning in Healthy Food for Life. She attended one of Wellness Foundation's monthly potluck dinners to find out more.

Faith was so inspired by what she learned that she immediately signed up for the adult Wellness Challenge. She then called her parents, who were visiting Florida at the time, and told them they had to sign up, too! Faith credits Delani for getting her on the path to wellness. She said “When my four year old came home with recipes begging me to buy spinach and fruit for smoothies, I knew I had to do it.”  Faith and her parents, Vivienne and Earl, all worked hard during the Wellness Challenge and enjoyed significant results. They all experienced improvements in their weight, cholesterol and energy levels and achieved a higher level of overall health.  A few years later, all three generations of the Evans family are still practicing what they learned in our programs and enjoying continued good health.

It all began with bringing Healthy Food for Life to Delani’s preschool class.  The Evans family is a powerful example that it is never too early or too late to begin your wellness journey. Each member of the Evans family has become an Ambassador of Wellness and is inspiring family and friends to lead happier and healthier lives. Wellness Foundation's programs are creating a ripple effect of positive change in families and in our community. 

Call To Action

In order to continue empowering a Generation of Change, we need your support.  We constantly have requests to expand our program in our own community where we currently provide it in three grades in eight schools. We will be expanding to Bridgehampton and Southampton in the spring of 2015. To date, some 5,000 children have learned about the relationship between diet and health and their families have learned how to support each other with healthier choices and to prepare delicious, budget-friendly, healthy meals. 

In early 2015, we will be taking our program across the country  by making our Healthy Food for Life Educator Training available to everyone. In order to get this innovative and life changing program to children and families who need it, we need your help! Healthy Food For Life is empowering a Generation of Change and helping children lead healthy and happy lives. You can help change the health trajectory for our children by pledging your support today. Wellness Foundation has undertaken a tremendous challenge but with the support of generous and compassionate donors like you, we will make this happen!

Every Dollar You Donate Will Be Doubled!

This year, we are grateful and honored that one of our community leaders has generously offered to match every dollar given up to $10,000. Your gift is critical to help us take full advantage of this matching gift program! Every donation, regardless of size, will be a vote for the health of our children. Every dollar raised will go directly to providing quality life changing programming to our community and to our training program that will allow this program to reach children across the nation. 

 We can't think of a greater gift than the gift of health. Your donation will give a child and his or her family the gift of health this holiday season. Please take a moment today to donate the right amount for you.
story_txt:
How You Can Give A Child The Gift Of Health




You can help Wellness Foundation to empower
children and radically improve their chances of living longer, healthier lives.

It has been predicted that the current generation of
children will be the first in history to have a shorter lifespan than their
parents. Wellness Foundation is committed to creating a Generation of Change
that empowers children to take control of their health destinies. Healthy Food for Life, our
in-school nutrition program,  provides
the foundation for lifelong well-being. 
This dynamic program uses interactive games, food demonstrations and learning tools to engage students from pre-K through middle school. Over the course of the six-week program, students gain priceless
information and resources to help them lead the healthiest lives possible.  A powerful ripple effect then takes place as
the students share their excitement and newfound knowledge with their families. Wellness Foundation knows that reaching children is not enough and that is why we invite parents and families to attend all of our classes. By involving parents, we are empowering the whole family!
When visitors see our Healthy
Food for Life classes, they are overcome by the level of enthusiasm--students
are shooting their hands up to answer questions, racing to taste the food that
has been prepared, and eagerly becoming 'food detectives' on a quest to find
the healthiest items. And, it doesn't end in the classroom. Parents are amazed
by how open their children become to trying new foods, wanting to take part in
grocery shopping, and selecting fruits and vegetables to put in the cart versus
refined products.  


Healthy Food for Life was recently featured in the highly anticipated documentary "Fat, Sick and Nearly Dead 2" leading people around the country to contact us about bringing this amazing program to their communities. We have been hard at work on our Healthy Food for Life Educator Training which will launch in early 2015 so that individuals around the country can bring this life changing program to their communities. This is where you come in!

Healthy Food for Life
students are leading the way in the Wellness Revolution in our community and
inspiring their families and other communities around the world to do the
same. Your contribution will help us to expand this life-changing program in our community and to deliver our Healthy Food for Life  Educator Training to individuals around the country and
fulfill our goal of empowering a Generation of Change.

story:
The story

Meet Nathan And Amelie:

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Three years ago, Nathan was the victim of a car accident that nearly took his life.  He survived, but not without a lot of scars (including a hump on his belly), an ankle with a bone spur stuck in it, and $45,000 in medical debt.

 

Nathan tries to keep a sense of humor about it for Halloween:

 

The BIG problem:

His ankle.

Yeah, the medical debt is a bummer, but that's okay.  What he really needs is one last surgery on his ankle that his insurance company won't cover.  Between his current medical debt, student loans, and the cost of living, the surgery isn't a ton of money, but it's out of his budget.  

 

Can you help?

So that's it.  Nathan and Amelie just want to run around again without Nathan hobbling around.  Thanks so much!

story:
My name is Elena,

My story begins 13 years ago. I was 10 years old, growing up in a Moldovan village. I was a typical child; cheerful, friendly, and passionate about drawing and literature. I was a child like all other children, yet different. As I grew, instead of developing straight, my spine began to curve into an S shape (the image above, on the right is a 3D MRI of my back taken 2 weeks ago). My parents were very proactive and took me to different doctors. Some said I needed surgery. Others said I must go swimming daily and to a spa to receive regular massages. At that time, we were very poor and my parents didn't have money for regular massages and swimming. Furthermore, the idea of financing surgery was unthinkable.

Despite these financial difficulties, my parents were able to save what they could and I had the opportunity to do the minimum: swimming and massage, twice a year. Unfortunately, my scoliosis did not improve. As the years have passed, I’ve grown up with breathing difficulties, getting colds easily, and tiring quickly. My only relief has come from very strong pain relieving medication.

My scoliosis is now grade 4; a very pronounced S curve. If I could swim every day, get a massage every three months and exercise, I would feel better, but the pain in my back would not dissipate and my breathing problems would persist. In addition to my physical pain, I am always trying to hide this problem from others.

Many times, I remember when I was younger, my father said, “How good would it be if Jesus lived here on Earth? He would put his hands on your back and heal you.” Hearing this, I would wonder, ‘Why isn’t Jesus with us now?’! I needed 13 years to understand that Jesus is always with us. He is at work and works through people.

Now, at the age of 23, spinal surgery before the age of 25 is my last chance at a better life and I don’t want to miss this opportunity. Not having the surgery means I am at risk for a rapid decline in my health related to intense pain and difficulty breathing. In my present condition, I’ve been told to expect a 30% lung capacity reduction in my future as a result of getting a small cold.

The procedure that I require is one that is performed in many developed European countries. Germany is where my family and I have chosen to travel to find a qualified doctor who will perform the surgery that will immensely improve my quality of life now and for the future.

My family has very little money and the surgery costs 60.000 €.This is a very large sum and I am trying to raise this through multiple methods, which include: here on indiegogo, I’ve proposed 2000 dollars. If this is successful, I will launch another campaign at a later date. At the same time, I am contacting friends, family, NGOs, companies, etc with letters to explain my story. 

Please, help me on this first step towards a life without scoliosis with whatever amount you are able to donate today. Also, share my story with your friends and family. 

If you have any questions, please contact me directly with the subject line: Indiegogo Scoliosis at elena.gherta2@gmail.com . 

Respectfully,

Elena Gherta

story:
Short Summary

We are three final year medical students – Marnie, Sasha and Adam – doing our medical elective for six week in a rural pediatric hospital in Northern India this October.

I, Marnie, have done a volunteer placement in this hospital in 2007. It is a hospital of about 50 beds that was established in 1991 and is owned and run by one of the best paediatricians in the city, Dr. Rajan Kalra.

From my previous experience in Kalra Hospital, I remember that it is bursting with patients and has very basic facilities. It is not government funded (like majority of the hospitals in India) and the patient population are very poor and often cannot afford the $2 consultation fee or $15 admission fee required.

The hospital system in India is markedly different to that of the Western World. The most common medical conditions resulting in hospital admission are malaria, hepatitis, fever, diarrhoea, typhoid, meningitis and cholera. Most of these are preventable. The cultural approach to health and illness, the ratio of doctors to patients, the waiting time, the lack of resources and medications and the variety of serious yet preventable illnesses prevalent were all astonishing to me. However, the single most unsettling difference I noticed was the poor hygiene.

There were no gloves, no hand sanitiser, no soap, no alcohol swabs and no chlorhexidine. Wounds were not cleaned with sterile instruments and there were no protective caps on temperature probes.

What We Need & What You Get

Our main goal is to improve sanitation and hygiene at the hospital. Improved sanitation in developing countries typically yields about US$9 for every US$1 spent. Our aim is to provide gloves, hand sanitizer, soap, safe boxes for sharps disposals, detergent, washing powder for linen, cleaning products for beds/floor, and any other helpful agent to promote good sanitation and hygiene thus reducing the burden of preventable disease.

We are well aware that no amount of funding can help maintain hygiene in a medical setting without education. We will therefore be running educational sessions for all staff members at the hospital in the hope to implement long-term change.

We aim to set up a continuous fund to allow for the constant availability of these simple materials to increase hygiene but for now require a strong start-up donation.

Additionally, everyday there are hundreds of children requiring medical care that cannot afford treatment. We therefore also intend to use this money to assist these children’s families in paying for admission to hospital, antibiotics and other medications and in any other way we deem necessary.

The Impact

Why is hygiene important? On the simplest level, it prevents or minimises initial disease and/or the spreading of disease. Research shows that, if widely practiced, something as EASY as hand washing with soap could reduce diarrhea by almost fifty percent and respiratory infections by nearly twenty-five percent. Hand washing with soap also reduces the incidence of skin diseases, eye infections like trachoma and intestinal worms.

A recent initiative to improve hand hygiene in hospitals in England and Wales over a 4-year period was found to save 10,000 lives. 

http://www.guardian.co.uk/society/2012/may/04/hospital-hygiene-drive

 

We aim to raise $2,000 to save 2,000 lives and hopefully set a trend for other hospitals in India.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Spread the word!!
