story:
IMPORTANT MESSAGE TO ALL BACKERS:

 

Dear Qurelife backers,

First of all, we sincerely apologize for the fact that there has been no communication with you recently about the progress of the project. That is not the way it supposed to be.

We offer a full refund to all dissatisfied backers.

Qurelife is not a "scam" but it has almost gone bankrupt in recent months, because committed investment has failed to materialize and deliveries to America proved difficult to realize. This was partly due to Corona, but also due to export regulations.

Backers from Europe who do not opt ​​for a refund can still receive the Qurelife suitcase, but this can still take a few months. We make no promise about the exact date because we do not know it yet.

We advise backers outside Europe to request a refund, as we expect deliveries to take place much later.

 

To request a refund, we ask you to do the following:

Forward the payment confirmation email that you received from Indiegogo, at the moment you supported the Qurelife project, to: info@qurelife.com. We can then make the refund via Paypal. Another refund method is currently not possible, we apologize for any inconvenience. We will make the refund to the email address you use to send us the forward mail. Refunds will be made within two weeks after we receive your e-mail.

It is unfortunate that we have not been able to ship the desired product on time, but can currently not help you better than in this way.

Sincerely,

The Qurelife team

 

QURELIFE®

Your Personal Drugstore in a Box

Designed in Switzerland, founded in the Netherlands; we developed a Self-Care System, Tailor-Made by You, so that you and your Loved Ones have the Best Help when needed.

Help Yourself, your Family and Friends

Get the Smart 'My Base Box' for the price of a regular First Aid Kit. You need one anyway, why not Choose the Best?

 

STAY ORGANIZED AND PREPARED

Get notifications when products expire

The Qurelife System shows you the products that you (already) own. For each product you will find your medication instructions within hand's reach. When products expire, we will notify you. Never miss out, when help is needed.

 

SMART DESIGN

Innovation that fits you

  • Water-resistant Design Case
  • Use your camera for Direct QR Access
  • Your medicines and manuals within Hand's reach

 

HOW DOES IT WORK?

We Help you to be prepared for a Healthy Life

  1. Start with your Basis Protection Plan,
  2. Select what extra Protection is important for you and your Family,
  3. Select products you already own and which products and medicines you want to add.

You now have your customized protection ready. You never miss out when Help is Needed.

 Qurelife only advises common A-Brand Self-Care products that you can also find at your local drugstore (products differ per country).

A Qurelife member will be directed to products at Discount Prices. But you don’t have to order anything via us, it’s up to you. No subscription fees, No obligations!

 

ADDING EXTRA PRODUCTS

To Prevent or to Cure, Always be Prepared

Organize products that will prepare you for unexpected conditions and possible diseases. You decide what your protection plan looks like. Here is a sample selection; - The Qurelife perks at Indiegogo don't contain drugs or medicines - 

 

COMPLETE

Much More than just first aid 

  • Prefilled with certified First Aid tools
  • Including Handy 'My Pill Box'
  • Including Free App and Qurelife account




 

Including retro tin Pill Box

SELECT YOUR STYLE

Because all people are different

  • The Personal Protection that fits You
  • Give one away, to Family or Friends
  • At your Home, in your Car and on Vacation
  • What is the color for you?

Pre-Filled with:

Retro Tin ‘My Pill Box’ 5,5x9cm 1
Adhesive tape 5 mtr x 2,5cm 1
Adhesive bandages 10x6cm 8
Finger plaster-elastic 4x7cm 4
Finger plaster-elastic 12x2cm 4
Plaster strips water resistant single packed 1.9x7.2cm 4
Plaster strips water resistant single packed 2.5X7.2cm 8
First aid dressings bandages, Sterile,Compress 6x8cm 2
First aid dressings bandages, Sterile,Compress 8x10cm 4
First aid dressings bandages, Sterile,Compress 10x12cm 2
Sterile Compress(Burn dressings) 60x40cm 2
Sterile Compress(Burn dressings) 60x80cm 2
Conforming Elastic bandages 6cmx400cm 4
Conforming Elastic bandages 8cmx400cm 3
First aid blanket 160cmx210cm 1
Sterile wound compress 10x10cm 2/bag 6
Triangular bandages 136x96x96 2
Scissor 14.5cm 1
Disposable gloves   4
Wet wipe for cleaning skin   2
Mouth Mask   2
Pair of pincers   1
Disinfectant gel   1
Content list   1
First aid kit manual
 		   1

 

TEAM AND STATUS

Qurelife was founded in the Netherlands in 2019 by Bauke Bokma, who was frustrated that he did not always have the right self-care products with him and therefore could not always help himself or others.

Either the medicines were out of date, or he just didn't have the right items in house, while some drawers were overflowing with certain bandages. 

An IT platform, where you can make the right choice in advance to be prepared for the future, was the outcome. Development started in June 2019, with a team of professionals; A combination of IT specialists and pharmacists.

The basis of self-care is first aid. Most first aid kits on the market are so old-fashioned and unattractive that Bauke also decided to make a nicely designed kit; ‘My Base Box’.

The Qurelife selfcare platform will be open from July 2021.

My Base Box, quality control in the Netherlands:

TEAM AND STATUS

Qurelife was founded in the Netherlands in 2019 by Bauke Bokma, who was frustrated that he did not always have the right self-care products with him and therefore could not always help himself or others.
Either the medicines were out of date, or he just didn't have the right items in house, while some drawers were overflowing with certain bandages. 
An IT platform, where you can make the right choice in advance to be prepared for the future, was the outcome. Development started in June 2019, with a team of professionals; A combination of IT specialists and pharmacists.
The basis of self-care is first aid. Most first aid kits on the market are so old-fashioned and unattractive that Bauke also decided to make a nicely designed kit; ‘My Base Box’.
The Qurelife selfcare platform will be open from July 2021.
My Base Box, quality control in the Netherlands:

story:
Short Summary

Obesity: A Pandemic is a book that discusses the obesity crisis in the west, specifically the historical circumstances surrounding it, its current affects on our society today along with its causes, various myths surrounding obesity.

My name is Akash Raju and I am the author of Obesity: A Pandemic. I wrote this book because I wanted to educate readers on the reality of the obesity crisis in the U.S from a holistic perspective so that they may use what they learned to make informed decisions on how they can contribute to stop the crisis or even simply make a healthier change in their own lifestyles.

My hope is that, in reading this book, you will discover the pervasive impact obesity has on our society that is often overlooked. I want you to see this book as an opportunity to understand the personal experiences people have with obesity and how this human aspect intersects with the structural affects of obesity on the country.

You will love this book if you are dealing with obesity or know someone who is and wants to overcome it, interested in how our healthcare problems in the U.S and obesity are related, or are looking to make a difference in promoting a healthier and happier America.

Obesity: A Pandemic speaks to every day people looking to live healthier lifestyles and people involved in the medical field who want to grapple with how obesity raises healthcare costs and worsens quality of life.

Ultimately, I hope that Obesity: A Pandemic inspires reflection and fruitful dialogue, pressing into engaging questions like:

  • What are the different aspects of a person’s life that obesity affects and how?
  • How have historical circumstances shaped obesity in the modern day U.S?
  • Moving forward, what are effective strategies we can use to reduce obesity on a community basis?

I look forward to exploring these questions and beyond with my readers. I believe discussing the more human aspect of the obesity crisis alongside its structural affects will change us all for the better.

What We Need & What You Get

This book will be published with New Degree Press. I set up the pre-order tiers to help cover the costs for publishing my book. Money raised will go towards the following:

  • The editor I will work with to revise and publish my manuscript in April , 2021
  • The cover design of my book. (The mockups you see currently are a placeholder!)
  • The layout design for the interior of my book (physical copy, ebook formats).
  • The copy editing for my book to polish the grammar and spelling prior to publication.
  • The launch & promotion efforts for my book when I ultimately publish this Spring of 2021
  • When I pre-sell 120 copies of my book, I will publish a paperback and ebook. When I pre-sell 150 copies of my book, I will also publish a hardcover edition. When I pre-sell 200 copies of my book, I will publish a hardcover and an audiobook.

I am also offering some exclusive rewards for people who pre-order my book now:

  • You will receive a personally signed copy of my book when I publish.
  • Your name will appear in the Acknowledgments section of my book.
  • You will receive early access to the Author’s Note and other excerpts from my book, with the opportunity to review it and give me early feedback.
  • You will have the opportunity to be involved in selecting my cover and title.
  • You will be invited to join my Author Community and get behind-the-scenes sneak peeks into the publishing process.

And much more!

 

Risks & Challenges

The biggest challenge with publishing a book is delivering the finished book to the backer, specifically my mailing of the book to you. I have eliminated this risk by including the cost of mailing and shipping the signed copies into each pre-order tier.

The risk of delivering the pre-sale copies of my book is contingent on the publisher we use. I will be working closely with New Degree Press to make sure we ship the pre-order rewards to you as early as possible. We will keep all pre-sale backers up-to-date as to when my book will publish. You will know when the copies of my book you pre-ordered are expected to ship.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

Please share my pre-sale campaign on Facebook, Twitter, and LinkedIn with your friends, family and network. Please use #ObesityAPandemic and tag me as well as my publisher, New Degree Press, so we can help amplify your efforts.

You can easily share my Pre-Sale Campaign Page via Indiegogo at the top of the page.

Please share my book with 5 friends, family members, or co-workers who you think would enjoy it via text or direct message on social media.

Thank you so much for of all of your love and support!

Thanks again,
Akash Raju

story:
Wedding Registry

We have forgone the traditional household-item wedding registry as I think our kitchen and apartment already have all the basic items.

Instead, we have setup two alternative suggestions: One for our graduate school loan (found here) and this page for our honeymoon.

As an option, we would love any size gift to help us with a honeymoon. We're drafting a few different routes for the honeymoon depending on how much "gas money" we receive.

story:
Erika Cortez, my cousin who lives in Panama, is already blind in one eye from previous medical complications and risks loosing vision in the one eye she does have vision without an essential macula operation. Her vision is already blurring, and she has to have the surgery soon. Nobody should have to go blind when there is an available medical procedure to treat for it.

This a translation of Erika's situation as told by her:

“When I was 17 the retina in my right eye started to detach, and I had surgery shortly afterwards in Panama. The surgery was a success, however, as time passed, I lost my vision in my right eye.

Now, 20 years later, the retina in my left eye is detaching due to holes in my macula. The macula is part of the retina and assists in seeing the sharpness of what you’re trying to see.

I had surgery last year and everything went well; I could see normally from my left eye. They (the doctors) put a drop of silicon oil in my left eye and treated my macula with laser surgery for both of my eyes, All in all, they had treated for some of my short-sightedness. Before, I had a myopia (short-sightedness) rating of -29, but with the surgery I am now at -12. The doctors also operated on a cataract I had in the same left eye.

The doctors helped me with various aspects of my only eye, and I’ve already had four things operated on to salvage the little sight I have left. I left being able to see again right after the operation.

Well, eight months have passed, and I’m having the same problem once again and lack the eye sharpness to see things well. My vision is very blurry which indicates to me that my macula is giving me problems. If I’m focusing on something, it is also difficult to see anything around that object.

I have to undergo another operation since the silicone that was previously there has to be removed to operate on my macula. It’s very inconvenient not being able to see and have the sharpness and exactitude of things. It is necessary to take a lot of care for my health and eyes.”

So please, any donation would be appreciated in aiding Erika pay for her eye surgery. She is a very close family member of mine and the Cook-Gallardo family, and I would be forever in your debt if you were to make a donation. Healthcare in Panama does not cover the costs of the surgery, and it is again my belief that no one should have to live with an ailment there is a cure for.

story:
The Story

Help me raise 1000$ for the Childhood Obesity Foundation. On May 27th, I will be running the half marathon in the Ottawa Race Weekend, in honour of all those who donated, and all those who will benefit from your generosity.


The Impact

Many of us are fortunate enough to include exercise and healthy eating in our daily routine. Unfortunately, a growing number of Canadians lack the education and resources required to lead healthy life. Your donations will help the Childhood Obesity Foundation "identify, evaluate and promote best practices in healthy nutrition and physical activity to reduce the prevalence of childhood obesity" (source: http://www.childhoodobesityfoundation.ca/ourStory). Help make a difference in Canada!


What You Can Do & What You Get

My goal is to raise 1000$ by May 27th - the funds will be donated directly to the Childhood Obesity Foundation, following the race.

All generous donators will have their names printed on the tshirt I will be wearing to run the half-marathon. Additionally, whoever donates the most will be the lucky winner of a homestyle, clean, 3 course meal prepared by yours truly.


Other Ways You Can Help

Spread the word to friends and family! Every little bit helps. The more people we can involve in this campaign, the more positive impact we can generate. Be loud and be proud!

story:
You’ve read the news! You’ve seen the videos! Mystic River Rugby 7s has been to the final of every Northeast Qualifier tournament this summer and has qualified for the USA Rugby National Sweet 16 in Des Moines, Iowa. Our players have passion and heart not only for rugby but especially for the Mystic River Rugby Nation they represent. With this year's Sweet 16 located in Iowa, the cost of travel is extremely high, but with your help we can do Mystic Nation proud in the mid-west!

We are calling for each and every member of our Mystic River family to help us. Donate $5, $10, $15, $20 or as much as you can. Please do it today so we can plan our trip. You donation will go towards some of the following expenses: 

  • $5 will buy breakfast for one player; $150 will pay for 30 
  • $10 will buy lunch for one player; $300 donations will pay for 30 
  • $15 will buy 10 cases of bottled water
  • $20 will buy dinner for one player; $600 will pay for 30 
  • $150 will pay for lodging for one player
  • $500 will pay for one player's flight

Become a part of this fantastic journey. Let’s help our players focus on a game plan and not on how to finance their efforts.

Your support and a running total of our fundraising campaign will be tracked via this Indiegogo page.

#GOBLUE

story:
Please watch our video!!  And don't forget to "like" us or share our video using the links above! 

  My name is David Wandke and in August of this year I was diagnosed with Stage 4 kidney/ureter cancer that's very aggressive. The grapefruit sized tumor is wrapped around my left kidney artery and vein so it is inoperable until shrunken by chemotherapy.

I've survived 14 weeks of hard chemo so far, but it knocks me down to a broken and beaten man; very weak, unable to eat or drink, and vomiting. I have lost over 50 pounds and all of my strength, but through the love and prayers of family and friends I am still confident I can beat this cancer!

 

Unfortunately we have other health issues in our family so medical bills are piling up. My wife of 35 years has chronic hip pain, osteoarthritis,  and the start of rheumatoid arthritis. Our 19 year old has endometriosis. She had surgery to remove the tumor in June,  and now needs a monthly shot that costs $1,000.00 per shot!!! 

We have been making a living with both of us working at our small plumbing shop for 15 years. We live in a simple 1,000 sq foot log cabin on the Peshtigo River that used to be my wife's grandparents cabin. We are very frugal in our own lives and charitable to others.

 WE NEVER WERE ABLE TO SAVE FOR RETIREMENT OR START AN IRA SO THERE'S NO BACK UP TO DRAW FROM.

Whenever I feel down from chemo, my mantra is "Jesus, I trust in You" We have been faithful servants of God and have been giving of our time and money to others our entire adult lives instead of spending money on ourselves. 

We are humbled by the continual support from all of you.  It is only with your support that we are paying our mortgage, electricity, and groceries.  We are not sure why this has happened to us, but ALL the love shown upon us at this time brings us to tears. And the power of prayer and positivity is evident!

THANK YOU FOR CONSIDERING HELPING US WITH OUR FINANCIAL STRUGGLES. IF YOU CANNOT HELP US THAT WAY, WOULD YOU PLEASE PRAY FOR US??  WE NEED HOPE, STRENGTH AND COURAGE TO GET THROUGH THIS AND WE KNOW THAT PRAYER CHANGES THINGS.

 

We decided to create this website for people to help us with our finances other than from our family, friends and local community who have been doing so much already. We would love to raise more than we need and PAY IT FORWARD!!! We are normally givers, not getters!

If you are interested in the details of our journey, you can find out more at

www.caringbridge.org/visit/davidwandke

story:
You can help beat Cancer!   You and I  can help to create a win win win situation for my illness and help hundreds of thousands of those with all types of Cancer.

 

This is what I and my campaign are all about.

 

I am a professional photographer living in Florida,  I was diagnosed with Colon Cancer  and have started both Chemo and Radiation therapy.  My prognosis is good, but the heavy financial stress is tremendous.  I do have insurance,  but it only covers about 90% of treatment costs , plus the time off from work makes it even more difficult to win this battle on all fronts.

 

Here is what I propose,  with your financial donation I can do 3 things for a win win win situation

                 1. Half of the donation will help me with medical payments,

                     co-pays,out of pocket medical fees,  drugs, lost wages, 

                     transportation to treatments etc.

                

                2.  The other half of your donation will go to the American     .                    

                      Cancer  Society to aid them in research and cure.

                

                3.  For your donation of $25.00 or more,  I will ship to you

                      one of a limited collection,  signed and numbered fine art 

                     image of mine  that was taken  on Safaris in Africa or on tour 

                     in the  USA.  You will feel good about helping me and     

                     thousands of others with Cancer,   and you'll get to enjoy a 

                     great piece of art that my passion and soul created

 

My tentative goal is $9000,  but if your generousity exceeds this expectation

I will continue to fulfill the offered perks and send money to the American Cancer Society.  At the point where all of my expenses are met I will send every dollar after photo costs to the American Cancer Society.

 

Any donation is welcome even $5 or $10  and I will send half to ACS

 

Perks delivery date required a specific date however I will ship out your perk upon receipt of your donation.  I will pay shipping costs as well.

 

Please spread the word,  I appreciate your help in my situation and your help in aiding others

 

 Thank you
Mark Bretschneider

story:
Peggy Abel's story..

 

Peggy is a widowed mother of 9 children, 3 of which are living at home, 1 son serving a LDS mission in Colorado.  She is a grandma of 8, a daughter, sister, and a dear friend.  

I am Peggy's youngest brother, Jason Meyer and on behalf of our family we are raising funds for her living/medical demands.

After a 35 day medical stay Peggy finally came home Sunday Aug 5.  A team of doctor's worked feverishly to save her left kindney.  Time is of the essence and the therapy is time sensitive.  We hope for positive results as we wait for the therapy to work.  Peggy is slowly improving and has a ways to go.

Insurage coverage red tape and high presrciption cost are amoung some of the hurdles the family is faced with.

Please help our family to meet necessary living expenses and ongoing medical expense demands.  

If you can't contribute financially, your prayers, and love are most appreciated.

Thank you for your kindness and support.

Very Truly,

 

The Family of Peggy Abel

story:
Hello,

My name is Joshua Wheaton. I am a Navy Veteran who joined 2 weeks after 9/11 and served four years on the submarine force. I have been having trouble finding work in my field (electronics), and the part time work I have is not paying the bills. On top of that, I have no health or dental insurance through that job, and am having trouble with several of my teeth. I was able to get xrays done before my insurance ran out on my last job, and have 6 teeth that need care. They are starting to hurt pretty bad to the point of disrupting sleep, and I can't fathom going any longer. I don't know how many will need to be filled and how many might need root canals.

This is why I am reaching out to you. Anything you could give would be a tremendous help. I am working diligently to get back into a position that utilizes my electrical skills, but am limited in geographic area due to family situation. Your donation can help keep me on track to my goals of becoming a more productive member of society.

I have thought about government assistance, but generally am against that sort of thing. I would rather ask for volunteers who can decide for themselves whether they have the means and the will to help, rather than rely on a nonvoluntary system of wealth transfer. Any additional donated funds may help me to relocate for the right job opportunity.

Thank you for your consideration.

story:
Donna is well known in the Kelowna arts community for running a group studio, My Studio at the Rotary Centre for the Arts. Through this studio she leads Camp Create, a summer kids camp as well as other community events.

In June 2014, during her preparation for Camp Create, she was diagnosed with a rare and aggressive form of Breast Cancer. Unfortunately, it was discovered that the Cancer has spread beyond her breast and will require a year of intensive chemotherapy and radiation before surgery can be attempted.

Due to this diagnosis, and the aggressive treatment required, she is unable to continue working. Donna has applied for all available assistance, however, this won’t be enough to effectively sustain her while she battles this advanced illness.

Our goal is to raise $1000, a small amount  to supplement medication and living expenses for the next few months when her course of treatment will be re-assessed. During this time, she will need to focus her strength and energy on healing.

Please help us reach this goal and get Donna back to her valued place as a leader in the Kelowna arts community so she can continue to give back.

story:
It's time to start living your life....UNTAMED...


We set out to create sunglasses that would inspire. We are all passionate about something, and at Savage Sunwear we encourage you to pursue your passions.

Whatever drives you, go after it! Keep moving forward and never settle. 

We look forward to seeing where you take us!



Why Carbon Fiber?

Carbon Fiber is a unique material, in that it is amazingly durable and yet so incredibly lightweight.



Savage Sunwear Wayfarer is a full-framed carbon fiber wayfarer, unlike other wayfarers on the market that only use carbon fiber for the temples, making these some of the lightest sunglasses in the world.  

Superior to what is currently offered on the market, these sunglasses are tailor-made for people on the go. They weigh a total of 20 grams, which is less than half the weight of the classic wayfarer.
 
Carbon Fiber is used extensively by the military due to its extraordinary strength to weight ratio. Carbon Fiber can be found in nearly all aspects of military equipment, including the F-22 Raptor, Blackhawks, body armor, and countless other applications.


The high-end luxury car market has also found carbon fiber to be the ideal material for single body frame design. Carbon fiber is able to maintain immense strength and rigidity while coming in at fraction of the weight.

Why UV400 Lens?

Our wayfarers use TAC polarized lens with seven layers of protection.



We put our lenses through rigorous testing to make sure they will live up to what you need. We use a one ounce steel ball and drop it from a height of no less than 50 inches, directly onto the lens. This test ensures that our lenses will not shatter, guaranteeing you a stronger lens.       

Our polarized lenses block 100% of harmful UV light, and come with an anti-shatter and anti-scratch, protective coating.

Our lenses will filter the light, allowing a more vibrant color spectrum. This gives your eyes a clearer and more crisp view of the world around you.


Throughout the day, sunlight is reflected off of things all around us. As a result, you experience an annoying and potentially harmful intensity of light, often referred to as glare. The polarized layer of our lenses, removes this glare and reduces the strain on your eyes.


Lens Options

Our wayfarers come with two lens options; a classic mirrored lens with medium tint or standard lens with a dark tint.  
                



We are almost done! After countless hours of creating and testing prototypes, we are turning to you for help, to raise the funds we need. The startup capital will cover the costs of mass production, marketing, and distributing Savage Sunwear Carbon Fiber Wayfarer sunglasses. We aim to revolutionize the wayfarer market by stepping up the quality of the product. Your contributions will help get this product off the ground and inspire people to take a chance and pursue their dreams!

Thank you!


FAQ

What is Carbon Fiber?

  • Carbon fiber is composed of carbon atoms bonded together to form a long chain. The fibers are extremely stiff, strong, and light, and are used in many processes to create excellent building materials.
Don't take our word for it, watch the video below for The Science Channel's explanation.


When will I get my Carbon Fiber Wayfarers?

  • We are planning to begin shipping in July 2016.

How do I choose my lens color?

  • You can write in the comments after your contribute which color you would like.

What is the retail price?

  • The retail price is $180.00.

Can I get my Carbon Fiber Wayfarers with prescription lenses?

  • Unfortunately, we are unable to deliver prescription lenses at this time.


  Instagram              Snapchat

story:
Click here to visit our e-shop!

Swap your plastic toothbrush for the Brush It On compostable one and make a better choice for yourself and our planet. Our goal is to offer a sustainable alternative to an everyday product while increasing our impact by supporting renowned environmental organisations that actively protect our oceans, forests, and animals.

Vote with your wallet and inspire others to make purchases that have a positive impact on our environment.

Don't brush it off anymore

In Australia alone, toothbrushes amount to approximately 1,000 tonnes of landfill each year. Plastic toothbrushes aren’t biodegradable and they just keep piling up and contaminate our environment. Not to even mention their packaging! Let’s not brush this off anymore, there is an alternative: Brush It On.

Brush It On

Every single bamboo toothbrush you buy directly supports a conservation project of your choice. We take the war on plastic seriously and that’s why 100% of our profits go directly to specific environmental projects. Switch out your plastic toothbrush to our bamboo one and make a positive impact on the environment by simply brushing your teeth every day!

Taking Action

To get started, we need your help to order 2,000 toothbrushes. In the process, we can help:

Buy 4 acres of rainforest to create permanently protected nature reserves across the world
Distribute 166 "living plastic-free" packs to raise awareness around plastic pollution
Give 44 rescued bears vital medication to help keep them healthy and strong on the road to recovery


We carefully selected our partners based on their reputation and hands-on approach to ensure our funds are directed to causes that have the most impact. We'll be releasing more information on the impact we're collectively making throughout the campaign.

Meet Our Heroes

Let us introduce you to the three heroes that are helping us on our mission to reduce plastic waste. They not only create good in the world but will also look great in your bathroom:

Our oceans need your help! Plastic rubbish is predicted to outweigh fish in our oceans by 2050. Nemo was designed to help The Australian Marine Conservation Society on their mission to keep the world’s oceans clean. 

Each Nemo toothbrush contributes to their programs focused on keeping our oceans in their healthiest and most natural state, without pressures from overfishing and pollution. Every four bamboo toothbrushes help distribute a living plastic-free pack to raise awareness around plastic pollution.

Nemo was designed by Abbey Rich, a multidisciplinary artist working across canvas, walls, paper and the body. Based in Melbourne, once running a clothing label now painting murals, running screen printing workshops, hand poking tattoos and drawing incessantly.


Choose "Oceans" cause in the check-out process to help raise awareness around plastic pollution!

Did you know 4,500 acres of forests are cleared across the planet every hour? Tarzan is here to support World Land Trust in protecting threatened habitats and wildlife.

Every single Tarzan toothbrush contributes to the "Buy an Acre" programme and helps buy 23m2 of rainforest to create permanently protected nature reserves across the globe. World Land Trust works with partner organisations across the world to help fund land purchase and create nature reserves.

Samuel Humphreys, Tarzan's creator, specialises in drawing imaginative illustrations that are guided by unrestricted thought. The subject matter he holds dearest is fundamental to our existence - the natural world.


Choose "Forests" cause in the check-out process to help create more nature reserves!

Animals living on this planet are in serious danger. 150-200 species become extinct every 24 hours! Lassie's aim is to help World Animal Protection on their mission to protect animals across the world.

Each Lassie toothbrush helps free bears from captivity and support bear sanctuaries. Every fifteen brushes provide a rescued bear with vital medication to help keep them healthy and strong on the road to recovery.

Lassie was designed by Marc Allante who is renowned for merging traditional Chinese inks with European painting techniques in a contemporary style that reflects the fusion of his Chinese-French ancestry and brings it into a modern context.


Choose "Animals" cause in the check-out process to provide rescued bears with medication!


Our Bamboo Toothbrushes

Better for you. Better for the environment.

All our brushes are built from high-quality sustainable bamboo. Their handles are ergonomically designed for a good grip and fully compostable at the same time. The soft gentle bristles are made of durable Nylon 6. Our eco-friendly packaging is as minimalist as possible, without any marketing bells and whistles.

Shipping

  • FREE delivery Australia wide
  • Additional charges for worldwide shipping - please see in perk details
  • Shipped via regular post to reduce our carbon footprint
  • As we grow, we plan to set up a distribution centre in the USA and Europe to minimise the impact of shipping

Packaging

We're still in the process of finalising our packaging. Rest assured, we're looking for the most minimalist and eco-friendly options the manufacturer can offer. At this stage, all toothbrushes will come individually packed. In the long term, we'll have different packages available to reduce the amount of material used.

Bristles

Our bristles are made of durable Nylon 6. Please break off the bristle head or remove the bristles with pliers before composting the handle. Although plant-based bristles are being currently worked on, they are much softer and only last for a few weeks. While we continue our search for compostable bristle solutions, we believe a durable toothbrush with long-wearing bristles is a more sustainable option at this point. By supporting our project, you're helping us in our quest to find a better bristle option for you and the planet.

Kids toothbrush

For the purpose of this campaign, we only offer our Lassie toothbrush in the kids size. Moving forward, we're planning to have all designs available in both sizes. Please choose "Animals" cause, and "Kids" size in the check-out process.

Next steps

We plan to set up an e-shop by March 2019 to offer you a subscription plan, so that you never have to think about buying a toothbrush again. We'll keep you posted once this option is available.

Why Bamboo

A bamboo toothbrush eliminates unnecessary waste while giving you the same quality of cleaning that a plastic brush can offer. Bamboo is naturally antimicrobial and its properties kill bacteria that penetrate it’s surface, providing long-lasting protection against harmful bacteria.

Our toothbrushes are sustainably sourced from the Zhengjiang province in China. They're made of MOSO bamboo, which is a type that Giant Panda don't like. Bamboo is the fastest growing plant on Earth and regenerates itself naturally without the need for harmful pesticides.




The idea came from a desire to protect this planet for future generations. When Viv was pregnant with her now 3-month old baby girl, she learnt there is meant to be more plastic than fish in our oceans by 2050. She got quite upset about that prospect and decided she wanted to take an active part in saving our planet. 

Viv reached out to Alice and together they created Brush It On to help people make conscious choices without sacrificing their lifestyle. Together, they aim to bring more awareness to the plastic pollution issue we face today.
 


Future Vision

This is just the beginning of our journey to help save the planet for future generations. We want to make bamboo toothbrushes mainstream. We plan to get them into the shops and supermarkets to make them easily available and more affordable. We'll bring you new fresh designs each year and will work further on more sustainable bristle options and packaging.

Special Thank You

We'd like to thank everyone who significantly helped our project and believed in us and our vision enough that they dedicated their own time and effort to it:

- Marc Allante for designing Lassie

- Abbey Rich for creating Nemo

- Samuel Humphreys for bringing Tarzan into life

- 4me.video for helping us with our campaign video

- The Studio LTD for helping us spread the word

- Michal & Adam for supporting us along the way

If you like our project please choose one of the perks to help us make this world a better place! If you are unable to support the idea right now but still want to help, please share it with the world!

THANK YOU!

story:
Short Summary

This summer, Sand for Life Solutions  will begin training Ghanaian villagers in Tordzenu and Dorkplorame to produce biosand filters.  The money you contribute will go directly to producing biosand filter and providing the villagers with the gift of clean water. Each $4 donation has the power to save one person's life.  

I was inspired to do something about waterborne disease when I contracted dysentery while traveling last summer. The experience sparked a revolution in how I thought about water and inspired me to do something to help the nearly 800 million people around the world without access to clean water.

This past fall, I found out how to do exactly that.  I would train individuals in rural areas to produce biosand filters.  The simple, effective technology involves tightly packing sand and gravel into a concrete prism. As water goes through the sand, pathogens run out of nutrients or are consumed by larger, more beneficial microbes.  The end result is what that is visibly clear and undoubtedly cleaner.  Ultimately, a biosand filter can eliminate up to 99% of pathogens in water without electricity.   

After traveling to the villages of Tordzenu and Dorkplorame in Ghana, I decided to create Sand for Life Solutions, an organization dedicated to training Ghanaians from these villages to produce biosand filters.  

What We Need & What You Get

We need $5,000 to produce 125 biosand filters to provide water clean water to 1,250 Ghanaians.  Each filter costs $40, which goes towards purchasing sand, gravel, cement, piping from the area surrounding the villages and to pay workers in the villages.


Here's what you get for donating:

For a $4 donation, you'll get a shout out on our Facebook page.

For a $20 donation, we'll send you a "water = life" wristband from the villages in Ghana and a picture from the villages.

For a $40 donation, you can put your own message on one biosand filter and will receive a picture of the filter with the message. 

For a $100 donation, you get your own message on a biosand filter + a personalized video from Ghana. 

For a $500 donation, you get your own message on a biosand filter + a personalized video from Ghana + a spot on our website as one of our major donors.

Also, know that even if we don't reach our entire goal, your donation will still go to the production of biosand filters.

The Impact

Like millions around the world, the 6,500 inhabitants of Tordzenu and Dorkplorame do not have access to clean, drinkable water.  This forces villagers to drink contaminated water and places them at high risk of contracting waterborne disease, the primary cause of disease and death in the area. The villagers also have limited options to fight waterborne disease.  The water underneath the villages is very saline, so well water is undrinkable.  The villagers are very spread out, so a single, centralized filter is less efficient and effective than smaller biosand filters.

If we meet our crowdfunding goal of $5000, we will be able to produce 125 filters and provide clean water to 1,250 people.  This in addition to donations from other sources will allow us to help roughly a fourth of the villagers.  While this accounts for only a fraction of the villagers, meeting our goal would mark a sizable first step towards ensuring every person in Tordzenu and Dorkplorame has access to clean, drinkable water and significantly reduce the prevalence of waterborne disease in the area.  The bottom line is that your donation will save lives.

Other Ways You Can Help

Contributing is not the only way to get involved! Help us get the word out! Tell your friends, use the Indiegogo share tools to spread the word, sign up for Sand for Life Solutions updates by emailing sandforlifesolutions@gmail.com.
story_txt: Short SummaryThis summer, Sand for Life Solutions  will begin training Ghanaian villagers in Tordzenu and Dorkplorame to produce biosand filters.  The money you contribute will go directly to producing biosand filter and providing the villagers with the gift of clean water. Each $4 donation has the power to save one person's life.  I was inspired to do something about waterborne disease when I contracted dysentery while traveling last summer. The experience sparked a revolution in how I thought about water and inspired me to do something to help the nearly 800 million people around the world without access to clean water.This past fall, I found out how to do exactly that.  I would train individuals in rural areas to produce biosand filters.  The simple, effective technology involves tightly packing sand and gravel into a concrete prism. As water goes through the sand, pathogens run out of nutrients or are consumed by larger, more beneficial microbes.  The end result is what that is visibly clear and undoubtedly cleaner.  Ultimately, a biosand filter can eliminate up to 99% of pathogens in water without electricity.   After traveling to the villages of Tordzenu and Dorkplorame in Ghana, I decided to create Sand for Life Solutions, an organization dedicated to training Ghanaians from these villages to produce biosand filters.  What We Need & What You GetWe need $5,000 to produce 125 biosand filters to provide water clean water to 1,250 Ghanaians.  Each filter costs $40, which goes towards purchasing sand, gravel, cement, piping from the area surrounding the villages and to pay workers in the villages.Here's what you get for donating:For a $4 donation, you'll get a shout out on our Facebook page.For a $20 donation, we'll send you a "water = life" wristband from the villages in Ghana and a picture from the villages.For a $40 donation, you can put your own message on one biosand filter and will receive a picture of the filter with the message. For a $100 donation, you get your own message on a biosand filter + a personalized video from Ghana. For a $500 donation, you get your own message on a biosand filter + a personalized video from Ghana + a spot on our website as one of our major donors.Also, know that even if we don't reach our entire goal, your donation will still go to the production of biosand filters.The ImpactLike millions around the world, the 6,500 inhabitants of Tordzenu and Dorkplorame do not have access to clean, drinkable water.  This forces villagers to drink contaminated water and places them at high risk of contracting waterborne disease, the primary cause of disease and death in the area. The villagers also have limited options to fight waterborne disease.  The water underneath the villages is very saline, so well water is undrinkable.  The villagers are very spread out, so a single, centralized filter is less efficient and effective than smaller biosand filters.If we meet our crowdfunding goal of $5000, we will be able to produce 125 filters and provide clean water to 1,250 people.  This in addition to donations from other sources will allow us to help roughly a fourth of the villagers.  While this accounts for only a fraction of the villagers, meeting our goal would mark a sizable first step towards ensuring every person in Tordzenu and Dorkplorame has access to clean, drinkable water and significantly reduce the prevalence of waterborne disease in the area.  The bottom line is that your donation will save lives.Other Ways You Can HelpContributing is not the only way to get involved! Help us get the word out! Tell your friends, use the Indiegogo share tools to spread the word, sign up for Sand for Life Solutions updates by emailing sandforlifesolutions@gmail.com.

story:
Reaching Out & Bringing Relief

One Path Outreach is a humanitarian relief program that seeks support to provide health care, education, and basic necessities to remote villages of Eastern Tibet. We seek to provide immediate relief through voluntary clinical care and basic supplies while helping promote long-term improvement by collaborating with local communities to create systemic change.

One Path Outreach believes all beings should have access to adequate health care, education, and basic necessities. We believe that all people share “one path” and that is the desire to live in health, happiness, and harmony.

How You Can Help

It is our goal to raise $50,000. The majority raised will cover supplies to directly address immediate needs in the region as well as to cover the operating expenses of mobilizing our all-volunteer staff of medical professionals. 

Your donation is tax-deductible. Our partner, The Dzogchen Shri Singha Foundation, is a 501(c)(3) non-profit organization, and is helping to manage the distribution of funds, so your donation is fully tax-deductible. 

In-kind donations such as travel and accommodation expenses and medical and non-medical supplies are also graciously accepted. To inquire about making this type of donation, please contact us.

We are also accepting medical professionals and other volunteers to join us on our inaugural mission. All volunteer services and administration are completely pro bono. 

Together We Can Make A Difference

Our current project is a medical mission to the Dzogchen Area in Kham, Tibet, in the western part of the Sichuan Province of China. Our goal is to provide mobile clinics offering basic medical examinations, dental care, vision care, woman’s health, and health education. There is a great need for the most basic care and supplies, and your support is instrumental to providing these.

One Person Makes A Great Impact

Your contribution is valuable and much appreciated. Whether it's in the form of donations, volunteer services, or spreading the word, your participation is essential to bringing immediate relief to people geographically isolated from some of the necessities for basic health.

Challenges

Time is of the essence. We have team members now in the region evaluating current needs. Once we have some of these needs prioritized, we will be able to provide more details on the resources required. In the meantime, we need to raise the financial resources that will allow us to meet those needs as soon as possible. We hope to complete our first mission in late August of 2015.   

Other Ways You Can Help

You can help us spread the word and share our campaign on social media. The more awareness we raise, the more resources we can gather to reach our goals.

Thank You!

story:
The Wild Hunt's 2015 Fall Funding Drive

We are now in the 11th year of The Wild Hunt!

Wow. Let that sink in for a minute.

What began as an experiment has slowly but steadily grown into one of the most widely-read news magazines for modern Pagans, Witches, Polytheists, Heathens and Earth-based practitioners in the world.

For our 2015 Fall Fund Drive, we're asking for a base budget of $15,000 dollars to run for another year, and we're hoping that you will help us not only meet this goal, but surpass it and do even more. 

“When I started The Wild Hunt in 2004, it was with the dream I could one day wake up, check on the news relating to my religious community, and then go about my day. Now, that dream has come true, and in manifest ways I could scarcely dream possible back then. I hope you'll support this campaign, and give your resounding vote of confidence so that The Wild Hunt's mission may continue. I know I will." 
-Jason Thomas Pitzl, Founder

The more we raise, the more we can do. Want to see more regular columnists? We have welcomed  3 new columnists  in the past year due to your generosity, and would like to add more in 2016. Want to see more weekly writers? With your help, we can expand our team. Want to kick down a couple bucks in appreciation for what we’ve managed to do this year? Please do. We need you.

This year's Fall Fund Drive is a celebration of past achievements and a commitment to the future growth of The Wild Hunt. Last year, Jason passed the duties of Managing Editor to the sturdy shoulders of Heather Greene, who has sustained the original vision of excellence that The Wild Hunt has come to represent, and has expanded that vision to include more reporters, innovative topics, and increased readership.

“When I retired from active involvement in The Wild Hunt a year ago, I placed great faith in incoming Managing Editor Heather Greene to shepherd the site through a very important phase of a media outlet's life: the transition from founder to a new generation of leadership. I am pleased, but not surprised, to know that Heather's leadership and vision have led what started out as a simple links-blog to ever-greater achievements and heights. She not only understands the spirit of what I was trying to do, she too shares my passion for creating robust, responsive journalism for our interconnected communities.” - Jason Thomas Pitzl

We would love it if you’d join the pack.

“Since taking over in October 2014, I have enjoyed the challenges and rewards of serving the community as editor of The Wild Hunt. I’m pleased at the progress we’ve made so far in becoming our own legal corporation operating as a nonprofit through Independent Arts & Media. Next year, I hope to continue our growth by developing more opportunities for increased content, hosting a greater diversity of voices as guest writers and strengthening our business structure for long-term sustainability.” - Heather Greene, Managing Editor

What We Need & What You Get

$15,000 dollars will allow us to pay our hosting bills for another year, compensate our writers, and cover other expenses related to running the news service. Thanks to fiscal oversight from Independent Arts & Media, all of your donations will be tax deductible.

If you gave last year, please consider giving again this year and maybe even boosting your donation amount by a couple dollars if possible. A small boost can do a whole lot.

100% of our budget goes back into The Wild Hunt. It works like this:
65% pays our writers
20% covers our fiscal management and annual business costs
15% covers our technology needs

That’s it. No frills, no corporate games. Simple, honest, and direct service to our community, with modest compensation and cost. That is our model, and our commitment.

The Impact

Pagans, Witches, Polytheists, Heathens, and other Earth-based practitioners need a reliable place to go for news, as evidenced by our stats:

Over 45,000 Facebook Followers

Over 17,000 Twitter & Tumblr Followers

Average unique daily site hit rate of 5,000, with some days as high as 10,000.

In 2016, we will likely achieve as many as 15,000 unique visits some days, if we keep up our current pace.

Real people. Real news. Researched, independent, and reliable. We are helping Pagans, Witches, Polytheists, Heathens and Earth-based practitioners far and wide learn, connect, and make history. The Wild Hunt is more than a news service, it’s a record of our collective histories and a public demonstration that our communities are making a difference and shaping the world.

Other Ways You Can Help

Steal this status! Please share this campaign on Facebook, on Twitter, on Tumblr, other social media, and on your favorite email list. Let them know that this is important to you. The more people speak up, the better we will do!

story:
INTRODUCTION:

  • La fidélisation de la clientèle est devenue une véritable priorité pour les entreprises ! 
  • Fidéliser l'achat local et augmenter la visibilité des commerces, avec Fidélité Boomerang Inc.
  • Une carte par commerçant mais, valide dans plusieurs commerces ! 
  • Une solution abordable !
  • Un des programmes le plus généreux pour les consommateurs !
Afin de faire profiter de la puissance de cet outil a un plus grand nombre de commerces, ainsi qu'aux consommateurs et poursuivre notre développement*. Fidélité Boomerang vous propose de contribuer à notre plateforme tout en donnant a un organisme de bienfaisance, voir les détails des contreparties à droite de l'écran.

LE PROGRAMME PLUS EN DÉTAIL:

La fidélisation de la clientèle est devenue une véritable priorité pour les entreprises : d’ailleurs, la multiplication des offres aux consommateurs (AirMiles, Aéroplan, carte Métro, etc.) en est un exemple éloquent. Malheureusement, les coûts astronomiques dans le développement de ce type de programmes excluaient, jusqu’à maintenant, la possibilité pour des petites et moyennes organisations d’en faire profiter leurs clients.

Notre volonté de trouver une solution abordable pour les commerçants nous a convaincus de mettre en place un nouveau programme de fidélisation. Le développement de la carte et du programme informatique ont été entièrement créé dans la région du Saguenay Lac-St-Jean - Québec - Canada -

Ce programme, encouragera l’achat local tout en dynamisant les centres-villes et peut être aussi associé à des levées de fonds pour les organismes locaux.


LES AVANTAGES DE FIDÉLITÉ BOOMERANG Inc.

  • SÉCURITAIRE

  1. Réduction des fraudes versus les cartes cartonnées traditionnelles. 
  2. Confidentialité absolue des transactions. 
  3. Plate-forme de transaction est accréditée par Desjardins.

  • SIMPLE

  1. Pas de logiciel à installer. 
  2. Pas de mise à jour.

  • LES PLUS...

  1. Info-lettre une fois aux quatre semaines. 
  2. Rentabilisation via le marketing ciblé et la géolocalisation. 
  3. Coûts très abordables. 
  4. Pas d’achat de points dollars à l’ avance. 
  5. Les transactions sont illimitées. 
  6. Augmenter la visibilité des commerces.
  7. Le consommateur accumule 1 % en argent sur chaque achat dans les commerces. 
  8. Organisation de levées de fonds pour les organismes de votre territoire.

*EN DÉVELOPPEMENT

  1. Projet pour encourager/motiver et faire innover les commerçants et leurs employés, présenté sous forme de conférence avec des conférenciers reconnus.
  2. Application Boomerang pour les téléphones intelligents et les tablettes.
  3. Markéting par la géolocalisation.
  4. Dématérialisation de la carte via les téléphones intelligents et les tablettes.
  5. Et nous n'arrêterons pas là... "BOOMERANG RESTO" ET "BOOMERANG TOURISTIQUE" sont sur la table a dessin !...

EN CONCLUSION:

Avec Boomerang, tout le monde y trouve son compte même VOUS qui avez contribué !

PLATEFORME CRÉER ET GÉRER 100% AU SAGUENAY-LAC-ST-JEAN

- QUÉBEC - CANADA -

story:
Hello,

My name is Sean, I am 46 years old and I have leukemia.Fortunately for me, I also have a great supportive family of 2 young boys and a wife of 24 years. 

Last summer I was the unfortunate beneficiary of a brown recluse spider bite. It got me right square in the forehead and gave me a hell of a time. The doctor I saw gave me something worse, a referral to the cancer center. I found out the swelling in all of my lymph nodes was from leukemia and not the spider. I had a white cell count of 305,000. (Normal is 10,000.) He was shocked to learn I had not missed a days worth of work and was still functional. He agreed to monitor me even though at this point chemo is where I should be going. Through some natural remedies I was able to reduce the count to 255,000 in a few months.

Things were going along well until a few months ago when I caught mycoplasma pneumonia. I was down to 1/2 of a lung that was still functioning. It turned into a 10 day hospital stay and a few days of rest at home. We went without a paycheck for 3 weeks and went through all of our savings buying prescriptions and trying to stay afloat. My white cell count again had increased, this time to 315,000 and my lymph nodes have swollen greatly.

I have a very physical job as a truck mechanic, to which I have returned. It has taken a month to get back up to speed, but I can still keep up with guys half my age. I still have quite a few years left in me before I have to relinquish myself to a desk job. I just need a little help getting there. I am pretty hard headed and not giving up. I have to make it long enough to see my boys make it on their own.


This is new for me. I am not sure how to ask for help. We have always been on the other side of this coin. I started working on my 14th birthday to help support my family of 5 kids and help get my mom through college.  By the time I got out of high school, I was just too tired to make it through college myself and learned a trade. When Katrina blew through we had a lot of refugees in the hotels here in Huntsville. We cooked food in our kitchen and fed 40-50 people at a time. We have brought food to people, bought medicines, fixed vehicles and even shipped things out to people that needed a hand. When ever anyone we know is in need, we are there. It's just the kind of people we are. 

Now the shoe is on the other foot. We have sold everything of value we have. I have cut out the supplements that have kept the leukemia at bay. I have been trying to get extra work at home to no avail. Now we are hitting desperation. I am only trying to get my feet back on solid ground. I am behind on my rent and need to get back on my cancer routine.  Most of all I do not want to let my family down. They count on me and think I am indestructible.


I haven't much to give in return, except my  gratitude.

If you can help out, that's great ! If you can't help, but can say a prayer or share my story on social media like facebook, that's great too ! I am very inept as far as social media goes.

Time is short, the rent is due again this weekend.

Please help me get back on solid ground, I know I can make it once I get leveled out.

story:
Short Summary

My name is Austin and 2 and half years ago a tooth infection traveled from my tooth to my brain, causing me a stroke and almost taking my life. After 10 weeks in the hospital and 2 brain surgeries later, I was finally on the road to recovery. My stroke left my right side considerably weak especially my right leg. My right foot has yet to regain full movement and I still walk with difficulty due to a condition called drop foot. 

I have continued with physical therapy since my release from the hospital. Through much hard work and a team of therapists I no longer walk with a cane! Though now I am ready to take my recovery further. My Dr. has informed me of a new devise (the Bioness) that will immensely help my foot in helping me achieve my goal of a full recovery.The L300 BIONESS Foot Drop System is a revolutionary new medical device that helps you regain mobility and independence by lifting your foot as you walk/run. For more information about the L300 Bioness click here.
 

This devise will not just be my stepping stone along this path of recovery, but it will also help give me my life back. As a former All Star baseball player, and avid snow boarder, my dream is to be active again. So, the first step for me is running!

Please help me on my quest to RUN AGAIN!


Please Help by Contributing

  • The full amount of $7,000 will get me the Bioness device and go toward the needed therapy to help my recovery.
  • If I don't reach my entire goal, whatever I have raised will still go towards the bioness device. Where there's a will there's a way!

The Impact

  • With your contribution you'll not just be helping me buy a device, you will be helping to change my life.
  • I was recently awarded "Most Improved Brain Trauma Patient" by Rehab Without Walls. It was a HUGE honor for me. With my continued hard work in rehab, I am achieving things, and that was proof. 

Other Ways You Can Help

  • PLEASE SPREAD THE WORD! Please pass this on to your friends and family.
  • Remember you can use the Indiegogo share tools!

I appreciate all of you that have followed my story from the beginning. Your prayers where felt! I am now trying to make the most of my second chance at life and I thank you for helping me along the way. God Bless!
story_txt:
Short Summary
My name is Austin and 2 and half years ago a tooth infection traveled from my tooth to my brain, causing me a stroke and almost taking my life. After 10 weeks in the hospital and 2 brain surgeries later, I was finally on the road to recovery. My stroke left my right side considerably weak especially my right leg. My right foot has yet to regain full movement and I still walk with difficulty due to a condition called drop foot. 
I have continued with physical therapy since my release from the hospital. Through much hard work and a team of therapists I no longer walk with a cane! Though now I am ready to take my recovery further. My Dr. has informed me of a new devise (the Bioness) that will immensely help my foot in helping me achieve my goal of a full recovery.The
 L300 BIONESS Foot Drop System is a revolutionary new medical device that helps 
you regain mobility and independence by lifting your foot as you walk/run. For more information about the L300 Bioness click here.  
This devise will not just be my stepping stone along this path of recovery, but it will also help give me my life back. As a former All Star baseball player, and avid snow boarder, my dream is to be active again. So, the first step for me is running! 
Please help me on my quest to RUN AGAIN! 

  Please Help by Contributing


 The full amount of $7,000 will get me the Bioness device and go toward the needed therapy to help my recovery.
 If I don't reach my entire goal, whatever I have raised will still go towards the bioness device. Where there's a will there's a way!
 
  The Impact 
With your contribution you'll not just be helping me buy a device, you will be helping to change my life.
 I was recently awarded "Most Improved Brain Trauma Patient" by Rehab Without Walls. It was a HUGE honor for me. With my continued hard work in rehab, I am achieving things, and that was proof.  
 
  Other Ways You Can Help 
PLEASE SPREAD THE WORD! Please pass this on to your friends and family. 
 Remember you can use the Indiegogo share tools! 
 I appreciate all of you that have followed my story from the beginning. Your prayers where felt! I am now trying to make the most of my second chance at life and I thank you for helping me along the way. God Bless!

story:
(R)Evolution in Fast Food

Why most of us instantly think of burgers or fries when speaking about fast food? 

Why is fast food usually claimed to be unhealthy?

Hi! We are Jaanika and Mirje, two food enthusiasts whose mission is to bring a new and healthy perspective to fast food. Together we have been working in food business and in the customer service field for 20 years. And that's enough to feel the need to make a positive change in that field. 

 Our aim is to provide fresh, nutritious and tasty fast food that your body appreciates and that keeps your energy flowing all day long. Healthy fast food is something that we ourselves have been missing and talking about for quite some time now, but it is still pretty hard to find it here in Estonia. Therefore, we need to help ourselves, our friends (many of them are also carried away by the idea) and our community to make it possible to get some tasty, healthy and fresh fast food.

We will offer freshly made salads, soups, smoothies, fresh juice and healthy snacks. We have a fixed menu with some of the most popular items. Besides that, everyone has the chance to create their own salad or smoothie from preferred ingredients. The food is put together according to the clients' order on the spot and from the great variety of ingredients. Our aim is to give people a chance to try out the new products on the healthy nutrition field. Also, people with special dietary needs have plenty to choose from (vegans, lactose or gluten intolerants).
Our food is handily packed for take-away so that it can be enjoyed everywhere - on a park bench, strolling around the festival, in the office... wherever!
Our future vision is to become the first healthy fast food chain in Estonia, making the healthy eating options accessible and convinient for as many people as possible. But ofcourse it can't be done overnight, so we see opening a healthy fast food caravan as a good way to start. It would allow us to be mobile and move throughout the country, visiting festivals, meeting people and making ourselves and the healthy fast food concept visible. 

What We Need

Our goal is to get the food caravan on the road ALREADY in THIS SUMMER. We have the caravan picked out and it will go into reconstructioning works during the next weeks. Part of the project is already covered by our own funds, the business start-up support from the Estonian Unemployment Insurance Funds and by the support of our loved ones. 
Still, to prepare and provide food, we need appropriate kitchen equipment. Although we have made compromises regarding prices and some of the equipment will be in second use, the cost of the whole list is a bit difficult to handle at the moment and here is where we need your assistance. The funds raised in Indigogo will go to outfit the caravan with kitchen equipment.

The total budget of the project is 16 500 USD and in the diagram below you can get an overview about the different parts of it:

Here's the stuff we need in a more visual and detailed way:

While choosing the suitable equipment, we kept in mind that they should bear up with all the long workdays full of orders from hungry people :) All the stuff is already picked out and waits for our order. And we wouldn't want to keep them waiting for too long..

The Perks

We brainstormed quite a lot to figure out what would be the best ways to thank our dear contributors. As we believe in sharing and co-creating, we came up with following perks which carry these values and enable  to be part of Skuup in very different ways. Check them out!
NB: All the selected perks include also the previous ones!

 


The Impact

In today's busy life fast food has become an inevitable part of urban lifestyle, but in Estonia, healthy fast food is rather hard to find. At the same time there are way too many people suffering from food related diseases like cardiovascular disease, type 2 diabetes, cancer, metabolic syndrome etc. Sadly cardiovascular disease is the leading cause of death worldwide and Estonia ranks on the very top of that fatal chart. We understand, that to deal with that issue on lager scale, peoples' mindset about healthy lifestyle and nutrition needs some change. But creating opportunities for healthy alternatives is a step towards that change and we see many hints in society giving us confidence, that our idea is needed and appreciated.

Although our project has its biggest impact on a local level, it definately contributes to a similar change on global level, working towards the common consciousness about healthier eating choices and healthier lifes.


Risks & Challenges

As our project will be first one of it's kind in Estonia it is an experiment for us as well, but we are optimistic and see great potential. To assure that it is not only us living our dream, we conducted a reasearch to find out, if healthy fast food is really required. We asked 100 people to answer 10 simple questions about their eating habits and what they value or miss in fast food. What we found was stunning. More than half of respondents expressed that it's rather difficult to find fast food according to their needs or wishes. They would love to see more healthy options and less fatty or junk food in the fast food field. 

We have also had a lot of great feedback and support from the people around and it seems that besides us, there is a whole crowd outside who believes in us! Yaaayy!!


Ways You Can Help

If our mission fires you up as well and you want to be part of the changemakers in the healthy fast food field, you have several options.
We are really thankful for the contribution via Indiegogo, which helps us to go to the next steps and provides support we need to get things started.
But sometimes you can be financially broke. And that's just fine. Spreading the word and sharing this page with your friends is also a great help! 
And we are open to any ideas or advice that you think might be interesting or helpful for us. So if something pops into your mind that you would like to share with us, don't hesitate to contact us!


* Why SKUUP? The name has a double meaning. First, it refers to english word "scoop" (actually, this is how you would write the word in estonian only by hearing it), and our food will be measured in "scoopfuls". Second, it refers to S³ (estonian way of "cube" is "kuup") and our three main products - salads, soups and smoothies-  all start with the letter "S".

They would love to see more healthy options and less fatty or junk food in the fast food field. 
We have also had a lot of great feedback and support from the people around and it seems that besides us, there is a whole crowd outside who believes in us! Yaaayy!!

  Ways You Can HelpIf our mission fires you up as well and you want to be part of the changemakers in the healthy fast food field, you have several options.We are really thankful for the contribution via Indiegogo, which helps us to go to the next steps and provides support we need to get things started.But sometimes you can be financially broke. And that's just fine. Spreading the word and sharing this page with your friends is also a great help! 

And we are open to any ideas or advice that you think might be interesting or helpful for us. So if something pops into your mind that you would like to share with us, don't hesitate to contact us!

First, it refers to english word "scoop" (actually, this is how you would write the word in estonian only by hearing it), and our food will be measured in "scoopfuls". story:
Join the Barefoot Revolution!

Experience the amazing health benefits of connecting to the Earth’s energy all day long – even while you’re indoors!

The Radiant Health™ line of grounding (earthing) products bring the Earth’s energy right to your body while you are working, relaxing, playing or most importantly…sleeping!

Everybody – even your pets - can benefit from what is being talked about as one of the most GROUNDBREAKING health discoveries ever!!!

The Radiant Health™ Grounding Mat and the Radiant Health™ Grounding Sheet safely and comfortably deliver the electrons from the Earth right to your body. You can be grounded all day and night!

Reconnect to the Earth

Everybody knows that the SUN's energy is crucial for all life and for good health, but guess what…the EARTH’s energy is too! The Sun’s rays and roughly 5000 lightning strikes that occur every minute help to recharge the earth’s negative energy field.

And when we touch our skin to the surface of the earth, our bodies receive a charge of electrons that helps us to stay healthy. This is called grounding or earthing.

Of course this isn’t new news…before modern times, people were always outdoors and naturally absorbing the earth’s energy.

Obviously things are a lot different today. We live most of our lives indoors. And even when we do go outside, we are often walking on asphalt and wearing shoes which prevent us from absorbing the energy or electrons from the earth.

It’s actually no wonder why so many people feel tired, sluggish, fatigued, stressed, sick and achy, because we go for days or even weeks without ever connecting to the earth. This lack of connection causes electron deficiency!

Radiant Health™ Products Connect You To the Earth 24/7!

But guess what?  You can start receiving the benefits of grounding by going barefoot outside. This alone can be life changing…and it’s free! And when you can’t get grounded outdoors, you can use the Radiant Health grounding mat and bed sheet to get grounded while you’re indoors too!

Our state of the art, patent pending grounding mat is made of biodegradable, toxic free TPE foam with a conductive and antimicrobial cotton/silver fabric on top of it. You simply plug the cord into the grounding hole of an outlet, which directly connects to the existing grounding rod of your home.

And our super comfortable grounding sheet is made of an ultra-soft, highly conductive Egyptian cotton and silver blend fabric with a cord that plugs into your grounding outlet. You can use it at home or even when you when you travel.

This connection to the earth lets you safely receive the earth’s electrons while you’re sleeping just as if you were sleeping outside under the stars.

When you sleep grounded, you’ll heal faster, sleep deeper, feel more rested and refreshed in the morning, and will wake up looking and feeling radiant! And it even helps to eliminate snoring!

Here' a video that demonstrates how our products ground your body:

The Ultimate Antioxidant!

Being grounded provides antioxidants in the form of electrons. Antioxidants are elements that help protect your body’s cells from free radical damage.

Free radicals are unstable molecules that can do damage to your cells and organs and cause inflammation and accelerated aging. Antioxidants like COQ10 and vitamin C help to neutralize these harmful free radicals.

Guess what! Being grounded is the ultimate antioxidant!

Thousands of studies have shown the link between chronic inflammation and many common diseases like diabetes, heart disease, hypothyroidism and even cancer. Inflammation slowly and gradually increases in the body over time especially when you’re not grounded.

I have been in the wellness industry for 15 years, and this is the most GROUND BREAKING discovery I’ve come across.

Here’s a short list of some of the health benefits of grounding:

§  Reduces inflammation by defusing excess positive electrons

§  Reduces chronic pain

§  Improves sleep

§  Increases energy

§  Helps regulate blood sugar levels

§  Lowers stress and promotes calmness by reducing stress hormones.

§  Normalizes biological rhythms including circadian rhythm

§  Helps to sync the left and right brain

§  Improves blood pressure and blood flow

§  Relieves muscle tension and headache

§  Lessens menstrual and female hormone symptoms

§  Speeds healing and wound repair

§  Can eliminate jet lag

§  Protects your body from EMFs

§  Shortens recovery time from injury or athletic activity

§  Reduces or eliminates snoring

§  Helps  support adrenal health

 

Radiant Health™ Products are Toxin Free!

Simply put, our grounding products act as a conduit that connect you to the healing energy of the earth. Yet products like grounding mats aren’t even new. Companies like 3M have been making grounding products for industrial and electronic clean room environments for decades.

But unfortunately, the clean room isn’t very clean. Existing products are made from conductive PVC or carbonized rubber…which are toxic and even carcinogenic…and you do NOT want to be touching your bare skin to these materials.

Radiant Health products are always made with toxin free materials that feel comfortable on your skin.

A Vision to Heal

Sara & I have been in the health & wellness industry for 25 years combined. We have developed over 20 different products that have been sold in over 100 countries. Radiant Health is our passion!

As we reach each our funding goals, we will introduce other awesome grounding products like a car mat, fitted bed sheets, a pet sheet and more. We want to help thousands of people feel better and live radiantly!

Here's more about us:

Be the first to try our products!

We’re doing our soft launch here on IndieGogo because we want to offer you a chance to be the first to try our products and give us your feedback. We strongly value your input because that helps us to always produce the best products.

Join in on the barefoot revolution and get yourself grounded, buy our products today and get a great deal!

Help us out & share our campaign!

Learn more about the amazing health benefits of grounding, share our campaign with others, and help us to get thousands of people grounded and to a place of Radiant Health!

We will be updating our campaign daily with educational videos, articles and posts…so keep checking back, and make sure to tell your friends and family about our campaign!

We even have an awesome REFERRAL Program – each referral earns you a $20 credit towards any of our products...check it out!

We will also have plenty of sales & distributorship opportunities worldwide, and those who help us by sharing and referring people will be highly considered :)

Thank You for your support!

David & Sara :)

story:
In November 2014 I was giving the fantastic opportunity to represent my country at the 2015 Touch Rugby World Cup that will be held in Australia. I will be the youngest person to have ever participated in this league of the tournament. My excitement and enthusiasm came to a tumbling halt when we were told of the cost of the tour as Touch Rugby is not fully sponsored in South Africa. This is such an amazing opportunity and I really need your help to get me to my dream.


Even though the campaign states US$ any currency could contribute into the paypal account.


The tour will cost a total of approximately $5,000 which will be going towards the entrance fee into the tournament, accomodation, flights, visa's as well as meals. The price does seem high but I can assure every single cent will be going towards what has been highlighted and no profit is involved! 

Why will I need the profit when I can gain the experience of a lifetime :) The South African womens team is currently 3rd in the world ranking which is an amazing achievement and we plan on coming home with a medal!  I hope to be apart of that.

Once at the World Cup I will be putting up a video to assure you all that your money was well spent !

This truly means so much to me and I have always dreamed and worked to get to the point where I can represent my country.  I am right here and with your support it will be that last push I need to get me over the finish line. 
Any amount is valuable to me and my dream! If you cannot donate you can still support by spreading the word by reposting the link on your social network or telling friends and family about this !

Many thanks in advance x
