story:
Dual Shaker™ - Mix fresh drinks anytime, anywhere!

 

 

 

What is the Dual Shaker™?

It is a new system of mixing drinks by shaking ingredients from a single bottle. The bottle, made out of the highest quality materials, has two chambers where you can put in the ingredients for your drink or formula.

Now you can have a fresh and powerful drink wherever you go!

Benefits you want? Benefits you get!

  • Mix fresh and tasteful drinks the easiest way, anytime and anywhere!
  • It keeps all the power of the ingredients!
  • Now you don’t have to worry about leaks!

But more about this later, let us start with some basic explanations.

How does the Dual Shaker™ work?

The inset of the Dual Shaker™ consists of two chambers. This design is where the magic of fresh drinks and leak-free experience comes from.

Simply put, the Dual Shaker™ is a dynamic bottle that caters to so many humanly needs! It works through the Twist, Shake and Done method.

For example: Put in protein powder in one chamber and milk in the other.

Twist the lid to open. Put in the ingredients and fill the chambers inside the bottle. Shake the bottle. And you’re Done! Have your drink fresh and intact using the Dual Shaker™.

Here are some of the ways that you could use the Dual Shaker™ …

Dual Shaker™ offers so many possibilities in terms of its usage.

These are just some of the great ways on how to use the two chambers of the Dual Shaker™

I’m sure you would be able to come up with so much more. Go for it!

Mix your drinks right after your workout, while in class, while working in the office, even when you’re on the run – practically anytime and anywhere! 

 IT’S FUN! IT’S EASY TO USE! AND IT LOOKS GREAT TOO!!! 

Take a look at the Dual Shaker™!

  • Hot and fresh California design developed by young entrepreneurs.
  • Dual Shaker™ was constructed through German-engineered technology.
  • Bottle made out of the highest quality that manufacturing can offer.
  • The Dual Shaker™ comes in 6 different colors with a total volume capacity of approx.900ml (300ml and 600ml chamber divisions).Other sizes will come out soon.

Don’t lose the power of your ingredients!

It’s not just about the taste. More importantly, the Dual Shaker™ aims to preserve the potency of the ingredients you are bound to mix, especially in nutrition drinks. For example, Vitamin B12 has been one of the most popular ingredients in nutrition drinks since it is known to boost the body’s metabolization of fats and carbohydrates. However, studies prove that Vitamin B12 has degradation issues or has very short half lives. To give you a detailed idea the Cyanocobalamin vitamin B12 that tends to lose its potency when exposed to light, oxygen, and acid or alkali-containing environments. This is just one example and there are so many other ingredients out there that are prone to losing their power. Here is where the importance of segregation and freshness come in. The Dual Shaker™ does that exactly. The chambers in the Dual Shaker™ prevent contamination so you can have all the power of your ingredients.

Let me tell you how it all started…

I am a health enthusiast ever since I could remember. I would hit the gym and engage in sports because this is something I am passionate about. I would always find myself making protein shakes which I thought I fully enjoyed, until I realized I could have it even better.

In preparation for a day’s workout, I would stash my protein shake in my gym bag. When I am ready to have my drink, it’s either the drink is not fresh anymore or it has made a big mess inside my bag because of leakage. This would always be the case whenever I went to the gym to workout, and I would always think that there must be a solution to this.

So I decided to come up with something USEFUL out of the idea – the Dual Shaker™. More importantly, I had lots of FUN along the process and this has kept me inspired since then.

Summarized Top 3 Features of the Dual Shaker™

1. Get fresh drinks, anytime and anywhere!

2. Maintain all the power of the ingredients. 

3. Prevent leakage because of the secure chambers. 

Eco-friendly and reusable. Microwave-safe. Dishwasher-safe. Plastic is BBA free and FDA Approved. A nice, sleek and useful gift suggestion, made of the highest quality materials that manufacturing can offer.

We need your help!

What is the money for? The money is for creating the mold and production. After many tests, the final prototype is complete and is now ready for production. I, as the founder, use the Dual Shaker™ every day. The money is for you to have the same satisfying experience that I get.

In the past few months, we have been able to build a community for the Dual Shaker™ and we are really thankful for all your support. This is why we came up with special perks for the Indiegogo community and everyone that is following us as a gesture to give back benefits to you because you gave us the power to build all this.

If you like the product, please support me in creating a new way of mixing. Dual Shaker™ is not just another bottle. Dual Shaker™ aims to revolutionize the concept of mixing drinks to help people keep up with their daily life endeavors. Be the first to own this unique product.

So be a part of this great change. Get your very first Dual Shaker™, start funding and spread the word!

story:
Our good friend, Damion Shipley, has been battling Hodgkin's lymphoma since 2005. Good thing he’s a hell of a fighter. He’s in the midst of Round 4 on a cancer that causes the cells in his lymphatic system to abnormally reproduce, making his body less able to fight infection.

 

But there’s good news. He’s participating in a clinical trial designed to cure him at Johns Hopkins Hospital in Baltimore, Maryland—an Autologous Stem Cell Transplant. In a stem cell transplant, healthy stem cells are placed in the body through an IV to help bone marrow start to work right. When the stem cells come from your own blood or bone marrow, it is called an autologous transplant. That’s what Damion is doing. Through this process, he is attempting to become his own bone marrow donor.

 

Everyone who knows and loves Damion is already claiming victory on his behalf. But let’s not pretend the next six weeks will be easy for him. We’re talking very long days of bone marrow aspirations, conscious sedations, injections, biopsies, scans, studies, chemotherapy and more.

 

In the midst of his treatment, he’ll need supplemental funds for co-pays, prescriptions, gas, hotel stays (when required) and other expenses that are magnified when you’re not receiving a full paycheck. We can all make his journey a bit easier by making a contribution to this effort. Join his team. Follow his story. Be part of his success.

 

Special Note: Every year, 10,000 patients need a marrow transplant from an unrelated donor, but only half receive one. Damion is very appreciative to his colleagues at United Way Worldwide who participated in a bone marrow matching session through Be the Match with a simple cheek swab. Millions have joined the Be The Match Registry® and stand ready to become bone marrow donors. Yet there are still many patients who cannot find a match, especially patients from racially and ethnically diverse communities. Learn how you can help save a life at BeTheMatch.org.

story:
Hoverboards...

We've all dreamed about owning one, but unfortunately they wont be available until 2015.... if the movie is correct.


The ZBoard...

The ZBoard is a weight-sensing electric skateboard. To ride it you simply lean forward to go and lean back to stop. Its a great way to complete short commutes and a blast to ride. Learn more about the ZBoard here.


Hoverboard + ZBoard + Michael J. Fox Foundation = !!!

Now to celebrate October 21st - exactly two years until Back to the Future Day - we are excited to announce the limited edition ZBoard Hoverboard, with proceeds going to the Michael J. Fox Parkinson's Foundation.


Great Scott!

With custom grip tape, multi-colored footpads, a pink deck, and a pink battery box, this board looks like something out of a movie.



1.21 Gigawatts?

Nope - the ZBoard Hoverboard runs on a 20 Ah Lithium battery. And though it can't hit 88 mph or take you back in time, the ZBoard Hoverboard is still plenty capable of taking you where you need to go as seen in the chart below:



"When this baby hits 18 miles per hour"

Though the board is capable of high speeds, the throttle is totally variable. Lean forward a little bit to go walking speed, and lean a little bit more to hit the top speed of 18 mph.

The ZBoard is also equipped with regenerative braking, which make it safe to ride down hills and helps it get a carbon footprint equivalent to 1500 miles per gallon.



The Michael J. Fox Parkinson's Foundation

All of net proceeds will be donated to the Michael J. Fox Foundation for Parkinson's Research. Team Fox is the grassroots fundraising program at The Michael J. Fox Foundation. Each year, more than 1,600 Team Fox members worldwide turns their passions and interests into unique fundraising events which, to date, have helped to raised nearly $20 million for Parkinson’s research. To learn more, visit www.teamfox.org


*Delorean Time Machine not included.


Letter from the Founders

From early in the development of the ZBoard, people often compared it to the Hoverboard from Back to the Future Part II.  Its hands-free operation has inspired freedom and fun for friends, customers, viewers, and kids at heart of all ages all around the world.  Although the ZBoard doesn’t truly “hover”, it does give the feeling and thrill of floating over the ground as you surf the sidewalks to your destination. 

To celebrate Back to the Future Day this October 21st, we are excited to announce the ZBoard Hoverboard, a limited edition electric skateboard inspired by the Hoverboard in the 1989 movie.  

With this model, we’re embracing our inner movie nerd, while doing what we can to support a great cause.  Proceeds from this model will be donated to the Michael J. Fox Foundation for Parkinson’s Research, in honor of his tireless work as an advocate for those living with the debilitating neurological disorder, and of course, for his performance as Marty McFly. 

This is an important personal issue to me, as Parkinson’s Disease has affected the past three generations of my family, and may affect me one day as well.  It profoundly impacts quality of life for those afflicted as they gradually lose the ability to control muscle movement, concentration, and communication.  Some have described the later stages as being trapped in one’s own body, before it can eventually cause death.  There is unfortunately no known cure and much remains to be learned about how it works and how it can be prevented. 

This limited release of the ZBoard Hoverboard is an excellent opportunity to raise money for an incredible cause, while adding some fun to your commute.  We hope it can inspire you to rethink the way you get around.  One day, maybe where we’re going we won’t need cars – or roads.  It’s not 2015 yet, after all.

Geoff Larson

Co-Founder

Intuitive Motion Inc

Thanks Yous

Brad Fyfe for providing the incredible shoes, jacket, and hat

Paul "Doc" Nigh for providing the epic car. See his website here.

Kevin Lipnos and his crew for shooting an awesome video.


Additional Pictures

story:
Meet our full of life energetic always there for everyone family member Kathy Sutherland. She is an awesome Mother, Grandmother, Sister, Cousin & Family member. She works for our amazing postal service. (Chances are she has helped you before in making sure you get your mail)

Kathy is that one family member that while you may not see her everyday, You know she is there rather it be from the 100 facebook picture posts each day ;) or because when you post something or need a little pickup she always has something amazing to say to brighten your day. (She gives pretty good weather reports as well ;) To make sure we are all safe driving)

When we have a family event...Don't even bother calling her to ask her IF she is coming. Just call and let her know that your having the event...Her being there is guaranteed =) And she truly is the life of the party.

She has fought long and hard to lose weight going from 410 to 230 using several different methods but then stopped losing. Her Thyroid is out of whack now & she has Blood pressure issues.


This site is primarily for friends and family but of course anyone is welcome to pledge and help. Kathy needs to get "Bariatric Surgery" and she has been given an amazing opportunity but needs just one last little bit of help to make it come to reality.

Her insurance company has agreed to help with the procedure, But she has to pay her full out of pocket expenses. Which originally was $6000. The hospital that does the procedure has also been amazing! They have agreed to do with her only paying $2000 of that expense.

WHAT AN AMAZING OPPORTUNITY! We just need to get that last little bit and her life will be forever changed. This was her last facebook post that made me want to do this indiegogo for her.

"Well unless I find a magic tree with $2000 under it I won't be having my Bariatric surgery anytime soon.  The Hurley Bariatric center says it is their policy to collect our max out pocket costs up front and since mine is $6000 they were doing me a favor by reducing it to $2000.  Says this in an elective surgery not an emergent or necessary surgery. My insurance is telling me one thing and them another!  So frustrating!  Guess I will get my sinus surgery done and figure the Bariatric surgery out somehow.  They'll keep my case file open for a year."

I say we create the "magic tree" for her! Her goal is to live to be 100 =) So she can live a long healthy life to watch her grandson and great nieces and nephews grow up!

And I think she deserves it!

Here are her total expenses: Grand total is $2000 for copay, $200 for surgeon, $350 for facility, and $199 for liquid diet beforehand.

Here is a link to the hospital that would be doing the procedure so you can see how big this really is for someone. And how much it can impact there lives.


http://bariatrics.hurleymc.com/


Thanks to everyone!!

She works for our amazing postal service. (Chances are she has helped you before in making sure you get your mail)Kathy is that one family member that while you may not see her everyday, You know she is there rather it be from the 100 facebook picture posts each day ;) or because when you post something or need a little pickup she always has something amazing to say to brighten your day. (She gives pretty good weather reports as well ;) To make sure we are all safe driving)When we have a family event...Don't even bother calling her to ask her IF she is coming. Just call and let her know that your having the event...Her being there is guaranteed =) And she truly is the life of the party.She has fought long and hard to lose weight going from 410 to 230 using several different methods but then stopped losing. Her Thyroid is out of whack now & she has Blood pressure issues.This site is primarily for friends and family but of course anyone is welcome to pledge and help. Kathy needs to get "Bariatric Surgery" and she has been given an amazing opportunity but needs just one last little bit of help to make it come to reality.Her insurance company has agreed to help with the procedure, But she has to pay her full out of pocket expenses. Which originally was $6000. The hospital that does the procedure has also been amazing! They have agreed to do with her only paying $2000 of that expense.WHAT AN AMAZING OPPORTUNITY! We just need to get that last little bit and her life will be forever changed. This was her last facebook post that made me want to do this indiegogo for her."Well unless I find a magic tree with $2000 under it I won't be having my Bariatric surgery anytime soon.  The Hurley Bariatric center says it is their policy to collect our max out pocket costs up front and since mine is $6000 they were doing me a favor by reducing it to $2000.  Says this in an elective surgery not an emergent or necessary surgery. My insurance is telling me one thing and them another!  So frustrating!  Guess I will get my sinus surgery done and figure the Bariatric surgery out somehow.  They'll keep my case file open for a year."I say we create the "magic tree" for her! Her goal is to live to be 100 =) So she can live a long healthy life to watch her grandson and great nieces and nephews grow up!And I think she deserves it!Here are her total expenses: Grand total is $2000 for copay, $200 for surgeon, $350 for facility, and $199 for liquid diet beforehand.Here is a link to the hospital that would be doing the procedure so you can see how big this really is for someone. And how much it can impact there lives.http://bariatrics.hurleymc.com/Thanks to everyone!!

story:
Mike Smith has a type of cancer called Optic Nerve Glioma. He currently can't see out of his left eye. Here is a short description.. http://www.braintumor.org/patients-family-frien...

Mike has two beautiful daughters, who need him.  They don't really understand what is going on with their Daddy right now, but they love him with all their hearts.  

Mike is going to Kansas City for his first treatment from November 19th thru 23rd.  He has medical insurance but it likely won't cover all of the treatments.

He will incur many expenses including fuel, food for he and his fiance, lodging etc. He and his fiance are also both missing a full week of work to go to the treatment.  Any monetary donations would be a huge help.  This is the first of many treatments Mike will have, and he will need help all along the way. Thank you in advance for any help you can offer!!

story:
Hi my name is Anthony Novoa, I am 17 years old, live in Long Beach CA and I am passionate about cycling, especially track cycling. I have been racing at the Los Angeles Velodrome since 2009 and the oppurtunity to compete in my first international race. The race takes place in Berlin, Germany from 24-29th January 2013 and is called “ Berliner Sechstagerennen”.  Participating in this race will give me experience racing in an international setting.

I will be travelling with my teamate James Hilyer and coach Tim Roach. The trip will be expensive costing approximately $2000.00 for flights, bike shipping, transportation, food and housing. I need your to help to make this possible.
 
Thank you in advance for your support.
All donations are welcome, please feel free to share this site with your friends.
 
Anthony Novoa

story:
As most of my friends and family know I have been dealing with Chrons Disease/Ulcerative Colitis for over 8 years.  Its consumed majority of my life and over the past 2 years it had gradually gotten worse.  I was hospitalized in October of 2011 for over 2 weeks and had been diagnosed with a virus called Cytomegalovirus which attacks the weak organs in your body.  In my case my liver and colon. 

I have tried many medications over the past few years which were doing more harm to my body than good.  As a result of having Chrons/UC I have also been diagnosed with Primary Sclerosing Cholangitis (cirrhosis of the liver), Rheumatoid Arthritis, and Osteoporosis.

I had elective surgery in May called a Laparoscopic Colectomy to remove the disease from my body and was again hospitalized over 2 weeks.  They removed my large intestine, colon, and appendix.  As of now I have an ostomy bag on the right of my stomach that collects waste that I empty between 20-30 times a day as I do not have a colon.  Another surgery is set for a reversal in which the doctors create a pouch called a J-Pouch that acts as my colon and my small intestine is then attached to that pouch and I will the be able to have the function to use the bathroom like a normal person.  Between both surgeries my down time is between 6-8 months.  I have limited medical insurance, but even after my copay and deductible the expense is not managable because I am unable to work until I am fully healed.

Being out of work for so long and having all these accumulated medical expenses has taken a toll not only myself but on my family as well.  My parents have taken majority of responsibility for my expenses over the past few years but can no longer take responsibility .  At the moment my only option will be to file for bankruptcy after this whole process is over which I am trying to avoid. 

I have tried every other option but feel as a failure as I have run out of options.  I am only looking for a donation of between $10-$20 at this moment.  This is by no means easy for myself or my family and frankly feel embarrassed even asking for donations from people to make ends meet. 

Thank you in advance to anyone who has helped or is willing to help.  Also if you would so kindly share this story with whomever you may think would be able to help it would be appreciated!!  Your gratitude does not go unappreciated and thank you for reading my story!!

story:
**Please Note - All Contributions MUST be made via Paypal that is backed up by a BANK account or with a Paypal account that ALREADY has funds in it. The campaign was set up to avoid the extra % fees that would occur had Credit Card payments been allowed...**

To View the complete Trailer of the Award Winning Documentary, "Under Our Skin," Please Click on the "Gallery" Tab Above

Why Inanna House??

When I found Inanna House and felt the sincere wamth and infallible integrity from its founders, I simply knew that there was an answer; a vision I could hold onto for dear life - one that could grant me the courage to fiercely fight to see it built, as it would not only restore my faith, but it would also PREVENT all of us diagnosed with this condition from losing theirs. 

My Sincerest Thanks,

Sarah Lamando

http://www.asliceoflyme.blogspot.com/ 

Highlights of The Vision for Inanna House

*The intention of Inanna House is to create numerous centers around the world as millions are in need of help. Here are some highlights of what each of these centers (the first to be built in Sonoma County, California) will provide:

  • A Retreat Style Center with 24 Private Rooms with Baths for In-patient stay, built on 14-15 Acres of viable land.
  • 24 Hour Care and monitoring as patients undergo individualized treatment plans, incorporating all worlds of medicine to acheive optimal re-integration and healing, which would address each aspect of the individual: Mind, Body, and Sprit. 
  • The Center will incorporate Green Energy to make it as self-sustainable as possible. (Good for the Environment, and lowers overhead costs, and thus, in turn, patient fees - now, that's what I call a win/win situation : ) 
  • An In-House Organic Garden big enough to feed all residents and provide patients with a necessary "Clean, Alkaline Diet" to aid them in their recovery.
  • A $20 Million Dollar Endowment Fund for individuals who can't pay for treatment but desperately need it. (Not Kidding...)
  • Fees that are on a sliding scale basis, and a "Give Back" Program so that those who have received treatment and recovered have the opportunity to come back and help give patients who are currently being treated hope, guidance, and support. (Trust me, only Lyme Patients would be thrilled to have this opportunity. Why? Because they desperately wish they had someone to guide them through their own battle to recovery.)
  • A Program specifically designed to help care-takers understand exactly what their loved ones are going through, and how Lyme disease and its co-infections are effecting them. This program will also give specific instructions so that care-takers will also know how they can help their loved ones recover. 

* To learn more about what other amazing features and specific therapies the center intends on offering, please visit their website at: 

http://www.inannahouse.org/our-vision.html

 

The Total Estimated Cost to Keep the Vision For Inanna House Alive for the Next Year is: $73,850...

The LEAST I could do was try and help them get $17,000 as it would literally give them their wings so that they have a fighting start to move ahead with their amazing vision for the next quarter. 


* To Learn more about why they need our support - please read below...

 Here Are Our Perks : ) 

The Lotus

This is the image and inspirational message that you will be e-mailed  if you choose this perk:

 * Note: The text may seem hard to read here, but rest assured, this photo is clean and clear in its original format. Also, it can be read more clearly if you check the photo out in the "Gallery" section above. 

The Photography Lover 

Here is just one example of the of the photographs you willl have to choose from...

To view Jeremiah's exclusive gallery please click on the link below. We have over 20 amazing and unique photos for you to choose from! Please note that these photos are copyrighted and CANNOT be reproduced by anyone but Jeremiah himself.

Once you have claimed this perk, please specify which two pictures you would like to be sent to you by typing in the TITLES of the photographs you choose in the comment section. Thank You : )

 http://www.inannahouse.org/the-photography-lover-gallery.html
 

The Book Lover

You may already recognize the covers of these books...one of them was awarded as a Finalist in the 2011 Best Books in Health by USA book News!
 
 
To Learn More About these authors, and their amazing books, please visit the following sites:

http://www.naturesdirtyneedle.com/ 

http://www.katinamakris.com/

 

The Fountain of Life

I'm pretty sure everyone has seen a "gift brick" before, but in case you haven't, here is a pic of one. Each brick will have the contributor's Name and Location engraved on it, and will be beautifully placed in warm-colored tones around a gorgeous fountain when Inanna House is built! When you purchase this perk, please let us know if you are a Lyme Patient. as we will be engraving ribbons to signify your dedication, and to honor your fight for recovery. 

 

 

 Sacred White Sage

Here are the images sent from Hector Herrara while he hand-picked the sage, and was ceremonially blessing it in the Yaqui Tradition for this campaign. Thank You, my friend : )

Note: When you receive the Sage, it will be wrapped in either white, red, black, or yellow yarn. These colors represent each of the four directions as follows:

  • Red - The North: The Direction of Our Elders, our grandmothers and grandfathers, direction of forgiveness.
  • white - The South: The Direction of our children, and where our loved ones go to rest in the spirit world.
  • Yellow - The East: Where our Grandfather Sun comes out everyday, the direction of the unborn and the newborn, and of the newborn inside each one of us. The Direction of Male Energy.
  • Black - The West: Where our Grandmother Moon watches over us, The direction of Adulthood and Female Energy.

   

 

The Hair and Accessory Lover

Here is a picture of the Bovella Handbag you will receive along with your free "Cut and Color" at Salon Elle located in Armonk, NY. *Please note that the bag is unlined, but VERY sturdy : )

 

To Learn More about Salon Elle Hair Artistry please visit their website at:

 http://salonellehair.com/

 

        The Food Lover 

 Any Manhattanite "Foodie" is probably drooling over this perk right about now! Claim it quickly before the owner, Danielle Florio, mails it out to the 10,000+ people on the Whisk & Ladle mailing list, who have literally been JUST WAITING for an opportunity like this! 

 If you have never heard of it before, click on Danielle's "team member" icon to learn more about this unique, underground, and fabulously bohemian dining experience.

This perk includes two tickets, with GAURANTEED admission to the their very next dinner event, as well as "The Lotus" and the "Contributor's Wall".

 

 The Jewelry Lover

 Here are the pics of the jewelry peices you will receive if you choose this perk:

 This Classic Vintage Watch Necklace from the    1960's is paired with a 14kt gold plated 24" chain and has Etc..Modern Vintage's signature swirl wire design.

 The watch piece can also be worn on the reverse side, with its ornate back, making this piece quite versatile.

 Because of the Era the watch is from, it runs on a wind-up mechanism. Please note: the future owner of this peice should handle it with care, as it is fragile and should never be over-wound.

 To Learn more about Liz Teich, the owner of Etc...Modern Vintage Jewelry, please visit her website at: http://etcmodernvintage.com/ 

 

 

You will ALSO have the opportunity to create your own sterling silver ring, with your choice of one of these three designs, the hummingbird, the butterfly, or the dragonfly, AND choose which kind of bezel set gemstone you would like. The choices for the gemsone are: Lapis, Blue Sapphire, Red Garnet, Peridot, White Moonstone, Rainbow Moonstone, Carnelian, Black Onyx, lolite (purple-blue), Amethyst, Blue Topaz, Citrine, Pink Rhodalite Garnet, or Aquamarine.

Your ring will be made by Cheryl Van Dyck, Owner of Lavender Cottage Jewelry. To Learn more about Cheryl and her amazing handcrafted artisan jewelry, please visit her website at: http://lavendercottagejewelry.com/


The Total Package

There's Nothin' better than supporting a GREAT cause AND getting money back for it!!

If you choose this perk you'll receive, The Lotus, The Contributor's Wall, The Photography Lover, The Fountain of LIfe, The Book Lover AND a $100 Gift Certificate to Crate&Barrel!! (Only 6 Available!)

 

Sounds Amazing! Right? Here's why they just need a little help to get things started...

The creation of Inanna House has been a labor of love, filled with blessed intention, and people determined to see it through the end. Their integrity and vision will NOT be comprised, and in an effort ensure that, they have been reaching out to the Lyme Community for help with certain aspects pertaining to the legal matters that would help get Inanna House off the ground and running as a Nationwide Non-Profit Organization with blueprints and budget projectories in-hand to present to willing investors. 

However, anyone who has Chronic Lyme Disease will tell you that even with the best of intentions and a sincere determination to help, often times their illness simply overcomes them and they are unable to perform the duties they so very much had wanted to.

In a nutshell, they've had a couple unforseen setbacks, and are in need of monetary contributions to enable them to do the following:

  • They need to get their logo copyrighted to prevent any kind of fraud or impersonation:

Estimated Cost: $850

  • Inanna House is considered a non-profit establishment, but not yet a 501(c)(3). To move further in their fundraising endeavors, and to allow for donations of a larger size, they must obtain this. They need to hire an accountant to draw up a budget, and a lawyer to make sure that Inanna House is in compliance with all laws that pertain to becoming a Non-Profit Organization:

Estimated Cost:$3,000

  • They need to have the blueprints for the vision for their center drawn up and approved, as this will help them in future fundraising endeavors, as well as in presentations to foundations and investors: 

Estimated Cost: $3,000 ***Service Offered**** (Yay : )

Estimated Cost for Presentation Preparation: $5,000

  • Thus far, ALL of the work that has been put into creating this organization has been lovingly done by either Sara Donnelly or Mara Williams herself. With the expansion of their vision, and more and more people wanting to become involved, it would be impossilble for them to continue their work alone. In order to ensure that every question about this Center is answered, and every future marketing and/or fundraising event is upheld, they desperately need to hire more personnel.

Estimated Cost: $2,000/Month

  • To expand the awareness of Inanna House and their unique vision, they need to hire a Publicist/Marketer to publicize, organize, and help find connections.

Estimated Cost: $3,000/Month

  • This Publicist/Marketer will most definitely be in need of marketing material and promotional products from Inanna House:

Estimated Cost: $2,000

I'm a FIRM believer in the "Divide and Conquer" method, and I KNOW there are enough people out there to make this happen. I'm not asking for HUGE monetary contributions, in fact I'd rather not. Just a little from a LOT of like-minded people, and we're there! So please, take a look at our AWESOME perks, contribute if you can, and make some noise by using the Indiegogo Share Tools to get the word out if you can't. That's it!  

One Last Thing...

All Perks will be received within 5-7 business days after the 45 day campaign is over. I would LOVE to send them out sooner, but this is an ALL or NOTHING situation...if we can't reach $17,000 within the allotted time frame, ALL contributions will be refunded, and Inanna house gets NOTHING...Sooo...whether it's for the cause or for the perks - please:


Make Some Noise and Spread The Word! : )

Estimated Cost:$3,000


They need to have the blueprints for the vision for their center drawn up and approved, as this will help them in future fundraising endeavors, as well as in presentations to foundations and investors: 

Estimated Cost: $3,000 ***Service Offered**** (Yay : )
Estimated Cost for Presentation Preparation: $5,000



Thus far, ALL of the work that has been put into creating this organization has been lovingly done by either Sara Donnelly or Mara Williams herself. With the expansion of their vision, and more and more people wanting to become involved, it would be impossilble for them to continue their work alone. In order to ensure that every question about this Center is answered, and every future marketing and/or fundraising event is upheld, they desperately need to hire more personnel.



Estimated Cost: $2,000/Month



To expand the awareness of Inanna House and their unique vision, they need to hire a Publicist/Marketer to publicize, organize, and help find connections.



Estimated Cost: $3,000/Month



This Publicist/Marketer will most definitely be in need of marketing material and promotional products from Inanna House:



Estimated Cost: $2,000

I'm a FIRM believer in the "Divide and Conquer" method, and I KNOW there are enough people out there to make this happen. I'm not asking for HUGE monetary contributions, in fact I'd rather not. Just a little from a LOT of like-minded people, and we're there! So please, take a look at our AWESOME perks, contribute if you can, and make some noise by using the Indiegogo Share Tools to get the word out if you can't. That's it!  
One Last Thing...
All Perks will be received within 5-7 business days after the 45 day campaign is over. I would LOVE to send them out sooner, but this is an ALL or NOTHING situation...if we can't reach $17,000 within the allotted time frame, ALL contributions will be refunded, and Inanna house gets NOTHING...Sooo...whether it's for the cause or for the perks - please:
Make Some Noise and Spread The Word! : )

story:

Tattoos in New York City are very expensive. I realize I've made my bed and should now sleep in it but if you've ever felt like something awful is hanging over your head and if you'd had a second chance you'd be king, help me achieve this! Please!

story:
Short Summary

On 3/14/14 Danny Simard aka "Rave-N-Bust Her" skated in the Men's Roller Derby World Cup, skating for Team Ireland.  An accident happened during the Ireland vs. Germany game, winding Danny up in the hospital with a spiral break on both his tibia and fibula. He is now waiting in England for surgery and is restricted to flying back home for 6 weeks. or until the doctor clears him. It is very dangerous to fly over seas with a spiral break. Without being able to work he doesn't have a way to live. I'm trying to raise him enough money to pay for his rent and electric for next month.

It's sad when something happens but that's the risk all of us take every time we lace our skates up. Accidents happen. Those who know Rave-N, know how big his heart is and how much he has given to the derby community.

Any little bit, will help him during this very strenuous circumstance. If you don't have money to donate, please consider sharing this link and help get the word out.


(Rave-N's broken leg)


What We Need & What You Get

Goal to help Rave N out. $800.00 

This will be used to help Rave N pay his rent while he is over seas.


The Impact

Rave-N  will do his best to try and stay positive through this but I'm not sure how he is going to take being sedentary and away from his friends and home during this healing process. Lets all show Rave N how much we care for him and chip in a little so he can stay stress free, focus on healing and get back home!



Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can’t contribute, but that doesn’t mean they can’t help:

  • Ask folks to get the word out and make some noise about your campaign.
  • Remind them to use the Indiegogo share tools!

And that’s all there is to it.

story:
Thank you in advance for helping our expansion efforts

 

At Health & Hope Institute we make a significant contribution restoring patient’s well being and balance in order to create healing and harmony in their lives.

To be recognized as a preferred institution capable of empowering individuals and communities to achieve integrative health and well being by making informed decisions regarding their physical, mental and spiritual healing.

   Our gentle, safe and highly effective natural treatments include acupuncture, neuro-regulatory and manual therapies for children and adults from all over the world; injection therapy for pain relief, joint regeneration and stabilization; rejuvenation and enhanced vitality and health.

 

Please visit our website HealthHopeInstitute.com for additional information.

 

   We are expanding our 1100 sq ft practice to 2300 sq ft to maximize delivery of excellent patient care, as well as enhance comfort and well-being. We desire to install a shower, a community room for exercise and educational presentations, and additional treatment rooms.

   Our goal is to raise a minimum of $10,000.00 to cover this expansion.

At the $25 level, we will send a thank you and mention your name on our website 

At the $100 dollar level, we will include your name on a plaque or that of a departed loved one.  This plaque will be placed on our wall in the reception area. We will send a heartfelt thank you note and mention your name or that of your loved one on our website.

 At the $500 dollar level, we will recognize corporate donations on a plaque. This plaque will be placed on the wall in our community room. We will also send a heartfelt thank you note for your kind donation and mention your corporation on our website.

 

Impact

   Your kind donations will allow us to open our doors on schedule in January.

You will help us to positively impact the wellness and healing of many people over time.

Other Ways You Can Help

Visit our website at HealthHopeInstitute.com and learn more about us.

Please join our grateful and joyful hearts knowing that God is guiding the way for many more people to enjoy the amazing healing powers of nature and Alternative Medicine.

story:
West Valley Juniors 16's

WVJ volleyball club provides a safe environment for players to get together and participate in volleyball during the club season. The benefits of having this  team is to develop basic and advanced volleyball fundamentals, achieve success, develop an understanding of movement and strategy of the game and accomplishing their goals. Additional benefits from participating in club volleyball are team concepts, conditioning, forward-thinking players who have the tools to excel in volleyball and in life at any level. Our goal is to develop character through an environment that emphasizes earnestness, mutual respect and passion toward volleyball.

The club works to keep cost to a minimum. The fees collected cover things such as insurances, gym space, mailing, equipment, supplies, Arizona Region Fees, coaching compensation, uniforms, spandex and a traveling bag. Realizing that some families may need assistance, there are some fundraisers as an option. It is always the player's choice to do the fundraisers. Any generated fundraiser dollars go towards the reduction of your club fees.

We believe competitiveness; hard work and fun can and should co-exist. Players are encouraged to learn the game of volleyball, compete, and finish the season with a positive view of themselves and the game of volleyball.

We understand that not everyone can donate to help our team, but we would appreciate it if you would pass this information out to someone who could.

 

Thank you,  The West Valley Juniors 16's Volleyball Club

story:
“Caring for myself is not self-indulgence, it is self-preservation, and that is an act of political warfare.”
-Audre Lorde

Ms.Fit mag will be an unapologetically feminist, queer-friendly, body-positive web 'zine about health, fitness, and wellness, existing in a world where real women (a.k.a less than perfect) and LGBTQ folks often feel erased by mainstream health and fitness culture. We want all women and their queer allies to feel healthy, strong, and good about themselves and to live long lives of action and empowerment. And we want to have a blast doing it. Because Ms.Fit thinks that one of the most important political statement we can make is to be strong, healthy, and happy in all of our fierce, beautiful manifestations.

Ms. Fit is being put together by a team of women from various backgrounds and life and fitness experiences. In addition to their shared commitment to health, fitness, and wellness through a real-life lens, Ms.Fits editorial team and contributors are comprised of professional writers and editors, fitness trainers, parents, experts, amateurs, who are all committed to empowering women and community building around wellness, health, and social responsibility.

Here is how your funding will help:

-We will pay our contributors, because writers deserve to be paid ($1000 for first two issues).

-We will pay for our website hosting, and professional web consultation ($200/web hosting annual, $1000 web management consultation, retainer).

-We can continue to work with a kick-ass designer (fee per job).

-We will be able to subscribe to an image database ($1250/6 months).

-We can register our trademark and incorporate. (trademark clearance, $700).

Issue number one, the RE: issue will feature the following content:

RE/learning to Sleep Novelist Stephanie Kuehnert on overcoming insomnia.

RE/writing History Activist Gaylon Alcaraz outruns genetic obesity with the help of the group Black Girls Run.

RE/covery and Reclaiming Recovering from an eating disorder, essayist Chelsey Clammer makes peace with ultra-running.

RE/claiming Your Body After Pregnancy and Breastfeeding Queer mom Chai Wolfman chronicles her journey back to herself.

RE/discovering Your Active Self by RE/connecting with Childhood Joy by Novelist and Spin instructor Sarah Terez Rosenblum.

RE/genrating Muscle To ache or not to ache? Pilates instructor Marcia Brenner examines the physiology of soreness.

PLUS: trainer tips, recipes, sex advice, D.I.Y. health and fitness, self-defense, reviews, and more.

But it cannot happen without your support. Please donate what you can. Any additonal money earned will go towards producing subsequent issues.

Ms. Fit on Twitter: @MsFitMag.com

Provisional Blog Site: www.msfitmag.com

story:
We are happy to share Viberoll, the first handheld vibrating muscle roller, with the rest of world! 

There are a lot of products out there to help roll out the larger extremities, but getting on the ground and rolling around is a hassle. 

Until now there really hasn't been anything that targets the smaller extremities with real effectiveness that can be used with just one hand.

I knew I wanted something durable, yet highly effective that could target areas like forearms, shins, achilles, feet, knee area, shoulders, and neck.  I knew I wasn't the ONLY one who felt this way. 

 

Now we knew we couldn't do that with force alone, which is why we added three mode vibration to the Viberoll, which is powered by a lithium ion rechargeable battery.

Everybody deals with muscle or joint pain in one way or another. Viberoll was created to target the areas that have been ignored by all other products.

So I invite everyone looking for something to zero in on those tough to reach extremities with high effectiveness and simplicity with a tool that is small and compact. Please back our patent pending product, Viberoll, here on Kickstarter!

Testimonials

"Viberoll is a product that will revolutionize the market of vibration and rolling. With the accessibility and high-quality build, this will outlast all competitor-like products. Something to get proper myofascial work at home or on the go does not exist in a high-quality form until now with Viberoll." ~Brad Anderson, Salt Lake City Chiropractic

"Viberoll targets all the tight areas I have been trying to reach with the other, bigger rollers. It is more direct and appleis the right amount of pressure to effectively relieve tension. And its size and weight makes it convenient enough to take anywhere. It is definitely a staple in my fitness regimen. I would recommend it to anyone in the area of physical activity" ~Andrea, CPT

"In my profession, my hands are my most valuable tools. Diagnostically and therapeutically. I use my hands with every patient/client interaction. Anything that increases the longevity of my ability to perform these manual skills, I consider to be invaluable. VibeRoll is that tool. It allows me to assess and treat the targeted tissue while maintaining ideal biomechanics at my hand, wrist, and arm. There are various other tools out there that practitioners use to help mitigate the stress on their bodies, essentially using the tool as an extension of his/her own body. None do that as well as Viberoll. Every try to do deep tissue work on someone by pushing and rolling a foam roller or lacrosse ball on them? It is nearly impossible, and by the end of the day ,that practitioner has exhausted his/her own body. Viberoll is designed with the practitioner's ergonomics at the forefront - extending the career life or any one who relies on their hands as much as I do. Thanks Rob, and thank you Viberoll!" ~George Shirley, Doctor of Physical Therapy and Sports Medicine

CUSTOMS & DUTIES INFORMATION 

Cannot mark as gift, this is illegal so we will not be able to do this.

For US backers we will pay for import and duties. For all other countries we are unable to cover VAT and GST, but will do our best to get it to you in the most cost efficient way possible and any savings we can discover, we will pass on to you.

As many of you know, our terms of sale are CIF destination. This means that we pay all freight, but none of the duties or taxes except for US backers. As we are shipping these products all over the world, it is impossible for us to build in the various duties, VAT and GST tax for each location through Kickstarter.

EXCHANGE & RETURN POLICY 

We do not do returns for crowdfunding products. However, if you receive the wrong product, our exchange policy lasts 30 days from when your product arrived according to the tracking # we sent you. If 30 days have gone by since your purchase, unfortunately we can’t offer you an exchange. To be eligible for an exchange, your item must be unused, free from dirt, dust or damage and in the same package and condition that you received it. If your return passes our inspection, you may receive an exchange. Customer is responsible for 2-way shipping. If you have a factory defect, you may apply for your warranty and we will send you a new product. See warranty guidelines below.

SHIPPING POLICY

If our shipping carrier attempts delivery to you and you don't get it because you’re not there, wrong address, moved without notifying us, and the package returns back to our warehouse, we will not be able to send you another product.

When you receive your tracking #, please keep an eye out for the package.

WARRANTY 

Our products come with a 90-day warranty starting on the day of receipt. You will need to apply for RA# and pay for the shipping to send your product in. When we have received your product with the associated RA# attached, if the product truly has a defect we will fix or replace your product and refund your shipping.

Risks and challenges

Our team has worked tirelessly for the past year to minimize any possible project risks. Financing requirements, supply chain and production are always a risk but we have multiple contingencies in place to help ensure execution. We have been working with a product design and development firm, Klugonyx, who also has a partner manufacturing company overseas. Our delivery times are expected to meet all set deadlines. We are committed to providing ongoing updates as the project progresses.

We are committed to providing ongoing updates as the project progresses.

story:
In these challenging times, it's essential to know that You, Your loved ones, Your colleagues and employees are healthy

According to the FDA, body temperature is one of the critical factors to determine if a person is healthy. But current solutions to measure body temperature are either providing episodical results (traditional thermometers) or inaccurate (non-contact scanners).

That's why we've developed PouchPASS - an Always-on, Precise, No Charging Required Body Temperature Monitoring System. 

PouchPASS comes with Mobile App, Data Dashboard, and Free Lifetime Subscription for all Indiegogo backers.

Always-on: unlike other solutions - thermometers, forehead scanners that only measure body temperature at checkpoints, PouchPASS gives you continuous measurement throughout the day, allowing you to identify health issues and act faster. 

Precise: PouchPASS uses MAX30208 – a Clinical grade temperature sensor with up to ± 0.1 °C/°F measurement accuracy.

No Charging Required: PouchPASS comes with a CR2032 battery that can last up to three (3) months. The battery is easy to replace.

Mobile App: Record your temperature readings in your diary; see historical body temperature data. Available in iOS and Android app stores.

Data Dashboard: A killer feature for your business: with the PouchPASS dashboard, you can easily add all the people in your organization, monitor their temperature in realtime, and track contact history.

Free Lifetime Subscription: An Exclusive offer for all our backers on Indiegogo. A way to say a BIG THANK YOU to all of you for supporting PouchPASS!

 

What's inside the box?

  • PouchBAND is both water and dust resistant, with no charging required, making it comfortable to wear (suitable for kids and elderly)
  • Using a sophisticated calibration algorithm and a state of the art sensor, PouchBAND provides with high-accuracy body temperature data every minute
  • PouchBAND comes in 3 different sizes (Small, Medium and Large) and 5 different colors (Green, Black, Blue, Red and Grey)
  • PouchBAND comes with free mobile app (Android and iOS) with temperature diary, family watch list and symptoms tracking features (all following extremely high privacy standards)
 
. 
 
 

 

For Families with Kids and Elderly 

Use Case

Brenda has a large family: besides her husband she has 2 young children and 2 parents that she is taking care of. Recently she has been worried that her loved ones can get sick so she has been constantly trying to protect them. However, her parents live far away and her kids don’t like to sit still at home and often play with their neighbours. Checking that they are healthy has been a big challenge!

Brenda bought a family package and gave both her kids and her parents a temperature monitoring wristband. Now Brenda:

  • Can see how her parents are feeling even if they live far away, she also gets notified if their temperature rises above normal
  • Doesn’t need to bother her kids with daily temperature checks and questions, as with PouchPASS she can constantly see their health status in real-time

 

 

Key Features

Temperature Monitor and Diary!    

Track your body temperature continuously without interpersonal contact. Record your temperature readings in your own personal diary. Available in iOS and Android app stores for FREE.

 

 

Symptoms Log and Family Monitoring!

Record your health symptoms and store them in your diary. Monitor your loved ones through the watch list feature (members' consent required for privacy protection).

 

Alerts and notifications!

PouchPASS app will send you automatic alerts & notifications that can be very useful when tracking body temperature of your loved ones—especially for kids and elderly.

 

Last but not least the Band itself

PouchPASS’ unique intelligent calibration algorithm allows the thermal sensor to generate high-accuracy data measurement. This is the heart of PouchPASS’ robust application system, providing reliability of temperature measurements.

The bracelet’s “sleeve” is made from hypoallergenic silicone and polycarbonates (PC), which gives a smooth surface feel with flexibility, thus making it comfortable to wear. Attached to the bracelet is a removable, Bluetooth (BLE 5.0) beacon with a clinical grade digital temperature sensor.

The attractive bracelet, PouchBAND, comes in 3 sizes:

  • Small (11-16cm) - for kids
  • Medium (15-20cm)
  • Large (18-23cm)

 

PouchBAND is 100% water and dust resistant—can be used whilst washing the dishes or even while showering. The PouchBAND is powered by one replaceable CR2032 Lithium coin battery which will see users through months of uninterrupted use - no charging required.

 

 

Family Set-Up

After you receive your first PouchBAND it takes only a few minutes to download the FREE application and set up the product:

Step 1: download our FREE mobile app from iOS or Android App stores

Step 2: create an account and pair your wristband

Step 3: put on your wristband and start measuring your temperature anytime / anywhere

 

For Business Owners

Use case

Chris is running an Asian fusion restaurant. It is important for him to make sure that his guests feel safe in his restaurant. He has 12 staff and monitoring their temperature every morning has been slowing down his operations. He is also concerned that the gun thermometer  that he is using might not be as precise since it measures the temperature only at 1 moment in time.

Chris bought a Small Business package and provided all his employees with temperature monitoring wristbands. He also bought a gateway not to rely on the employees’ handphones. Now Chris:

 

  • Can monitor seamlessly the temperature of all his employees through a dedicated dashboard accessible through the web
  • Can also monitor the contact history and see which employees have been in contact over the past 14 days. So in case somebody falls sick he can notify the ones that have been in contact with him to stay at home for a few days.

 

Chris also published a PouchPASS widget on his webpage to inform his guests about the fact that all his employees are healthy and is gaining a competitive advantage over his competition by doing so. 

 

 

Key Features

Online Dashboard & Bluetooth for Businesses

You have a bigger organization? Need to implement temperature screening? Use our online dashboard to import all the members belonging to your organization. Monitor their temperature in realtime using the dashboard.

Bluetooth Gateway

Install Bluetooth gateway at your business location to capture the wristband data without the need of the mobile phone.

 

 

Contact History 

Need to know who has been in contact with whom? This is all possible as long as you adhere to our very stringent privacy policy.

Users will have full transparency on which information is being shared and will also have the ability to change the settings at anytime.  PouchPASS values your privacy - you are in control of the personal data you share.

 

 

Family Set-Up

If you are buying PouchPASS for a larger community, or for your business, you can set-up a web dashboard that will extremely be handy to manage all the data that will be received from the members of the organisation.

Step 1: register online at PouchPASS.com

Step 2: add members of your organization to your online dashboard

Step 3: monitor daily temperature & symptom records of all members of the organisation as well as see members profiles and contact history (members approval required for Privacy)

Other use cases include: communities, schools, hospitals, factories and airports

 

Product in Action 

See what our first clients say about PouchPASS:

 

Family Clients

Naomi, mum of 2 kids, 3 and 5 years old.

“I used it on my 3 year-old when she had a slight fever, was quite happy with the hour-by-hour temp monitoring all night”

 

Charles, Managing Director of Nanotag Hong Kong 

"It gives peace of mind knowing my temperature is normal and should there be a spike, will advise me quickly which allows time to seek medical attention. Knowing this, gives me the trust as a Distributor, to be able to convey to others the products value"

 

 

Business Clients

Ratri, Corporate Finance and Business Development at Sahid Group

“As a service-focused industry, our primary concern during this challenging period is to keep our hotel guests and employees safe and healthy at our times. We chose PouchPASS solution as it would enable us to closely monitor our employees’ health at all times in real-time and transparent manner, enhancing our already-comprehensive health SOPs implemented across our properties. We are confident this solution will also allow our employees in self-monitoring their own and their colleagues' wellbeing, creating a strong community that prioritizes health and safety.”

 

 
 

Razlan, Team Principal, PETRONAS Sepang Racing Team

"PouchNATION is the leader in crowd management technologies so for PETRONAS Sepang Racing Team to be able to harness their temperature-monitoring PouchPASS to help mitigate the COVID-19 pandemic is of great assistance to the team as we return to racing. Dorna, IRTA and FIM have done a tremendous amount of work for us to be able to race again, and the PouchNation technology makes the implementation of this element of the team’s Health and Safety protocol efficient and effective in its deployment."

 

 

Who is behind PouchPASS?

PouchNATION

PouchNATION is SEA’s Leader in Crowd Management Technologies, IoT, Contactless Payments, and Behavioral Analytics. With 6 physical offices across the world, PouchNATION has successfully sold millions of wearables across different industries (mass gatherings, hospitality, etc.) and established itself as the market leader in the space.

During recent developments that are transforming the world, PouchNATION integrated into its wearable technology a Body Temperature Sensor to allow all businesses and households to do Health Screening checks. The vision is to promote a safe and healthy environment both at home and at work powered by the latest of the art contactless IoT technology.

 

 

PouchPASS in the NEWS

Since the launch of PouchPASS we've received tremendous interest from the media all around the world see below some of the features in media, and TV episodes. 

Read more about us in the following links:

https://e27.co/pouchnation-is-changing-the-game...

https://pouchpass.com/newsroom/

 

Why Indiegogo?

The vision is to promote a safe and healthy environment both at home and at business locations powered by the latest state of the art contactless IoT technology. We value a lot opinions and feedback and hence we've decided to have an open-minded discussion with the Indiegogo community. We believe that together we can enhance PouchPASS functionalities even more to fit the everyday needs of our lives.

Especially during these challenging times it is extremely important to have a transparent dialogue. We want to tell our story, where we come from and what we have achieved to date and Indiegogo is a perfect platform to do so.

We are ready for production. With over 3.8 million units shipped to its happy owners globally, we stand behind our products and supply chain with confidence and ensure 100% guaranteed delivery. The shipment will start in September

 

Our Timeline

 

We are ready to Ship the product!

The product is being produced in large quantities and will be shipped to the early supporters. We are also constantly working  with our technical team to include additional features and new designs of the wristband.

Wristband Design:

Product Specifications:

 

 

Our production facilities:

But current solutions to measure body temperature are either providing episodical results (traditional thermometers) or inaccurate (non-contact scanners).That's why we've developed PouchPASS - an Always-on, Precise, No Charging Required Body Temperature Monitoring System. PouchPASS comes with Mobile App, Data Dashboard, and Free Lifetime Subscription for all Indiegogo backers.Always-on: unlike other solutions - thermometers, forehead scanners that only measure body temperature at checkpoints, PouchPASS gives you continuous measurement throughout the day, allowing you to identify health issues and act faster. Precise: PouchPASS uses MAX30208 – a Clinical grade temperature sensor with up to ± 0.1 °C/°F measurement accuracy.No Charging Required: PouchPASS comes with a CR2032 battery that can last up to three (3) months. The battery is easy to replace.Mobile App: Record your temperature readings in your diary; see historical body temperature data. Available in iOS and Android app stores.Data Dashboard: A killer feature for your business: with the PouchPASS dashboard, you can easily add all the people in your organization, monitor their temperature in realtime, and track contact history.Free Lifetime Subscription: An Exclusive offer for all our backers on Indiegogo. story:
Get ALL the use of a regular towel and many MORE. It's so lightweight you can fold and put it in your pocket if you choose to, unlike the regular towel. Also, Get up to 40% OFF through Indiegogo Campaign.

  • No more tying a knot or a choker
  • Don't leave your towel behind when you go running outdoors
  • Stop loosing towels frequently forgetting where you left it
  • No need to tuck it in and ruin the collar of your favorite T-Shirt
  • Work in the garden or outdoors and move freely
  • Do your Pre-workout stretch without having to put your towel away first
  • Own a High Quality, Quick Dry, Woven Suede Fabric Gym/Sports Towel
  • This towel is also Anti-Bacterial, Microfiber, Super Absorbent and Lightweight
  • Go climb those rocks with your FiTow

Suede material is very lightweight, yet more absorbent than regular Terry towel.

  • Thank you for taking the time to stop by, I'm the Founder/CEO of Workout or Walkout, Inc. I worked at various gyms prior to starting my Sporting Goods Company. I played college soccer, coached little leagues soccer, worked in other industry before joining the health & fitness industry.
  • This project is more than important to me because I currently live in south Florida where the weather is warm year round and sometimes I just want to trade a treadmill run for a jog at the park or even a walk without loosing my lightweight towel to the wind. This fitness towel will be able to stay in place when tucked into either side of its opening without having to tie a knot. Its efficiency helps reduce inconveniences and minimize lost while also being easily accessible for use.
  • Before filing for the patent, I had to work through every scenario to make sure it works as described. First, I created a prototype from an existing "gym towel" before making the actual product.
  • This is a simple yet an innovative idea that will change the way most gym towels are made. But it will not become a reality without your support.
  • Reaching our goal is just the first step to becoming the industry leader in this new category. Surpassing our goal will establish our brand in the market place. So get this towel that you know you need and in the process, proudly support the good causes that we are affiliated with.

 

What We Need & What You Get

  • Our goal is set low because we are past the production stage and are launching on Indiegogo at our introductory price for early birds.
  • Obviously the more order we get, the better and the more towels we can make for our customers.
  • Pick a perk of your choice or show your support through this campaign. Your support for our company is greatly appreciated.

Risks & Challenges

The process is in place right this minute and we do not foresee any delays at this time. If there's anything of concern, we will be sure to update you and keep you posted.

About the Founder

When I started this company, I soon realized the market is tough and needed to figure out a way to stand out from the crowd besides the catchy name and logos. Being an inventor, turned CEO, I created a machine for abs that is currently not in the market but the cost of getting it ready for retail was extremely high. Out of frustration I decided to go for a 5mile jog to blow off steam. It was a bit windy out so I tucked in my gym towel underneath the collar of my T-shirt as always. The 5 miles was never completed, instead, I went back home to the drawing board where FiTow was born.

 

  • I'm the Founder/CEO of Workout or Walkout, Inc. (www.workoutorwalkout.com) and my goal in life is to leave the world a better place than it was when I came in.
  • I've worked at other gyms prior to starting my Sporting Goods Company. And yes, I use to pickup towels daily from the treadmill handles and around the gym that people left behind.
  • I've had experience in almost every position there in various works of life from ground level janitor to management including volunteering.
  • My consulting CFO has over 30 years experience and currently owns equity in the company so his drive for this to succeed is just as high as mine.
  • I have great relationship with my manufacturers and they are always willing to go the extra mile if need be.
  • My work ethics is second to none. Currently, I will out work any employee any given day and always have period.
  • My drive for success is very personal. Obstacle is my favorite "energy drink" besides 5hr energy drink and sometimes coffee...lol.
  • I love distractions and setbacks because it provides the opportunity to show my true commitment and resolution abilities. Besides, it's part of life so it's a take it or leave it situation from my point of view.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • Can't get one? No worries, you can still make some noise about our campaign.
  • I know you've heard about Facebook, Twitter, Instagram and so on. SHARE IT NOW!!!
  • Checkout the Indiegogo share tools and put them to use!

And that's all there is to it for now folks.Stay healthy my friends!!!

I love distractions and setbacks because it provides the opportunity to show my true commitment and resolution abilities. Besides, it's part of life so it's a take it or leave it situation from my point of view.


Other Ways You Can Help
Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

Can't get one? No worries, you can still make some noise about our campaign.
I know you've heard about Facebook, Twitter, Instagram and so on. SHARE IT NOW!!!

story:
The Why

I am Khadija Tudor, a Licensed Massage Therapist & Doula. A close look at my clients, led me to a realization which hit me like a ton of bricks: our similarities of self neglect.  Many of my clients are women, most  are mothers; an uncommon amount had lost a connection to the importance of Self Care.

The following question was challenged to all my clients, "What's Your Project?" Ask yourself the same question.  Have you forgotten your original project...YOURself?!

 The act of juggling life has us neglecting our health.  Stress is ravaging our lives.  Wellness is absent and imbalance over-flowing.

I Get It! I am a mother of a large family and I know firsthand how Self Care can be easily neglected. Seeing the need, the Khadija Hands Project was created with a community of healers sharing a common & necessary goal - putting our health & wellness FIRST!

In 2015, we launched an ambitious campaign to create a healthy change.  And we did it!  With thoughtfully curated wellness events & workshops rooted in the healing arts, we gathered in restaurants, schools and rented event spaces, bringing the healing  work to women and the community.   Every wellness event was attended beyond capacity. The positive response told us what we suspected  ~ we could answer the need! 

The How

There is more work to do!

We need your help to invest $12,000.00 toward the initial rental cost of a beautiful commercial rental space in the historic and fast-changing neighborhood of Bedford Stuyvesant, Brooklyn, NY.

We have forged a revolutionary wellness movement and it needs a home!

Are you ready to invest in your wellness?  Are you ready to be part of the revolution?


The Impact

Your contribution will make a valuable difference in the life of the women who walk through the future doors of the  Khadija Hands Project Wellness Center.  She will be entering into a space where she will have access to wellness resources that will help her be a balanced woman.  Her family benefits, her community benefits but more importantly she benefits! 

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just cannot contribute, but that doesn't mean you can't help:

  • Make a loud noise with Khadija Hands Project.  Share this in your  Social Media community!
Thank You,
Khadija Tudor, LMT , Doula

story:
The First App-Controlled Wireless Pain Relief Device.

Transcutaneous Electrical Nerve Stimulation, or "TENS" devices have been prescribed by doctors as an effective way to reduce or even eliminate pain. TENS works by sending tiny electrical signals through the skin to intercept pain signals from reaching the brain, and help release endorphins, the body's natural pain-fighting chemical. 

The device is  medical grade and FDA-cleared, but does not require a prescription.

While TENS devices typically come with a separate unit and wires, iTENS is completely wireless, wearable, and flexible. The lithium-ion battery provides 24 hours of use on a single charge, and the peel 'n' stick gel pads are reusable and replaceable for multiple applications. The iTENS gives freedom from bulky devices and wires, so it can be worn under clothing, discreetly, any time or place.

Fully Adjustable to Fit Your Needs.

Multiple iTENS can be used on the body at one time. The main screen controls the power and intensity of the devices.

Choose preselected programs for ideal pain relief of specific areas or conditions, or set to manual mode to create a customized program to fit your needs.

Track your pain relief results before and after each session and see your long term results over time. 

Behind the Design

"The iTENS device was created for people who are in need of a portable, convenient method of pain management that doesn't involve taking prescription medication," says iTENS CEO Joshua Lefkovitz. "We designed the iTENS to be thin, flexible, discreet, and easy to operate from the iTENS app."

 

Most wearable medical technologies that work in tandem with a smart phone have been used to gather data or deliver biofeedback, whereas the iTENS actually delivers a therapeutic treatment stimuli to provide instant and long-lasting pain relief that the user can control. In addition, the iTENS measures your pain scale, tracks your results, and charts your progress.

The itens device is available in 2 different sizes, each with 2 color options:

 

SMALL WINGS -  great for ankle, knee, elbow, wrist and other small treatment areas

LARGE WINGS - great for back, shoulder & large treatment areas

The Generation 2 Wings give increased flexibility with a rotating design for full range of motion. 

There are a few additional things that set iTENS apart from any other electrotherapy device on the market:

  •  The iTENS utilizes a patent-pending ultra-thin, multi-layer rotating wing structure that is fully flexible which allows you to apply devices to specific pain areas.
  • Laser printed silver conductive surface to provide an unmatched quality of stimulation that doesn't feel pin-prickly or sharp like other TENS devices.  
  • The reusable gel pads are made of the highest quality gel available, and due to the design of the device, are a low cost when you need to refill. 
  • Updates will be a cinch with the app-based technology, so improving settings and accessing more programs will be as simple as updating the app.

Meet Our Team

President and Owner Josh Leftkovitz  is a graduate of the Ohio State School of Finance, and the owner of several businesses based in Akron, Ohio. Since 2001, he has developed a range of companies including medical device company Pain Management Technologies, ecommerce business Helio Living, and Brighteye Innovations, which includes the Zing Anything brand, developed to create unique and useful innovations to help enable a healthier diet. 

Blake Gibbs is a Kent State University Student studying business, and the "chief go-getter" at iTENS.  He is the biggest advocate for iTENS because he uses it every day to help with pain caused by a car accident. Blake is the youngest member of the team and loves to head out on the road to spread the word about the benefits of iTENS.

Scott Overholt is an Account Executive for ITENS handling international distributors and a wholesale account manager for Pain Management Technologies. His experience in the medical device industry brought Scott to PMT. He specializes in sales and service for TENS devices for for both companies.  

Phil Getz is an Account Executive for ITENS handling international and domestic sales and an International Sales Manager for Zing Anything. Phil has 35 years experience in sales for Consumer Packaged Goods industry and joined the Brighteye Innovations team in 2007.

Noelle Liptak is the Marketing Manager for iTENS as well as Zing Anything. She is a graduate of the MBA program from Point Park University. She also works as an Account Manager for Zing Anything and brings creativity to the marketing and social media for both brands. 

 

Testimonials

"Works really well. I love not having wires attached to it!" 

- Brian C.

"I have tried many other electrotherapy devices on the market but wasn't happy with the results until I stumbled across the iTens. The product works wirelessly with my iPhone and there's no cords to get in the way. It's an extremely practical device for someone who travels a lot like myself." 

- Blake G.

"I have finally found a solution for my arthritic aches and pains!" 

- R. Cooper

"I fell 2 stories at age 3, and my pain got so bad as an adult that I couldn't do a lot of everyday things. I've been using my itens for about 4 months now. I'm able to finally sit through SS and church service. I can go on car rides to visit friends and family. I end up turning it up pretty high the longer I sit, but it helps a lot! It's given me some of my life back

- Kasey S

Videos:

Set Up and Troubleshooting:

 

Tips and Tricks for using the iTENS:

 

iTENS being packed and shipped!
story_txt:
The First App-Controlled Wireless Pain Relief Device.
Transcutaneous Electrical Nerve Stimulation, or "TENS" devices have been prescribed by doctors as an effective way to reduce or even eliminate pain. TENS works by sending tiny electrical signals through the skin to intercept pain signals from reaching the brain, and help release endorphins, the body's natural pain-fighting chemical. 
The device is  medical grade and FDA-cleared, but does not require a prescription.

While TENS devices typically come with a separate unit and wires, iTENS is completely wireless, wearable, and flexible. The lithium-ion battery provides 24 hours of use on a single charge, and the peel 'n' stick gel pads are reusable and replaceable for multiple applications. The iTENS gives freedom from bulky devices and wires, so it can be worn under clothing, discreetly, any time or place.
Fully Adjustable to Fit Your Needs.
Multiple iTENS can be used on the body at one time. The main screen controls the power and intensity of the devices.

It's given me some of my life back
