story:
MEGASUS HORSERUNNERS:

The world’s first clippable runners for horses, using our patent pending Mega Lock Fastener Technology.

 

We have developed brand new hoof protection for horses using cutting edge technology.

Meet the Megasus Horserunners - the world’s first shock absorbing hoof protection that allows all natural hoof movements and works on any type of terrain. Think of these as the first DIY running shoes for horses!

Our patent pending high performance fastener system allows you to easily clip the Megasus Horserunners on and off at maximum convenience for both, horse and owner – without using any nails! FABULOUS!

 

 

 

  

 

Megasus Horserunners are the first clippable runners for horses, a non-permanent hoof protection that is as easy to put on as it is to take off - just like your running shoes. Without any iron or nails! But that´s not all!
 
Megasus Horserunners are the result of long-standing research and study of horse hooves for twenty years. We found the common understanding of the functioning of the hoof to be wrong. People still think that hooves are rigid and stiff only able to move 1-4mm on a horizontal plane - this is simply not the case. As early as 1998, we proved the existence of vertical hoof movements and published our first study in the renowned science magazine GEO.
 
In a wedge experiment we glued wedges under one heel of horse’s hoof and found out that the hoof could compensate for wedges between 1-2 cm (0,4-0,8”) without any impact on the joint. From here we concluded that the hoof works similar to a joint, compensating uneven grounds. When fixing the hoof with rigid material such as iron, tendons and ligaments will become immobilized - a feeling comparable to wearing a cast. Megasus Horserunners are flexible and allow all 3-dimensional natural hoof movements on any type of terrain. Flexible doesn´t mean soft, as the hoof itself isn´t soft. It means that the hoof protection should only move under the weight of the horse.
 

Why are Megasus Horserunners non-permanent?

Imagine not cutting your toenail and letting it grow for two months. Besides it being a bit gross, how would it feel if you tried to put on your shoes? Would they still fit? A horse has to stand on that long toenail and carry all its weight. In two months a hoof grows 1-2cm (0,4-0,8”). A permanent hoof protection of 6 to 8 sometimes 12 weeks has a negative influence on tendons and ligaments, causing serious tension in the hoof.
 
Megasus Horserunners are non-permanent to ensure hooves are kept in the same natural shape throughout the year and allow the horse to walk barefoot to strengthen its hooves, tendons and ligaments. And when it´s time for performance: clip on Megasus Horserunners! We love horses and we care about their health. And we love movement- when horses are poetry in motion. We think that sports and movement keep us and our horses healthy.
 
That´s the reason why we´ve invented a hoof protection for all types of terrain in every gait. To speed on! Megasus Horserunners - keep on moving!   
 

 

 

 

 

 

Lift up your horse’s leg, take a ruler and measure the widest point of the hoof. E.g. if your measured value is 124mm, you will need the Megasus Horserunners in size 130.

 

 

 

 

 

 
 
 

The Megasus Task Force consists of a group of horse lovers who tirelessly test our prototypes and give us their trust. Four selected members of this team would like to share their experiences with you.

 

 

 

 

 

 

1. Pledging: when will I get to choose which color and size of Megasus Horserunners I want? After the campaign ends, we will send out a survey where you can choose which Megasus color version and size you want.

2. Donation: I don´t have a horse but I want to support your idea. How can I do that? We introduce two valuable charitable organizations working with horses: a german rescue rider team and an austrian organization helping seriously ill children. You buy Megasus and we deliver size and color to your favourite organization.

 

 

 

 

We've now finalized all our Megasus Horserunners prototypes, but moving to the production phase requires significant capital and scale because we will need a tool for every size. We need your help to finance the required resources and ensure we can meet minimum order targets. We've spent months and months working out the tiniest of details about this project, and are very excited over the prospect of finally having the opportunity to bring the fun of movement and comfort to you and your horse.

 

 

 

 We offer GLOBAL SHIPPING to all of you. To make it easy for everyone we will have just two different shipping rates. "Europe € 15" and "Rest of the world € 20" for every reward (except postcards: we offer FREE SHIPPING).

 

 

 

 

 

 

Thank you for reading this far! We cannot tell you how much we appreciate it. Thank you, in advance, for your investment to this campaign. It’s because of YOU that we can allow horses a more comfortable run and put the minds of horse lovers at ease. If, for any reason you are not able to donate to this campaign right now, that’s no problem! You can still help us out by sharing this project on your social media pages and helping us get the word out.

story:
Who are we?

UK Health Radio, or UKHR, for short, is a relatively new Internet radio station – 100% independent and the first of its kind outside the USA!

As our name suggests, we are UK-based and we focus primarily on health and wellness. Because this is an Internet-based medium, our ‘reach’ is global. So it will not surprise you to hear that our programming is not just national, but international in style. Our commitment is to world-class excellence, abhorring parochial prejudice or ‘little Englander’ narrow-mindedness.

UKHR is a good-information station. It aspires to be real feel-good radio, extending beyond just physical health and embracing all aspects of body, mind and spirit, in an honest open-minded manner.

Meet the Team:


Who’s listening?

As you can see from the bar-chart, well over one third of our listeners are aged between 25 and 34. This is the single biggest group by a significant margin.

If you do the Math, as the Americans say, you can see that 4 out of 5 of our listeners are currently under 55.

And only 4% are past the current retirement age for males.

As for gender, you can see from the pie chart that while our profile has a distinct female bias, men are still strongly represented.

24 hours a day, every day, we broadcast programmes primarily for health-conscious adults, as well as progressive healthcare professionals.

Anyone with a computer, a tablet, a smart-phone or a new generation car radio can tune in to UKHR, any time, anywhere. The potential could therefore be measured in billions. Being realistic, our audience could one day be millions!

Our mission is to create a global community of better informed people and to provide the professionals who serve them with a new forum for evidence-based ideas on best practice.

We want to provide a platform for important issues to be aired, worldwide. We want to make a difference on a global scale – however small. We want to give the world a new voice and a new freedom.

Online and on air, UKHR promotes wellbeing as being far more important than either great wealth or material possessions.

Our website is designed to provide a primary source of the latest ideas in health and fitness, diet and nutrition, illness prevention and cure.

It also provides the professional with a platform on which either to promote or to challenge new ideas. (There is nothing like healthy debate in order to stimulate progress!)

Our magazine Health Triangle Magazine is evidence that we practise what we preach. It is online only, so no forests are put at risk to produce it. It goes out to some 250,000 readers every month, without using any petrol, postage, paper or diesel.

We use both Facebook and Twitter to spread the good news quickly and cost-effectively.

The fact that you are reading this indicates that you are already part of our present to some degree or other. If you would like to play a part in our future, now is your chance!

You can help UKHR remain independent and grow even stronger in its mission to improve the quality of life for listeners on every single continent.


We are aiming to raise at least £200,000


We need a minimum of £200,000 to cover our operational expenses such as setting up our office and studio for live radio. This will also enable us to do the following:

  • UKHR Studio and Premises: Right now we have the weekly shows, the monthly e-magazine and a great group of health experts regularly sharing their knowledge experience and passion. Very soon, we want to produce more of our own original broadcast-quality material on a daily basis, including live shows. To do this we need to set up our own new studio. Financial access to the tools and services is where the mainstream commercial stations out-gun new independents like UK Health Radio.


  • Team of Experts: This goes hand in hand with the studio and premises and our wish to do live radio. Live radio gives us more opportunities for interactivity and bringing groups of experts together in one room. We can then direct our search for experts in the different fields and it also means having the premises to conduct radio presenter workshops as not all experts are radio savvy.


  • Job and Training Opportunities: This also incorporates intern and apprenticeships. Not only the technical side of actually being able to operate a studio but the nitty gritty of what it takes to put a show together before going on-air. The research itself and how much of it is actually needed. Working together with the experts to pinpointing requested subject matter received from our listeners and then concentrating the research on exactly that and therefor improving the quality and relevance of our content.  

Show samples:

Health Matters with Stella Kazazis


Homeopathy for Life with Atiq Bhatti


Health Kicks with John Hicks


Sugar Diaries with Laura Thomas


Perks:

UK Health Radio: A Declaration of Independence and an Appeal for Support…
Remember, UK Health Radio is totally independent..
When UKHR first launched, we were rich in Independence and Ideals, but short on Cash and Capital. Ironically, this suited our pioneering spirit and attracted talent more concerned with sharing valuable information than either status or salaries. We were – and are – a cottage industry, albeit a 21st Century industry made possible by the Internet and micro technology.
Our mission was and is “To give people a new voice”.
Now we need to invest in a Studio of our own and we would like YOU to be part of it – and part of our future, through our “I'm one in a Million” campaign!


Donations with a difference, donations with Benefits!

We are deliberately adopting a 50:50 approach to our “I'm one in a Million” campaign fund-raising. For every donation of £50 and more that comes in, 50% will go to a good cause chosen by at least one of our Donors.
We expect donations to come from anywhere in the world and by the same token, we will support good causes and people in need anywhere in the world.
Obviously, if we had 100,000 individual donations, it would be practically impossible for an organisation of our size to pass on the promised 50% to 100,000 different good causes, so here’s how we see it working, at different levels of donation:


Donate £50 and qualify for recognition on Bricks and Clicks!

50% of your £50 donation immediately goes into our “people in need” pool and your generosity is acknowledged in perpetuity with the promise of your name on our new “wall of fame” - in the new Studio and also online on our website.
Any interest earned by “people in need” pool will be retained exclusively for the finally selected beneficiary, who will be chosen in a simple draw on a random basis - by ‘the Universe’!
In practice, every donor’s name will go into a draw. If your name is chosen, you will be asked to nominate an individual to benefit, anywhere in the world. Obviously, any individual you nominate must be genuinely in need and even then will not personally receive the money – this will go directly to the organisation providing the service or the company supplying the goods.
Subject to those sensible provisos, the beneficiary will be your choice, not ours, and the sum that you became responsible for in the draw must be used to improve the quality of their life in terms of health or wellbeing.

Donate £150 and get a A5 advert in our Health Triangle magazine 

Our monthly, on-line digital, health and wellness magazine (Health triangle Magazine) has a 250 000 strong mailing list in the UK and is promoted virally from which sponsors benefit directly. As an interactive magazine, we can now include videos and other media. All magazines stay on the UKHR website as pdf download, so content and web-links stay visible permanently. For a donation of £150 you get an A5 advert in the magazine linked to content of your choice – website, landing page, etc. and your business will receive major exposure. Remember 50% this donation immediately goes into our "people in need" pool.

£200 gets you a 60-second radio commercial

 Running 6 times a day, five days a week. The 60 second commercial will be played within all the in-house produced shows. Own produced commercial can be used or if needed UKHR will assist in the production of a commercial. Please remember our 50:50 approach.

Double page advertorial/editorial & branding on  the front cover for £300 

Our monthly, on-line digital, health and wellness magazine (Health triangle Magazine) has a 250 000 strong mailing list in the UK and is promoted virally from which sponsors benefit directly. As an interactive magazine, we can now include videos and other media. All magazines stay on the UKHR website as pdf download, so content and web-links stay visible permanently. For a donation of £300 you get a double page advertorial/editorial and photographs within and branding on the front cover and your business will receive major exposure. Once again 50% this donation immediately goes into our "people in need" pool.

If you or your company donate £500 or more, 50% will go to a Charity of Choice! Or a person in need.

As a “I'm one in a Million” donor, your name and/or your company logo, will immediately secure its place on the UKHR “wall of fame” and also on our website - with links to your personal or corporate website, if required.
If your name is chosen in the draw, we will ask you personally to choose either a registered charity or a ‘person in need’.
The charity will then benefit immediately and in full.
In the case of individuals, on advice, we plan to pay the third party provider directly rather than transferring cash to the individual. So, for example, if you wanted an individual’s home to be made wheel-chair accessible, or for a stair-lift to be installed, we would pay the builder or the installer directly.
We regard transparency and accountability to be not just desirable, but absolutely essential.

How to make a name for yourself for only a fiver! £5

A donation of just £5 secures your place on our “wall of fame” in the new Studio and online on our website. This is a small but sincere acknowledgement of our appreciation of your contribution, in our time of need. What’s more, as much as anything ever can be, it’s permanent!

Tell the world for a tenner! £10

The Health Kicks (Healthy) Breakfast Show is our flagship show, fresh every morning! Because it’s on the Internet, its reach is global. Send us £10 and we will acknowledge your donation on air, using two names of your choice. For example: “Romeo? It’s Juliet!”
+ Your full name will be clearly displayed on our “wall of fame” in the Studio and on our website.

£15 gets you the message!

For a donation of £15, in addition to the “wall of fame”, we will broadcast a short message from you to whomever you wish to impress.
It might be as simple as: “Hi Annie, wish you were here! John.”
Or as immediate as: “Great dinner last night, Mark! Thanks so much…Peter”
Or as jubilant as: “Lizzie, congratulations on becoming a Mother! Graham”
Your message needs to be short and sweet. It cannot be rude, crude or defamatory.

Going for song? £25

UKHR now has a music licence, so if you can stretch to a donation of £25, we will be happy to do all of the following for you:

  • Display your name on the “wall of fame” and on our website, of course

  • Broadcast your name and your message, twice in 24 hours, first in our flagship Breakfast show, repeating it later for listeners on the other side of the world

  • Playing the song of your choice for the person of your choice, with a simple dedication

Once again, we cannot disseminate messages which are in any way toxic or infectious. (We are UK Health Radio, after all!)

Thank you for supporting UKHR, an independent pioneer in new broadcasting territory!

a distinct female bias, men are still strongly represented.

24
hours a day, every day, we broadcast programmes primarily for
health-conscious adults, as well as progressive healthcare
professionals. 


Anyone
with a computer, a tablet, a smart-phone or a new generation car
radio can tune in to UKHR, any time, anywhere. The potential could
therefore be measured in billions. Being realistic, our audience
could one day be millions!

Our
mission is to create a global community of better informed people and
to provide the professionals who serve them with a new forum for
evidence-based ideas on best practice.

We
want to provide a platform for important issues to be aired,
worldwide. We want to make a difference on a global scale – however
small. We want to give the world a new voice and a new freedom.

Online
and on air, UKHR promotes wellbeing as being far more important than
either great wealth or material possessions.

Our
website is designed to provide a primary source of the latest ideas
in health and fitness, diet and nutrition, illness prevention and
cure.

It
also provides the professional with a platform on which either to
promote or to challenge new ideas. (There is nothing like healthy
debate in order to stimulate progress!)
Our
magazine Health Triangle Magazine  is evidence that we practise what
we preach. It is online only, so no forests are put at risk to
produce it. It goes out to some 250,000 readers every month, without
using any petrol, postage, paper or diesel.

We
use both Facebook and Twitter to spread the good news quickly and
cost-effectively.

The
fact that you are reading this indicates that you are already part of
our present to some degree or other. If you would like to play a part
in our future, now is your chance!

You
can help UKHR remain independent and grow even stronger in its
mission to improve the quality of life for listeners on every single
continent.



We are aiming to raise at
least £200,000

We need a minimum of £200,000 to cover our operational expenses such as setting up our office and studio for live radio. This will also enable us to do the following:
UKHR
Studio and Premises: Right
now we have the weekly shows, the monthly e-magazine and a great
group of health experts regularly sharing their knowledge experience
and passion. Very soon, we want to produce more of our own original
broadcast-quality material on a daily basis, including live shows. To
do this we need to set up our own new studio. Financial access to the
tools and services is where the mainstream commercial stations
out-gun new independents like UK Health Radio.

Team of
Experts: This
goes hand in hand with the studio and premises and our wish to do
live radio. Live radio gives us more opportunities for interactivity
and bringing groups of experts together in one room. We can then
direct our search for experts in the different fields and it also
means having the premises to conduct radio presenter workshops as not
all experts are radio savvy.

Job
and Training Opportunities: This
also incorporates intern and apprenticeships. Not only the technical
side of actually being able to operate a studio but the nitty gritty
of what it takes to put a show together before going on-air. The
research itself and how much of it is actually needed. Working
together with the experts to pinpointing requested subject matter
received from our listeners and then concentrating the research on
exactly that and therefor improving the quality and relevance of our
content.  
Show samples:Health Matters with Stella KazazisHomeopathy for Life with Atiq BhattiHealth Kicks with John HicksSugar Diaries with Laura ThomasPerks:UK Health Radio: A
Declaration of Independence and an Appeal for Support…Remember,
UK Health Radio is totally independent..When
UKHR first launched, we were rich in Independence and Ideals, but
short on Cash and Capital. Ironically, this suited our pioneering
spirit and attracted talent more concerned with sharing valuable
information than either status or salaries. We were – and are – a
cottage industry, albeit a 21st Century industry made possible by the
Internet and micro technology.Our
mission was and is “To give people a new voice”.Now
we need to invest in a Studio of our own and we would like YOU to be
part of it – and part of our future, through our “I'm one in a
Million” campaign!
Donations
with a difference, donations with Benefits!
We
are deliberately adopting a 50:50 approach to our “I'm one in a
Million” campaign fund-raising.
For every donation of £50 and more that comes in, 50% will go to a good
cause chosen by at least one of our Donors.We
expect donations to come from anywhere in the world and by the same
token, we will support good causes and people in need anywhere in the
world.Obviously,
if we had 100,000 individual donations, it would be practically
impossible for an organisation of our size to pass on the promised
50% to 100,000 different good causes, so here’s how we see it
working, at different levels of donation:Donate
£50 and qualify for recognition on Bricks and Clicks!50%
of your £50 donation immediately goes into our “people in need”
pool and your generosity is acknowledged in perpetuity with the
promise of your name on our new “wall of fame” - in the new
Studio and also online on our website.Any
interest earned by “people in need” pool will be retained
exclusively for the finally selected beneficiary, who will be chosen
in a simple draw on a random basis - by ‘the Universe’!In
practice, every donor’s name will go into a draw. If your name is
chosen, you will be asked to nominate an individual to benefit,
anywhere in the world. Obviously, any individual you nominate must be
genuinely in need and even then will not personally receive the money
– this will go directly to the organisation providing the service
or the company supplying the goods.Subject
to those sensible provisos, the beneficiary will be your choice, not
ours, and the sum that you became responsible for in the draw must be
used to improve the quality of their life in terms of health or
wellbeing.
Donate
£150 and get a A5 advert in our Health Triangle magazine Our
monthly, on-line digital, health and wellness magazine (Health
triangle Magazine) has a 250 000 strong mailing list in the UK and is
promoted virally from which sponsors benefit directly. As an
interactive magazine, we can now include videos and other media. All
magazines stay on the UKHR website as pdf download, so content and
web-links stay visible permanently. For a donation of £150 you get
an A5 advert in the magazine linked to content of your choice –
website, landing page, etc.  and your business will receive major
exposure. Remember 50% this donation immediately goes into our "people in need" pool.

£200
gets you a 60-second radio commercial Running 6 times a day, five days a
week. The 60 second commercial will be played within all the in-house
produced shows. Own produced commercial can be used or if needed UKHR
will assist in the production of a commercial. Please remember our 50:50 approach.


Double
page advertorial/editorial & branding on  the front cover for £300 Our monthly, on-line digital, health and wellness magazine (Health
triangle Magazine) has a 250 000 strong mailing list in the UK and is
promoted virally from which sponsors benefit directly. As an
interactive magazine, we can now include videos and other media. All
magazines stay on the UKHR website as pdf download, so content and
web-links stay visible permanently. For a donation of £300 you get a
double page advertorial/editorial and photographs within and branding
on the front cover and your business will receive major exposure. Once again 50% this donation immediately goes into our "people in need" pool.If
you or your company donate £500 or more, 50% will go to a Charity of
Choice! Or a person in need.As
a “I'm one in a Million” donor, your name and/or your company
logo, will immediately secure its place on the UKHR “wall of fame”
and also on our website - with links to your personal or corporate
website, if required.If
your name is chosen in the draw, we will ask you personally to choose
either a registered charity or a ‘person in need’.The
charity will then benefit immediately and in full.In
the case of individuals, on advice, we plan to pay the third party
provider directly rather than transferring cash to the individual.
So, for example, if you wanted an individual’s home to be made
wheel-chair accessible, or for a stair-lift to be installed,  we
would pay the builder or the installer directly.We
regard transparency and accountability to be not just desirable, but
absolutely essential.How
to make a name for yourself for only a fiver! £5A
donation of just £5 secures your place on our “wall of fame” in
the new Studio and online on our website. This is a small but sincere
acknowledgement of our appreciation of your contribution, in our time
of need. What’s more, as much as anything ever can be, it’s
permanent!Tell
the world for a tenner! £10The
Health Kicks (Healthy) Breakfast Show is our flagship show, fresh
every morning! Because it’s on the Internet, its reach is global.
Send us £10 and we will acknowledge your donation on air, using two
names of your choice. For example: “Romeo? It’s Juliet!”+
Your full name will be clearly displayed on our “wall of fame” in
the Studio and on our website.£15
gets you the message!For
a donation of £15, in addition to the “wall of fame”, we will
broadcast a short message from you to whomever you wish to impress.It
might be as simple as: “Hi Annie, wish you were here! John.”Or
as immediate as: “Great dinner last night, Mark! Thanks so
much…Peter”Or
as jubilant as: “Lizzie, congratulations on becoming a Mother!
Graham”Your
message needs to be short and sweet. It cannot be rude, crude or
defamatory.Going
for song? £25UKHR
now has a music licence, so if you can stretch to a donation of £25,
we will be happy to do all of the following for you:
Display
	your name on the “wall of fame” and on our website, of course


Broadcast
	your name and your message, twice in 24 hours, first in our flagship
	Breakfast show, repeating it later for listeners on the other side
	of the world


Playing
	the song of your choice for the person of your choice, with a simple
	dedication
Once
again, we cannot disseminate messages which are in any way toxic or
infectious. (We are UK Health Radio, after all!)
Thank
you for supporting UKHR, an independent pioneer in new broadcasting
territory!

story:
Tony is Golf

I met Anthony "Tony" Aloi on our freshman hall at Furman University in 2008. He was a golfer from New Jersey that was getting his first taste of the South in college. He was undoubtedly from the North, but still had some genuine southern characteristics. He was small in stature, but certainly made up for his size with his confident (cocky when necessary) mouth. He was smart, witty, and hilarious. If you ever were feeling down or upset, all you had to do was walk down the hall to his room and he'd be there (if he wasn't on the golf course). He's the guy you want your daughter to marry. Complete gentleman, great family, and someone who is there for you when you need him. A true friend. But even more importantly Tony exemplified golf in every way possible. I have never in my life been around someone who loved something as much as Tony loves golf. It's a healthy obsession, but not an inebriation. It's an intensive, deep, and honest passion for the game. He's knowledge of golf's past and present is abundant and his desire to learn and improve his game is persistent. 

Tony graduated from Furman University in May 2013 and has been pursuing his professional golf career for a full year now. He has played in various qualifiers throughout the East Coast and has also been a member of the eGolf Professional Tour. The tough part about beginning a professional golf career is that you must fund yourself. Your work ethic, determination, and skill can only take you so far unless you have the necessary means to fund your efforts.

As his friend I want to see him succeed. I want to see him live his dream of playing in the Master's, The Players Championship, and The U.S. Open. I want to see him achieve happiness. And we all search for happiness, but not many of us know exactly what that means for our individual lives. For Tony, I know that his true joy and admiration are found within the game of golf. 

What We Need

A few weekends ago some friends and I (whom are also friends with Tony) got together and decided we'd help fund an entry fee for an upcoming tournament of Tony's. We felt as if a crowd-funding site was the most effective way to do so. 

The entry fee is $1,080, with the addition of food and gas during his stay throughout the week for a total cost of $1,300. If you contribute to this effort you will help provide support and energy to an individual who is working hard to achieve his dream and who has every intention to make it a reality. 

Contributors of all amounts will be greatly appreciated. 

Please note: If we do not reach our intended goal, all funds raised will go directly towards an upcoming tournament entry fee. 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you do not feel compelled to offer financial assistance, below are some additional ways you can help:

  • Tony's tournaments are all throughout the Carolinas. If he's close to you, simply having him over for a home-cooked meal while he's at a tournament would be extremely beneficial.
  • Send Tony some words of encouragement to help motivate his game and his dream.
  • Share this campaign with your family and friends. 

The Lasting Impression

Tony is one hell of a guy. I for one want to see him succeed. I know he can and I know he will. I also know that this effort would do wonders for his morale and confidence moving forward in his journey. 

My friends and I thank you in advance for your thoughts and consideration. 

Feel free to contact me personally with any questions or comments @benjaminrgranger@gmail.com

story:
I have always loved moving.  Physical activity and good health in general have been an important part of my core values for as long as I can remember.  I’ve been working full time in the fitness industry ever since completing my diploma 15 years ago. Helping people take control of their health has always filled me with great happiness.  I have witnessed extraordinary transformations in my participants.  In over the last few years I’ve taught to people who are in great shape, to people with reduced mobility, to people who are under the poverty line and also to people who have special needs either because of a mental or physical condition.

I want to produce workout videos and others tools that will be based on my experience and knowledge and will help limited mobility people improve their health.  Using pieces of furniture, they will be able to enjoy a full workout in the comfort of their home.  My product will be safe to use by people of all ages and various disabilities.  These people have important needs and available resources are limited and often incomplete.  My product will include cardiovascular exercices, strength training, breathing techniques, yoga and food capsules.

Cardiovascular and muscle exercises  will help keep the heart healthy, regulate blood pressure and maintain or achieve a healthy weight.


Breathing techniques help reduce stress, oxygenate the brain cells and maintain mental faculties in good condition.

Yoga exercises help maintain flexibility, a good posture and a good balance.

The food capsule will allow participants to have a complete, balanced diet at a reasonable cost while using local products available in most grocery stores.

My product can be used by a couple, a single person, a group of friends, a member of staff in a community center or anyone who is not comfortable going to a gym.

I fully believe in my product.  I know it works.  I’ve seen the results in the thousands of participants I’ve coached over the years.  By supporting my project, you empower an aspiring entrepreneur to start a sustainable health and fitness business  and you give me a chance to show limited mobility thy too despite their disability.   

I will film the videos in my hometown of Victoriaville (Canada) with the help of my daughter Joanie who shares my passion for good health and fitness.  She has been teaching fitness and dance classes to children and adults for the last few years following  in my footsteps.  I will also produce cards that will help the participants understand each movements and their benefits.  

I need $10000 to produce a professionnal quality product and cover the cost of starting my business.  I intend to start selling by product both online and in store by next summer.

Please note that the videos, cards and guides will be produced in both English and French.

Thank you for interest in my project. If you have any question do not hesitate to contact me.

A big thank you for your help.

Thérèse Ferland

story:
Safe Water For All

photo courtsey of http://mycharitywater.org/welivesimply

Thanks for stopping by!

Note: Due to affiliations I currently have, I am not permitted to solicit funding from certain groups of people.  If you are an employee of NASA or the USGS (or an employee of a subcontractor to either agency), I ask that you disregard this proposal and do not contribute to it.

Other than Air what's more important than a source of safe water:



Even in America, new sources of water are important.


I need your help! I need you to join with me and adopt the vision.

Imagine an object about the size of a small shed.  It has a shiny surface pointed at the sun.  If you sit very still you notice it moves very slowly keeping the sun in its view.  But you notice there are no wires, no cables, no electronics, just simple mechanics managing the entire system.  You hear a slight hissing and gurgling and you know a drink of fresh water was just made.  Now imagine these all over the world creating clean safe water everywhere!


If the prototype plans are complete in time, we can compete for this!  Check this out!   http://www.securingwaterforfood.org/the-desal-prize


The Science:

The science is very basic.  Heating water to a certain temperature kills the harmful organisms with in.  Heating it to a boil and then condensing it creates distilled water.  As an added bonus, heating salt water to a boil then condensing the steam creates fresh water.  It also work with irradiated water, and water containing heavy metals, since the heavier particles do not transfer into the steam!

What am I doing?

The real effort is to make the system consistently safe, inexpensive, reliable, and easy to use.  For this prototype I have chosen to use the sun as our energy source and only the sun.  I have decided to use only mechanical devices to manage the operation.  I have selected simple proven manufacturing processes and materials to keep the costs low. And for operating the device I desire it to be tended by a single person with minimal training. 

The five key concepts:

There are five key concepts which need to be designed, built, measured, and analyzed.  These concepts will then be combined into an integrated prototype.  My key concepts are:

The solar collector:  Size determines how much energy can be collected, but shape can be used to increase the efficiency of the system. 

The sun tracker:  Since I am collecting solar energy, consistently pointing at the sun is important. More consistent pointing leads to better use of solar energy.  (There is a solar electric version of this invention which uses the same sun tracker!)

Reading Stereographic Sun Path Diagrams

How to read Sunpath Diagrams

At 9am...

on April 1...

the azimuth is 62o

the altitude is 30o
- See more at: http://sustainabilityworkshop.autodesk.com/buildings/solar-position#sthash.SBhl7keZ.dpuf


The reaction chamber: Certainly the most critical component, the reaction chamber has to separate good steam from everything else.  Only clean steam can make clean water.

The condenser:  Turning that steam into clean safe water is the final step.  The talent comes in using natural techniques ensuring the system requires no energy other than the sun.

The flow control system: Using gravity, pressure and temperature the flow system will naturally balance itself to the optimum flow rate.


The funds:

These five key concepts need to be designed, built, measured, analyzed, and integrated to complete an efficient system.  The funds provided will allow us to do those very things.  More specifically:

The solar collector:  Although other methods will be considered for the final product, the prototype collector will be built using the same techniques used to build Jacuzzi tubs.  The funds provided will purchase the required raw materials in addition to the tools and tooling required. 

The sun tracker:  An integrated set of gears, pulleys and other mechanisms will be collected and assembled to ensure accurate sun pointing.  This includes not only the need to track the sun throughout the day but also the need to adjust as the seasons progress.  Also included is the capability for the operator to tweak the pointing each day to ensure maximum sun usage.

The reaction chamber: For the development of the reaction chamber we need a test set which includes an instrumentation system with temperature and pressure sensors, a data storage and analysis system, a test gig, and a variety of heating elements and cooling stages.

The condenser:  Once the water turns to steam, the suns energy has done its job, and we want that heat back.  Reclaiming as much of that energy as practical will require an assortment of plumbing parts and accessories including radiators and heat exchangers.

The flow control system:  A variety of floats, valves, and levelers will be procured to balance the system such that gravity, temperature and pressure correctly manage the mass flow through the system.

The assembled prototype: And, of course, funds are required for the final assembly, integration, and testing  

Here's a projection demonstrating estimated milestones and what will be constructed iat various funding levels 


With Super Mega Generous funding  ($4,325,000) I will make all aspects of this innovation open source and free to the world!

The Idea:

I have always been an inventor. But recently I decided that this invention deserves all of my efforts to see it through.  It took years of special experiences to move me to this place.

It was at NASA Johnson Space Center, where I worked as an engineer for 17 years, that I learned to really think in detail and manage projects.

It was in the military where I retired as a Major and learned to lead teams and listen and learn from the team members.

It was at Milwaukee Area Technical College where I studied Aviation Maintenance and learned hands on how real things really work.

Team:

Right now it’s just me.  That’s why I need your help!  This invention is important!  This is a capability the world desperately needs.

And now you!

I need your help! I need you to join with me and adopt the vision. 

I need you in the very near future to create your own indiegogo campaign and secure funds to take one or more of these contraptions to a part of the world where it will do the most good! 

Thank you for Considering Contributing to my Contraption!

  What ever you do, Do Something!

My first perk photo!  This is Cindy Raising a glass!  Cheers! and my deepest thanks!


This is Kay , She and her husband Greg have supported the project since the beginning!  Thanks So Much!




And this is the Princess Emma!  With a glass of clean fresh water she says cheers!  Thanks to Emma, Greg, and Susan!

those very things.  More specifically:
The solar collector: 
Although other methods will be considered for the final product, the
prototype collector will be built using the same techniques used to build Jacuzzi
tubs.  The funds provided will purchase
the required raw materials in addition to the tools and tooling required.  
The sun tracker: 
An integrated set of gears, pulleys and other mechanisms will be
collected and assembled to ensure accurate sun pointing.  This includes not only the need to track the
sun throughout the day but also the need to adjust as the seasons progress.  Also included is the capability for the operator
to tweak the pointing each day to ensure maximum sun usage.
The reaction chamber: For the development of the
reaction chamber we need a test set which includes an instrumentation system
with temperature and pressure sensors, a data storage and analysis system, a
test gig, and a variety of heating elements and cooling stages.
The condenser: 
Once the water turns to steam, the suns energy has done its job, and we
want that heat back.  Reclaiming as much
of that energy as practical will require an assortment of plumbing parts and
accessories including radiators and heat exchangers.
The flow control system: 
A variety of floats, valves, and levelers will be procured to balance
the system such that gravity, temperature and pressure correctly manage the
mass flow through the system.
The assembled prototype: And, of course, funds are required for the final
assembly, integration, and testing  Here's a projection demonstrating estimated milestones and what will be constructed iat various funding levels With Super Mega Generous funding  ($4,325,000) I will make all aspects of this innovation open source and free to the world!
The
Idea:

I have always been an inventor. But recently I decided that this
invention deserves all of my efforts to see it through.  It took years of
special experiences to move me to this place.

It was at
NASA Johnson Space Center, where I worked as an engineer for 17 years, that I
learned to really think in detail and manage projects.
It was in
the military where I retired as a Major and learned to lead teams and listen
and learn from the team members. 
It was at Milwaukee Area Technical College where I
studied Aviation Maintenance and learned hands on how real things really work.
Team:
Right now
it’s just me.  That’s why I need your
help!  This invention is important! 
This is a capability the world desperately needs. 
And now you!
I need
your help! I need you to join with me and adopt the vision.  
I need you in the very near future to create your own indiegogo campaign and secure funds to take one or more of these contraptions to a part of the world where it will do the most good! Thank you for Considering Contributing to my Contraption!  What ever you do, Do Something!My first perk photo!  This is Cindy Raising a glass!  Cheers! and my deepest thanks!This is Kay , She and her husband Greg have supported the project since the beginning!  Thanks So Much!


And this is the Princess Emma!  With a glass of clean fresh water she says cheers!  Thanks to Emma, Greg, and Susan!

story:
The Workout Of The Future

Almost all of us would like to get in shape, gain muscles, burn fat, alleviate pain in our body or just simply relax and treat ourselves with a quality experience. However in our fast paced world this is hard to reach...

...until now!

It is time to MOVE WITH TECHNOLOGY! Within a 20 minute personal E-fit training, you will exercise on the intensity level of a 1,5 - 2 hour heavy gym workout.

In 2x20 minutes a week you can reach your best shape ever.

Measure the results in inches within weeks!



Independently of age and sex to anybody who:

  • would like to learn a novel, effective way of workout

  • is a professional sportsman and wants to have an increased performance

  • would like to exercise, but has limited time

  • would like to feel and look better shaped

  • suffers from obesity

  • is a young mother, who would like to reshape her body

  • has cellulite problems

  • suffers from lower back pains due to wrong posture

  • wishes to strengthen their flaccid muscles

  • suffers from joint problems


How It Works:

The electric muscle stimulation method combined with active exercise helps muscle development and toning, and is NOT to be confused with treatment in a lying position commonly applied in beauty salons!

Together with the electric muscle stimulation we do simple gymnastics and strengthening exercises for which reason muscle development and fat burning are ten times more efficient as they would be separately. The essence of and key to the efficiency of E-FIT training lies in the simultaneous stimulation of the entire body. As all muscle groups are exercised at the same time, the average length of a workout session is reduced to one-sixth. During the hours spent in the gym we do separate exercises to move all our muscle groups, which means 15-20 minutes of workout time for each body zones and 3-4 series of every exercise, that effects 30-40 muscle contraction. By contrast, with the E-FIT equipment all muscle groups are trained simultaneously and, thanks to electric impulses, there are 30-40 micro-contractions per second in all the muscles affected; furthermore, the basic exercises that we carry out during the training also stimulate the muscles, that are already in a tensed condition, which means approximately 36,000 muscle contractions in the entire body – all within in a mere 20-minute workout. A vest and a pair of shorts made of light and strong fabric are the heart and soul of the E-Fit devices. These clothes - made of antibacterial, easy-to-clean and breathable fabric - carry and keep the electrodes in the right position.


MOVE WITH TECHNOLOGY

Our times offer a wide variety of training forms and opportunities to do sports to preserve our health and work on our body. Many of us have tried these newer and newer opportunities in an effort to reach our goals during training sessions faster and more efficiently. E-Fit has long been known but it is with the forward-looking EMS technology that it has achieved a breakthrough in the world of sport. Besides the innumerable forms of training, at last we have a chance to familiarize ourselves with a new, unique opportunity to achieve our goals. In the 21st century, the majority of people suffer from overweight-related problems and connective tissue disorders; there a number of diseases involving muscular atrophy, for which E-Fit Electro Fitness programs offer a perfect solution. In today’s hectic world we have little time or energy left to pay attention to healthy eating and exercise; E-Fit offers help to those seeking to lead a more active and health-conscious lifestyle.


Our Dream, Your Benefit


We have purchased the E-fit machine directly from the factory and established our business in the form of a fitness center in Hungary, in February 2014. We have instantly realized the huge opportunity this machine has and decided to grow bigger.
  • We would like to expand worldwide and open multiple locations.
  • The setup cost of each location is approximately $50,000 depending on the rent cost of the commercial space, utilities and equipments (such as fitness tools or furniture).
  • Our next two locations that we are focusing on is Dubai and Moscow. Why? We have great business relations at these cities and our company has received all certifications needed for the operation of an E-fit center

MOSCOW, Russia

DUBAI, United Arab Emirates


  • We need your help, so we can expand to a strong and stable organization that can widen the fitness opportunities of people to keep up with our fast paced world.

  • Individuals who donate over $2,000 will receive a full year membership at any of our locations.
  • Individuals who donate over $5,000 will receive an unlimited membership at any of our locations.
  • We also give away Free Virtual Hugs for $1 and Free Virtual Back Pats for $2. Get both for the perfect combo.
  • Oh, and don't forget our Free Custom E-fit Ts!


How Do We Utilize Your Donations?


  1.  With your help we will be able to afford the perfect location which will contribute to the success of our business.
  2.  As the next step, we cover the registration costs of our company in each given country.
  3.  Following, we equip our fitness centers and create a great marketing campaign.
  4.  Than all that's left is to gain happy customers with skilled personal trainers as employees.


Other Ways You Can Help


  • Please feel free to spread the word of our campaign, for example share it on social media.
  • We take all business advice with great appreciation.
  • Help us grow! Be part of our development with your ideas and creativity.


Our Timeline


What we did:

What we plan:


Important Information


We are not the founders of E-fit nor the owners of the brand! There are several E-fit studios around the world already, however still a great number of countries, that the brand did not concuer yet.

We do not act as distributors, we simply purchase the E-fit machine and equipment from the factory and utilize it's benefits at our own fitness centers.

As a group of entrepreneurs, we have realized the great benefits of this new form of workout and would like to grow our own business on international levels and help the brand spread to even more locations.

With the help of your donations we are able to reach our business goals and provide a quicker and easier way for thousands to work out and shape their body.


FREQUENTLY ASKED QUESTIONS


1. What should I bring with me for the workout?

Before each session we spray water on your E-fit clothing, therefor an extra undergarment is recomended. Other than that, you find everything you need for the workout here, so all you need is to turn up!

2. How does a session look like?

  • Before your workout we serve you with an isotonic drink to provide vital minerals and vitamins for your session

  • You will need a special E-fit clothing set, that we provide in our center

  • Than, we allow you time to change

  • We humect your clothing with water in the area of the main muscle groups to 

  • Next comes the E-fit west and pants which are to provide impulses for your muscles for a more intense exercise

  • Than is your 20 minute personalized workout session

  • When your training is over you can choose to have a shower or just simply change back to your clothes

  • Before you leave, we serve you with a protein shake to provide you with nutrions that supports your body

3. Will I get wet during the training?

In order to ensure appropriate impulse transfer electrode surfaces need to be dampened for good contact between the machine and the customer.

4. Do I have to move or exercise during my session?

Yes, you do by performing the exercises suited to your capabilities and demonstrated by the fitness instructor. Performing the right exercises in line with the rhythm of the impulses significantly augments the favorable effects of EMS workout as opposed to exercising alone.

5. Who holds the training sessions?

Our training sessions take place with the assistance of qualified personal fitness trainers who help you perform the exercises correctly and assume the right body posture. They also demonstrate and perform the exercises with you, give advice on the right dietary regime and naturally, they are forthcoming and polite.

6. Is 2x20 minute workout a week enough?

The weekly amount of workout recommended by E-Fit is 2x20 minutes. Unless you do other exercises as well, 3 training sessions a week are allowed with at least a 48-hour rest period between the sessions.

7. What is the difference between E-fit and other muscle stimulators?

Most home use and other muscle stimulators are designed to be applied on passive muscles. During E-Fit sessions muscle stimulation is applied on active muscles, combined with a sequence of trainer-instructed exercises.

8. Is there a weight loss program within the setting option of the E-fit equipment?

The fat-burning effect does not occur directly. Workout intensity increases the metabolic rate and following a proper diet will automatically trigger weight loss and muscle toning.

9. What age group is this type of workout recommended for?

E-Fit training is recommended for everyone, regardless of age and gender. We have customers over 50, who can keep perfectly fit with the sessions. We also have young mothers who we help with rehabilitation after giving birth. There are also several active athletes among our clients, who tell us that we help them improve performance, increase speed, shape their muscles and enhance dynamics. Most people, however, only want to look better and improve their fitness - something they can all achieve with us.

10. Are there any reasons why you should not use E-fit equipment?

The equipment must not be used by people with heart disease, pacemakers or other implanted electric devices, during pregnancy, with a predisposition to epileptic seizures or fitting.

11. Can I get an electric shock during the workout?

No, there is no way you get an electric shock during workout as the equipment operates at low voltage using an external power source or battery. The intensity of the generated impulses is max. 0.05 Watt RMS.

12. To what extent does the E-fit training strain my joints?

The E-FIT training is completely easy on joints.

13. Can the E-fit equipment be used during pregnancy and breastfeeding?

It is not allowed to be used during pregnancy at all and is not recommended during breastfeeding.

14. What effect will the E-fit equipment have on my skin?

E-Fit training sessions result in tighter skin and can effectively combat cellulite. We highly recommend it for young mothers who wish to get back into shape after giving birth.

15. When will I see visible results?

A “striking” change can only be achieved through a complex process. A healthy diet combined with 2 to 3 workout sessions per week will produce visible changes after 10 occasions.

16. Can I eat immediately before workout?

In order to achieve an optimum workout effect you should consume high-carb food 2.5 to 3 hours before the session. You should not eat two hours before workout to avoid abdominal discomfort.

17. Will my muscles by stiff after the workout?

Muscle stiffness is the worst after the first workout session as E-Fit works on deep muscles that are hard to reach through normal training. However this will gradually disappear with regular training sessions. Muscle stiffness can last 2 to 3 days after the session and persists for a longer time than after a normal workout session.

18. Can the impulse depth, frequency and intensity be adjusted during my workout session?

On E-Fit machines the impulse depth, frequency and intensity can be adjusted freely to personal needs depending on your build, age, gender and level of fitness.

19. Can the E-fit equipment be used for rehabilitation?

Certainly so, as the technology itself comes from physiotherapy. It does not overload joints and so the muscles of an injured body part can be developed efficiently.

story:
Our Mission

Bust A Move is an athletics equipment company dedicated to keeping all girls active, regardless of body type. Using mechanical engineering principles, we have designed a supportive, patent-pending sports bra to meet the specific needs of busty athletes. We believe sports bras are sports equipment™ and that, with the right equipment, girls can tackle any challenge and face any competitor with comfort and confidence.

Help us cross the finish line to production with a contribution today! Click "Back It" or select a Perk to support busty athletes and Bust A Move. 

Our Problem

Studies show that over 50% of girls drop out of sports by the age of seventeen, and one major reason for this is breast development. The UK Journal of Adolescent Health found that 73% of busty girls cite their breasts as a deterrent to exercise. Yet major brands fail to build products specifically for busty athletes. They design sports bras with the industry standard of B cup, even while the average bra size in the United States is DD. As a result, busty athletes often wear two, three, even six sports bras at a time to create the support they need to perform.

Our Solution

Bust A Move's bra is designed by a busty athlete-engineer who prioritizes function over fashion.  We believe sports bras are sports equipment™ as opposed to intimates or underwear. Sports bras are as essential to an athlete as cleats or shin guards. Our patent-pending design minimizes the Moment of Inertia, which is the resistance to a change in motion. With more Inertia, there is more breast bouncing and, therefore, more pain for the athlete. Our sports bra design also addresses several other problems that our target users have, including stress on the neck and difficulty putting bras on and off. We’ve engineered our sports bra to solve multiple problems in one, easy-to-use, accessible product. 

The Bust A Move sports bra has three key features designed to minimize inertia. 

Adjustable Band: Support starts from the bottom up with our adjustable band, which takes some of the strain off the shoulders and reduces total displacement. 

Encapsulation Layer: While the outer layer compresses the breasts, the inner encapsulation layer redistributes the weight across the chest to prevent cleavage and side-to-side movement. 

Dispersive Straps: We added dispersive straps to the bra’s traditional racerback design to increase its surface area on the shoulders, which in turn decreases back and neck tension. 

Our Plan

To date, we've made product samples by collaborating with amazing female designers, we've submitted a patent application for our design, and we're working with a team of engineers to test our sports bra to ensure it is the best on the market.  

While we're finishing product development and testing, we need some funding to keep the momentum going. We're offering merchandise for your donation to welcome you to the Bust A Movement and say thank you for all of your support! 

Our Team 

Alison Leddy is the Founder & CEO of Bust A Move. She has a mechanical engineering degree from the University of Notre Dame, as well as start-up experience through the Venture for America Fellowship program. We have volunteers and collaborators with experience from ESPN, Under Armour, Project Runway, the University of Oxford, the University of Notre Dame, and more.  

Your Impact

Your generous contribution will allow us to hire a grading specialist, who will take our pattern and ensure that every busty athlete can get the support she deserves. This is a necessary step to take before we can send our sample to a manufacturer. If we raise more than our goal, we plan to offer multiple color options: white, black, and a bonus color! 

Unable to contribute at this time? We totally get it - it's been an incredibly difficult year. You can still support Bust A Move by sending this campaign to at least five friends and posting it on your social media. Don't forget to follow us on Instagram and Facebook!

story:
Video of Accutension Stetho

Here are some photos of products for shipping.
1. manufactured products with one box opened to show the Accutension Stetho inside. There are also two adapters to enable real time Korotkoff sounds auscultation.

 

2. Accutension Stetho is being put into a shipping bag with air bubble protection.

3. The Envelope with air bubble protection was closed.

4. Dozens of packages ready for shipping.

 

 

Please visit our website: www.accutension.com to learn the most updated product information. Please post in our product forum www.accutension.com/forum/ on any questions regarding our products, blood pressure measurement tips and general blood pressure monitor accuracy. We are there to answer your questions.

This research paper describes the inaccuracy issue of automated blood pressure monitors and the methods to check their accuracy on individuals. http://www.ashjournal.com/article/S1933-1711(16)00005-X/abstract?cc=y=

iOS App for Accutension Stetho: https://itunes.apple.com/app/id1056669469

iOS App for Accutension: https://itunes.apple.com/app/id1067641040

If you already have an automatic upper arm blood pressure monitor and worry about its accuracy, Accutension Stetho is a perfect fit because it will provide you a second but accurate reading on your iPhone/iPad based on doctors' auscultatory method.

"(Accutension) is a welcome alternative to the many blood pressure monitors on the market."

                                                                                                                  - Geektime.com

"Accutension aims to be the first at-home blood pressure kit that provides results as accurate as doctor’s measurements, and it’s powered by a smartphone app."

                                                                                                          - Venturebreak.com

"And unlike automatic blood pressure monitors (BPM) which have been shown to be subject to variation in readingsaccording to a post on Harvard’s Health blog, Accutension detects blood pressure by listening to the sounds of blood flow, just as doctors in a clinical setting would."

                                                                                                    - healthtechzone.com

We were interviewed by Maker Paradise. Click here to listen to the podcast.

Almost 1,000 Americans die DAILY from causes related to high blood pressure. Two thirds of adults have blood pressure higher than normal. Monitoring and forecasting potential problems is critical for your well being and can even save lives of your loved ones.

Unfortunately, you can’t rely on your automatic BPM. 

Several years ago, my friend was misdiagnosed because of inaccurate reading. Shockingly, his experience is not unique (just check multiple complains on Amazon.com about blood pressure monitors).

If you or your loved one are using automatic blood pressure monitors (BPM), you may be misled by their readings. Most  BPMs employ their own algorithms and use cuff pressure oscillation for the estimates. 

As a result, a user gets different readings, depending on the monitor they are using. Approximately 40% of the users have shown discrepancy in the recent study conducted by the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC). It may lead to inappropriate treatments or a lack of them, putting millions of people in danger of  fatal strokes, myocardial infarctions or exposing them to adverse drug and psychological effects, and unnecessary expenses. Think about your parents. They have taken care of you all your life. Now, it’s your time to support them. Accuracy of their medical devices is crucial as never before.

Accutension is the first blood pressure kit for at home use that provides the results as accurate as doctor’s measurements, employing your smartphone and an app.

Doctors directly determine the blood pressure by listening (auscultating) to the sounds of blood flow. So does Accutension: it provides readings based directly on the sounds, not algorithms, resulting in accurate, consistent, and reliable blood pressure measurement.

 

Accutension works with your  traditional sphygmomanometer or an automatic BPM or as an independent blood pressure kit with its own cuff. 

The sounds from the tube of the stethoscope are fed into the phone through a microphone plugged into the jack. 

You can use Accutension to verify your BPM’s readings. It will provide a simultaneous second reading on a smartphone from the same device.

 

 

If you just want to check the algorithm, Accutension Stetho is for you. The process is as easy as recording a video on your phone (no app needed).

Plug the Stetho into your phone and record the video (shoot the display of the BPM) during the blood pressure measurement. The sounds of blood flow (Korotkoff sounds) will be recorded.

Then, replay the video and listen to the sounds. When you hear the first Korotkoff sound, the number on the screen is the systolic pressure; when the Korotkoff sounds disappear, the number on the screen is the diastolic pressure. Compare these results with those on your BPM screen.  

 

The Accutension Stetho just checks the algorithm. With Accutension Classic, you can check both the algorithm and the pressure sensor of the BPM. 

Plug the pressure sensor module into any upper arm BPM with a tube connecting the cuff and the machine. There is a connector between the tube and the machine body which is easy to take off in order to add the Accutension module. The sensor does not affect the normal BMP operation, so you don’t need to unplug it. 

The same way, you can check the accuracy of your sphygmomanometer. 

Use the Accutension App to simplify and attest the accuracy of the readings.

If you add a cuff and a hand pump to Accutension Classic, it becomes a standalone blood pressure kit.

Selecting a correct cuff size is very important for accurate blood pressure measurement. We will provide two cuffs of different sizes in every kit, to make sure you get the one most suitable for your arm.

The cuff will be self deflated at a speed 2-4 mmHg/s, required by accurate blood pressure measurement guideline. 

 

 

With Accutension Doc, you can easily conduct a research on the blood pressure measurement. The accessories will allow you to connect two stethoscopes together with Accutension Stetho or connect the Accutension pressure sensor module, a traditional sphygmomanometer and an automatic BPM together.

We value your support and want to reward you for helping us spread the word! You can help those who struggle from hypertension to learn about the problem AND get the Accutension FOR FREE!

Introducing the REFFERAL PROGRAM!

You can always monitor your referrals through your Indiegogo account. Make sure to read the referral program instructions here: https://support.indiegogo.com/hc/en-us/articles.... 

We would love to hear your opinion about the incentive!

 

 

We want to let as many people as possible know about the danger and, with help from the community, solve the problem and offer peace of mind to those straggling from hypertension. We have come on Indiegogo to spread the word and to create the solution together. 

 

  • We need funds to get FDA approval and cover R&D and production costs. 
  • We need your feedback to further fine tune and improve the product. We want to share the knowledge and development process with you, so that TOGETHER, we develop something to be proud of!

 

  • We need to gather information from as many people as possible in order to better understand and predict potential inaccuracy of automatic BPMs and understand the problem in a health care system that uses more that one specific model/device to measure BP in different clinics.

 

 

Q: Do I need the Internet access to use Accutension?

A: No internet access is needed for a measurement, but if you want to send the measurement data to others, internet access is needed.

Q: Does Accutension work with all types of automatic blood pressure monitors?

A: Majority of the upper arm BPMs. More specifically: 1. upper arm cuff, and 2. cuff deflation takes longer time than inflation.

Q: Should I always use Accutension, if I have a BPM, or just when I am worried about the readings?

A: At first, you can compare the reading between your BPM and accutension for several times. If the reading is always very close, you don't need to use accutension for checking purpose everyday. But Accutension has other features such as store your readings on your phone. Since Accutension is easy to use, you can use it everyday for better blood pressure management.

Q: If I have an Automatic BPM, which option should I select?

A: You can select either Accutension Stetho or Accutension Classic, depending on the purpose. Accutension can check the algorithm, which is the major source of inaccuracy. Accutension can check both the algorithm and the pressure sensor, so you can have higher confidence on the reading.

Q: Do I need to have a medical expertise to use Accutension at home?

A: No. Accutension is designed to simplify the measurement difficulties. In case you follow the process, it is not difficult to get accurate readings.

Q: Is the battery re-chargeable?

A: Yes. The battery is re-chargeable, so you don't need to worry about running out of power. Just re-charge it.

Q: There are other phone connected BPMs such as Withings and iHealth. How is Accutension different from them?

A: 1. the measurement method is different. Both Withings and iHealth use oscillometric method, but Accutension use auscultatory method. In case you are interested in some accuracy research on them, here is a link: http://www.ashjournal.com/article/S1933-1711(14)00235-6/pdf. 2. the role of the phone is different. Accutension uses the phone to listen so the phone "measures" the blood pressure, but others mainly use the phone to "store" the result.

Q: Most automatic BPM states their accuracy in the spec and the accuracy is 3-4 mmHg. Is it true?

A: That accuracy is for the pressure sensor. The pressure sensor just get the pressure of the cuff. The algorithm estimates the blood pressure. So the error of blood pressure is mainly from the algorithm. That number as blood pressure monitor accuracy is misleading.

Q: Most automatic BPMs claim that they passed certain Accuracy Validation Protocol and they are accurate. Is it true?

 A: There are three leading Accuracy validation protocols in the world. These protocols can guarantee the device is relative accurate for a percentage of population (around 60% if 5 mmHg is accuracy criterion). They can't guarantee the device is accurate for a specific user. Some person even got an error bigger than 50 mmHg. Such kind of protocol is designed by the industry to let some auto BPMs to be able to pass, so that they can sell. With Accutension, everybody can check the device accuracy by himself, so protocol is not needed any more.
 
Q: My automatic BPM is not accurate, but is the descrepancy/error a constant?
A: No. It is not a constant. The accuracy could change with time and your body condition. With Accutension, we can have better understanding on this question.

Q: Can I use Accutension Stetho to record other sounds such as heart beat?

A: Yes for sure. Though the product is designed for blood pressure measurement, you can use it to record any sounds you like.

Q: How inaccurate is an automatic blood pressure monitor?

A: It is user dependant. According to some research (http://www.cdc.gov/nchs/data/nhsr/nhsr059.pdf), 40% users can get discrepancy bigger than 5mmHg while 15% users can get discrepancy bigger than 10mmHg. Some user can get discrepancy bigger than 20umHg.

Disclaimer: According to PayPal rules, we must notify potential backers that delivery of rewards/perks are subject to best efforts and not guaranteed.
